1.name: Rocket Boots
1.description: Increase the cast range of Xplodium Charge by 30% and its damage by 20%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Xplodium Charge by 30% and its damage by 20%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Big Game Hunter
1.description: Increase maximum Scrap by 2.  Dealing damage with Basic Attacks to enemy Heroes, Mercenaries, or Monsters reduces the cooldown of Reduce, Reuse, Recycle by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase maximum Scrap by 2.  Dealing damage with Basic Attacks to enemy Heroes, Mercenaries, or Monsters reduces the cooldown of Reduce, Reuse, Recycle by 2 seconds.

1.name: One Man Wrecking Crew
1.description: Casting Basic Abilities cause Gazlowe's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 45% more damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Casting Basic Abilities cause Gazlowe's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal 45% more damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Rock It Sock It
4.description: Casting Rock-It! Turret grants Gazlowe a Shield that absorbs up to 215 (+4% per level) damage for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Casting Rock-It! Turret grants Gazlowe a Shield that absorbs up to 215 (+4% per level) damage for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Hyperfocus Coils
4.description: Heroes hit by Deth Lazor or Xplodium Charge take an additional 2% of their maximum Health in damage. Gazlowe is healed for 150% of the damage dealt.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Deth Lazor or Xplodium Charge take an additional 2% of their maximum Health in damage. Gazlowe is healed for 150% of the damage dealt.

4.name: EZ-PZ Dimensional Ripper
4.description: Activate to gain 35 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 35%, and reduce damage dealt by all nearby enemy Heroes and Summons by 50% for 3 seconds
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 35 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 35%, and reduce damage dealt by all nearby enemy Heroes and Summons by 50% for 3 seconds

7.name: Goblin Fusion
7.description: Generate 3 Scrap for each Hero hit by Deth Lazor.
7.longDescription: Generate 3 Scrap for each Hero hit by Deth Lazor.

7.name: Overload
7.description: Deth Lazor can now store up to 2 charges. Each enemy Hero hit by Deth Lazor reduces its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Deth Lazor can now store up to 2 charges. Each enemy Hero hit by Deth Lazor reduces its cooldown by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Master Blaster
7.description: Deth Lazor and Xplodium Charge Slow enemies hit by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Rock-It! Turret Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed in this way extend the Slow duration by 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Deth Lazor and Xplodium Charge Slow enemies hit by 35% for 2.5 seconds. Rock-It! Turret Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed in this way extend the Slow duration by 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Robo-Goblin
10.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 80 (+4% per level) bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
10.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks deal 80 (+4% per level) bonus damage over 5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

10.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 (+4% per level) damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 220 (+4% per level) damage. Basic Abilities deal 30% more damage for 5 seconds after casting Grav-O-Bomb 3000.

13.name: Positive Reinforcement
13.description: Primary Rock-It! Turret attacks against Heroes increase Gazlowe's Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Primary Rock-It! Turret attacks against Heroes increase Gazlowe's Attack Speed by 40% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Superior Schematics
13.description: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 75% damage and have 50% increased Basic Attack range.
13.longDescription: Rock-It! Turrets attack up to 2 additional enemies for 75% damage and have 50% increased Basic Attack range.

13.name: Overcharged Capacitors
13.description: Gazlowe gains 5% Spell Power for each active Rock-It! Turret, up to a maximum of 15%. Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of Rock-It! Turrets by 1.25 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gazlowe gains 5% Spell Power for each active Rock-It! Turret, up to a maximum of 15%. Dealing Basic Attack damage extends the duration of Rock-It! Turrets by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Firin' Mah Lazorz
16.description: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 125 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Firing Deth Lazor causes all of Gazlowe's Rock-It! Turrets to fire a Deth Lazor of their own that deals 125 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Ark Reaktor
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Xplodium Charge by 3 seconds. Casting Xplodium Charge creates 3 miniature Rock-It! Turrets that last for 3 seconds.  These Turrets do not drop Scrap or benefit from other Talents.
16.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Xplodium Charge by 3 seconds. Casting Xplodium Charge creates 3 miniature Rock-It! Turrets that last for 3 seconds.  These Turrets do not drop Scrap or benefit from other Talents.

16.name: Overklock
16.description: Basic Attacks grant Gazlowe 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Dealing Basic Attack damage to Heroes causes them to take an additional 2.5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks grant Gazlowe 15% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Dealing Basic Attack damage to Heroes causes them to take an additional 2.5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Mecha-Lord
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 10 for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30, and deal 50% bonus damage to Stunned or Slowed enemies.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Gazlowe's Armor by 10 for 10 seconds, up to a maximum of 30, and deal 50% bonus damage to Stunned or Slowed enemies.

20.name: Miniature Black Hole
20.description: Increase Grav-O-Bomb 3000's radius by 25% and its damage by 50%. Each enemy Hero pulled reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase Grav-O-Bomb 3000's radius by 25% and its damage by 50%. Each enemy Hero pulled reduces its cooldown by 12 seconds.

20.name: It's Raining Scrap
20.description: Reduce the Scrap cost of Rock-It! Turrets by 1. Regain 2 Scrap for each Scrap pickup.
20.longDescription: Reduce the Scrap cost of Rock-It! Turrets by 1. Regain 2 Scrap for each Scrap pickup.

20.name: Bomb Toss
20.description: Xplodium Charge launches 2 more bombs when it detonates.
20.longDescription: Xplodium Charge launches 2 more bombs when it detonates.

1.name: Olaf the Stout
1.description: Passive: Olaf gains 20% bonus maximum Health.  Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Passive: Olaf gains 20% bonus maximum Health.  Every 5 seconds, Olaf gains 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Spy Games
1.description: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving and once removed, Erik gains 75% bonus Basic Attack damage for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for 3 seconds after moving and once removed, Erik gains 75% bonus Basic Attack damage for 6 seconds.

1.name: Explosive Attacks
1.description: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.
1.longDescription: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

1.name: Viking Bribery
1.description: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0
1.longDescription: Enemy Minions or captured Mercenaries killed near The Lost Vikings grant stacks of Bribe. Use 40 stacks to bribe target Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum stacks available: 200.  Current number of Bribe stacks: 0

4.name: Pain Don't Hurt
4.description: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.
4.longDescription: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for 20% of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

4.name: Erik the Swift
4.description: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.
4.longDescription: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals 34 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: It's a Sabotage!
4.description: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.
4.longDescription: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 5 seconds, causing 250 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Mercenary Lord
4.description: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal 50% more damage. Gain 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Baleog the Fierce
7.description: Increase Baleog's attack range by 2.5.  While near Olaf and Erik, he becomes inspired by the power of teamwork and his Attack Speed is increased by 50%.
7.longDescription: Increase Baleog's attack range by 2.5.  While near Olaf and Erik, he becomes inspired by the power of teamwork and his Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

7.name: Spin To Win!
7.description: Activate to have each Viking deal 85 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Deals 100% bonus damage to enemy Heroes.
7.longDescription: Activate to have each Viking deal 85 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Deals 100% bonus damage to enemy Heroes.

7.name: Norse Force!
7.description: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: All Vikings gain a 130 (+4% per level) to 260 (+4% per level) point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts 4 seconds.

10.name: Longboat Raid!
10.description: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.
10.longDescription: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for 112 (+4% per level) damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals 228 (+4% per level) damage in an area.  The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are Stunned for 1 second. Lasts 15 seconds.  Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

10.name: Play Again!
10.description: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.
10.longDescription: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds.  Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

13.name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
13.description: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Olaf deals 34 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Jump!
13.description: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Nordic Attack Squad
13.description: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% maximum Health to enemy Heroes.
13.longDescription: While Olaf, Baleog, and Erik are near each of the other two Vikings, their Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1.25% maximum Health to enemy Heroes.

16.name: Large and In Charge
16.description: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.
16.longDescription: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for 1 second.

16.name: Impatience Is a Virtue
16.description: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: 64 KB Marathon
16.description: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.
16.longDescription: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds.  Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

16.name: Executioner
16.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
20.description: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.
20.longDescription: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

20.name: Checkpoint Reached
20.description: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.
20.longDescription: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

20.name: The Sequel!
20.description: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduces the Lost Vikings's death timer by 50%.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional 41 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 105 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters.  Each Viking has their own cooldown.

1.name: Silver Touch
1.description: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Reduce damage from Heroic sources with Devotion.  Reward: After reducing damage 40 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced from 80 to 60.  Reward: After reducing damage 80 times, Holy Light's Mana cost is reduced to 40, and its range is increased by 50%.

1.name: Wave of Light
1.description: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damage or heal Heroes 60 times with Holy Radiance.  Reward: Increase the duration of Devotion by 0.5 seconds.  Passive: Damaging or healing Heroes with Holy Radiance refunds 5 Mana and reduces its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

1.name: Hammer of the Lightbringer
1.description: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attack enemies 75 times.  Reward: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hammer of Justice by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 1.5% of Uther's maximum Mana.

4.name: Holy Shock
4.description: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 40% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.
4.longDescription: Holy Light can be used on an enemy to do 40% of its healing amount as damage. When used this way, Uther receives its self-healing benefits, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, and it refunds 45 Mana.

4.name: Pursuit of Justice
4.description: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hammer of Justice increases Uther's Movement Speed by 25% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Holy Fire
4.description: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.
4.longDescription: Deal 13 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase this damage by 20% for 3 seconds. This can stack up to 3 times.

7.name: Armor of Faith
7.description: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.
7.longDescription: Being Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced grants Uther 90 Mana and causes Holy Light's cooldown to recharge 200% faster for 6 seconds. This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

7.name: Guardian of Ancient Kings
7.description: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.
7.longDescription: Healing a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced increases the Armor bonus they receive from Devotion from 25 to 50.

7.name: Hand of Protection
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on Uther. Basic Attacks reduce Hand of Protection's cooldown by 5 seconds.

10.name: Divine Shield
10.description: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Make an allied Hero Invulnerable and increase their Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Divine Storm
10.description: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 170 (+4% per level) damage and Stun nearby enemies for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Blessed Champion
13.description: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.
13.longDescription: For the next 5 seconds after using Holy Light, Uther's Basic Attacks heal him and nearby allied Heroes for 15% of the total amount healed by Holy Light.

13.name: Well Met
13.description: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When used against Heroes, Hammer of Justice reduces the target's Movement Speed and damage dealt by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Beacon of Light
16.description: Uther receives 100% bonus self-healing when targeting others with Holy Light.  This bonus is increased to 200% while he is below 50% Health.
16.longDescription: Uther receives 100% bonus self-healing when targeting others with Holy Light.  This bonus is increased to 200% while he is below 50% Health.

16.name: Tyr's Deliverance
16.description: Increase the damage and healing of Holy Radiance by 10%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes cause Uther's next cast of Holy Radiance to have its damage and healing increased by an additional 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
16.longDescription: Increase the damage and healing of Holy Radiance by 10%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes cause Uther's next cast of Holy Radiance to have its damage and healing increased by an additional 10%, stacking up to 4 times.

16.name: Benediction
16.description: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Mana cost of Uther's next Basic Ability by 50 and its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Bulwark of Light
20.description: Divine Shield is also applied to all nearby allied Heroes and lasts 1 second longer.
20.longDescription: Divine Shield is also applied to all nearby allied Heroes and lasts 1 second longer.

20.name: Divine Hurricane
20.description: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 40 seconds.
20.longDescription: Divine Storm's radius is increased by 50% and its cooldown is reduced by 40 seconds.

20.name: Redemption
20.description: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: After Eternal Vanguard ends, Uther revives at the spirit's location with 50% of his maximum Health.  This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

20.name: Divine Protection
20.description: Increase Devotion's Armor to 50 and its duration by 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase Devotion's Armor to 50 and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Full Metal
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 10% increased Health and its Fusion Cannons heal for 20% of the damage dealt to enemies in its bonus area.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 10% increased Health and its Fusion Cannons heal for 20% of the damage dealt to enemies in its bonus area.

1.name: Pro Moves
1.description: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed and 2 Armor every time it takes damage, stacking up to 15 times. Stacks of this effect decay every 0.5 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes in Pilot Mode reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 1 additional second.
1.longDescription: D.Va's Mech gains 2% Movement Speed and 2 Armor every time it takes damage, stacking up to 15 times. Stacks of this effect decay every 0.5 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes in Pilot Mode reduce the cooldown of Call Mech by 1 additional second.

1.name: Liquid Cooling
1.description: Activate to gain the effects of Healing Fountain. Requires Mech Mode.  Passive: While in Mech Mode, Healing Fountain's cooldown is reduced to 50 seconds and its effects last 25% longer.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain the effects of Healing Fountain. Requires Mech Mode.  Passive: While in Mech Mode, Healing Fountain's cooldown is reduced to 50 seconds and its effects last 25% longer.

4.name: Rush-down
4.description: Boosters deals an additional 4% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes and heals D.Va's Mech for the damage dealt. Boosters deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.
4.longDescription: Boosters deals an additional 4% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes and heals D.Va's Mech for the damage dealt. Boosters deals 100% increased damage to non-Heroic enemies.

4.name: Aggression Matrix
4.description: Enemy Heroes within your Defense Matrix receive 30% less healing.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.125 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes within your Defense Matrix receive 30% less healing.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Defense Matrix by 0.125 seconds.

4.name: Nuclear Option
4.description: Hitting your self-destructing Mech with Big Shot causes it to self-destruct 40% faster.  Passive: When Fusion Cannons deal bonus damage to an enemy Hero, gain 0.25 Self-Destruct Charge.
4.longDescription: Hitting your self-destructing Mech with Big Shot causes it to self-destruct 40% faster.  Passive: When Fusion Cannons deal bonus damage to an enemy Hero, gain 0.25 Self-Destruct Charge.

7.name: Get On The Point!
7.description: Casting Boosters grants nearby allies 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Passive: If D.Va has not taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Boosters' cooldown refreshes 100% faster.
7.longDescription: Casting Boosters grants nearby allies 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Passive: If D.Va has not taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Boosters' cooldown refreshes 100% faster.

7.name: Hit The Nitrous
7.description: The initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 300%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters Stuns for 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: The initial speed bonus of Boosters is increased to 300%, then decays to normal boost speed over 0.5 seconds. During this time, Boosters Stuns for 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Fusion Generator
7.description: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 20% Charge gained per use.  Passive: While at full Self-Destruct charge, Fusion Cannons' bonus damage is increased to 75%.
7.longDescription: Every time an enemy Hero deals damage while inside Defense Matrix, D.Va's Self-Destruct Charge increases by 1%. Max of 20% Charge gained per use.  Passive: While at full Self-Destruct charge, Fusion Cannons' bonus damage is increased to 75%.

10.name: Bunny Hop
10.description: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage in a large area. Every 4th consecutive hit on a Hero deals 100% more damage and Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.  Lasts for 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: D.Va's Mech becomes Unstoppable and stomps every 0.5 seconds, dealing 52 (+4% per level) damage in a large area. Every 4th consecutive hit on a Hero deals 100% more damage and Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.  Lasts for 4 seconds.  Requires Mech Mode.

10.name: Micro Missiles
10.description: After .375 seconds, Channel to launch a volley of 12 missiles in a target direction. Each missile impacts the first enemy in its path, dealing 44 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and Slowing by 35% for 2 seconds.  Stores 2 charges with a 5 second cooldown between each use.  Requires Mech Mode.
10.longDescription: After .375 seconds, Channel to launch a volley of 12 missiles in a target direction. Each missile impacts the first enemy in its path, dealing 44 (+4% per level) damage in a small area and Slowing by 35% for 2 seconds.  Stores 2 charges with a 5 second cooldown between each use.  Requires Mech Mode.

13.name: Target Locked
13.description: Enemy Heroes that remain in your Defense Matrix for 1.5 seconds have their Armor reduced by 15 and their Movement Speed reduced by 25% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that remain in your Defense Matrix for 1.5 seconds have their Armor reduced by 15 and their Movement Speed reduced by 25% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Good To Go
13.description: Pilot Mode: Unlocks the Torpedo Dash and Concussive Pulse abilities.  Torpedo Dash: Dash a short distance. 10 second cooldown.  Concussive Pulse: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. 10 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Unlocks the Torpedo Dash and Concussive Pulse abilities.  Torpedo Dash: Dash a short distance. 10 second cooldown.  Concussive Pulse: Deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a cone and knock them back. 10 second cooldown.

13.name: Pew! Pew! Pew!
13.description: Pilot Mode: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 75% damage.
13.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Instead of a single shot, Big Shot fires 3 shots over 0.5 seconds. Each shot deals 75% damage.

16.name: In For The Kill
16.description: Casting Boosters grants a Shield equal to 10% of maximum life for 2.5 seconds. Each Enemy Hero hit by Boosters increases D.Va's Mech's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Casting Boosters grants a Shield equal to 10% of maximum life for 2.5 seconds. Each Enemy Hero hit by Boosters increases D.Va's Mech's Basic Attack damage by 10% for 5 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

16.name: Diverting Power
16.description: Defense Matrix's area grows drastically in size and each time it reduces damage dealt to Heroes D.Va's Mech is healed for 35 (+4% per level) Health.
16.longDescription: Defense Matrix's area grows drastically in size and each time it reduces damage dealt to Heroes D.Va's Mech is healed for 35 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Emergency Shielding
16.description: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 280 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.
16.longDescription: When D.Va's Mech would be destroyed, it instead gains a Shield that absorbs 280 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.  This effect has a 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Stop and Pop
20.description: Bunny Hop's duration does not decay while D.Va's Mech is stationary.
20.longDescription: Bunny Hop's duration does not decay while D.Va's Mech is stationary.

20.name: Timing Attack
20.description: Micro Missiles gains an additional charge. Each time Micro Missiles hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds and charge cooldown by 0.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Micro Missiles gains an additional charge. Each time Micro Missiles hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds and charge cooldown by 0.25 seconds.

20.name: Headshot!
20.description: Pilot Mode: Increase Big Shot's damage by 75% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Pilot Mode: Increase Big Shot's damage by 75% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

20.name: Ablative Armor
20.description: 45% of Spell damage dealt to D.Va's Mech is returned as healing over 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: 45% of Spell damage dealt to D.Va's Mech is returned as healing over 4 seconds.

1.name: Bird of Prey
1.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.
1.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's damage by 150% to Minions.

1.name: Easy Prey
1.description: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases Misha's basic attack damage to Minions and Mercenaries by 150%, and Misha gains 50 Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing damage taken by 50%.

1.name: Flare
1.description: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Fire a flare at an area, revealing it for 20 seconds.

4.name: Hungry Bear
4.description: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks heal her for 4.5% of her maximum Health.

4.name: Hunter-Gatherer
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar and Misha's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Rexxar and Misha's Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 25 per second.  Reward: After gathering 25 Globes, Rexxar and Misha gain 15 Armor.

4.name: Grizzled Fortitude
4.description: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.
4.longDescription: Every 6 seconds, Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges. Both Rexxar and Misha have their own charges.

4.name: Animal Husbandry
4.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.
4.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 2 Maximum Health every second Rexxar remains alive. These bonuses are lost on Rexxar's death.

7.name: Crippling Talons
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's slow amount to 50% and its duration to 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Taking Flight
7.description: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Spirit Swoop's range by 20%. If Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, the Mana cost is refunded and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Aspect of the Beast
7.description: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Misha's Basic Attacks lower the cooldown of Misha, Charge! by 1 second.

10.name: Bestial Wrath
10.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 200% for 12 seconds.

10.name: Unleash the Boars
10.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.name: Aspect of the Hawk
13.description: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Spirit Swoop hits an enemy Hero, Rexxar gains 125% Attack Speed for 4 seconds. Misha's Basic Attacks increase the duration of this buff by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Dire Beast
13.description: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.
13.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha's Basic Attacks increase the damage of the next Misha, Charge! by 15%, stacking up to a 150% bonus.

13.name: Wildfire Bear
13.description: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Misha deals 28 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

16.name: Thrill of the Hunt
16.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks increase both his and Misha's Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Primal Intimidation
16.description: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of Heroes and Summons near Rexxar and Misha for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack Rexxar or Misha have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Feign Death
16.description: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.
16.longDescription: Rexxar fakes his death, becoming Invulnerable and untargetable for 5 seconds. During this time you control Misha.

20.name: Spirit Bond
20.description: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Bestial Wrath by 50% and Misha's Basic Attacks heal Rexxar for 50% of her damage dealt during Bestial Wrath.

20.name: Kill Command
20.description: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Unleash the Boars deals 50% more damage and roots for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy of Kalimdor
20.description: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rexxar's Basic Attacks deal 10% more damage, and Misha's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Hardened Skin
20.description: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: Rexxar and Misha gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

1.name: Thunderstroke
1.description: Increase the damage of Lightning Fury by 25.  Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.
1.longDescription: Increase the damage of Lightning Fury by 25.  Quest: Lightning Fury's damage is increased by 1.5 every time it hits a Hero.

1.name: Impale
1.description: Increase Fend's cast range and area of effect by 25%. It deals an additional 50% damage to enemies below 50% Health.
1.longDescription: Increase Fend's cast range and area of effect by 25%. It deals an additional 50% damage to enemies below 50% Health.

1.name: Charged Strikes
1.description: Gain 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 15% bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes.
1.longDescription: Gain 15% Attack Speed. Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 15% bonus damage and bounces to nearby enemy Heroes.

4.name: Plate of the Whale
4.description: Regenerate 6 (+4% per level) Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged, gain an additional 12 (+4% per level) Health per second.
4.longDescription: Regenerate 6 (+4% per level) Health per second while Avoidance is active. If fully charged, gain an additional 12 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.name: Ring of the Leech
4.description: Basic Attacks against your primary target heal for 15% of their damage. If an enemy is Blinded, this also affects Lightning Fury and Fend.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against your primary target heal for 15% of their damage. If an enemy is Blinded, this also affects Lightning Fury and Fend.

4.name: Inner Light
4.description: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health over 5 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of your maximum Health over 5 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit with Lightning Fury lower the cooldown of this ability by 10 seconds.

7.name: Grounding Rod
7.description: Enemies hit by Lightning Fury or Fend are Slowed by 20% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Lightning Fury or Fend are Slowed by 20% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Seraph's Hymn
7.description: Basic Attacks against your primary enemy Hero grant 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from 20% to 30%.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against your primary enemy Hero grant 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Blinding Light by 1.5 seconds.  Passive: Increase the passive damage bonus of Blinding Light from 20% to 30%.

7.name: Surge of Light
7.description: After taking 650 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.
7.longDescription: After taking 650 (+4% per level) damage with Avoidance active, Cassia can activate Avoidance to deal 240 (+4% per level) damage to enemies around her.

10.name: Ball Lightning
10.description: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.
10.longDescription: Throw a ball of lightning at an enemy Hero that bounces up to 6 times between nearby enemy Heroes and Cassia, dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.

10.name: Valkyrie
10.description: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.
10.longDescription: Summon a Valkyrie that rushes to Cassia after 0.75 seconds, pulling the first enemy Hero hit, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds at the end of her path. The Valkyrie knocks back all other enemy Heroes in her way.

13.name: War Matron
13.description: Cassia becomes Protected while Channeling Fend and for an additional 1 second if the Channel is completed.
13.longDescription: Cassia becomes Protected while Channeling Fend and for an additional 1 second if the Channel is completed.

13.name: War Traveler
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed and Mounting is instant.

13.name: Gloves of Alacrity
13.description: Gain 1 Basic Attack range. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 1 Basic Attack range.
13.longDescription: Gain 1 Basic Attack range. While Avoidance is fully charged, gain an additional 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Power Strike
16.description: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Enemy Heroes hit reduce its cooldown by 1 second and become marked for 15 seconds. Upon reaching 3 marks, remove them and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.
16.longDescription: Lightning Fury pierces but only splits on Heroes. Enemy Heroes hit reduce its cooldown by 1 second and become marked for 15 seconds. Upon reaching 3 marks, remove them and cast a Blinding Light at their feet.

16.name: Static Electricity
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Lightning Fury. Fend's impact launches a lightning bolt towards each nearby enemy Hero.

16.name: Martial Law
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Increase this to 3% if they are Stunned, Rooted or Slowed.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Increase this to 3% if they are Stunned, Rooted or Slowed.

20.name: Infinite Lightning
20.description: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ball Lightning can now bounce indefinitely. Every bounce reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds.

20.name: Imprisoning Light
20.description: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for 5 seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon impaling an enemy Hero, they are Blinded for 5 seconds and Cassia's Valkyrie creates a wave of light that deals 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. This wave Silences and Roots them for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titan's Revenge
20.description: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor and while Avoidance is fully charged, they deal an additional 20% bonus damage.
20.longDescription: Cassia's Basic Attacks now ignore Armor and while Avoidance is fully charged, they deal an additional 20% bonus damage.

20.name: Rockstopper
20.description: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to 60 for 4 seconds.   Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.
20.longDescription: Activate to fully charge Avoidance and increase its Armor value to 60 for 4 seconds.   Losing Avoidance removes this bonus.

1.name: Heavy Pack
1.description: Increases the duration of Snow Blind's Slow by 1.5 seconds. Each time Blizzard damages an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Snow Blind by 0.25 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increases the duration of Snow Blind's Slow by 1.5 seconds. Each time Blizzard damages an enemy Hero, reduce the cooldown of Snow Blind by 0.25 seconds.

1.name: Ice Storm
1.description: Every 3rd hit of Blizzard against enemy Heroes deals an additional 45 (+4% per level) damage. Blizzard's final Stun damage is increased by 125% against all enemies.
1.longDescription: Every 3rd hit of Blizzard against enemy Heroes deals an additional 45 (+4% per level) damage. Blizzard's final Stun damage is increased by 125% against all enemies.

1.name: Heat Transfer
1.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed Heroes deal 33% more damage. Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero she heals for 18 (+4% per level) Health.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed Heroes deal 33% more damage. Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero she heals for 18 (+4% per level) Health.

4.name: Slushball
4.description: Snow Blind deals 50% increased damage and Structures hit are disabled for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Snow Blind deals 50% increased damage and Structures hit are disabled for 3 seconds.

4.name: Cold Front
4.description: If Mei enters her own Blizzard while Icing is active, the cooldown of Icing is reduced by 8 seconds and she gains 70 Mana.
4.longDescription: If Mei enters her own Blizzard while Icing is active, the cooldown of Icing is reduced by 8 seconds and she gains 70 Mana.

4.name: Crystallize
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Cryo-Freeze by 10 seconds. Mei gains 40 Spell Armor while Cryo-Freeze is active and for 1 second after.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Cryo-Freeze by 10 seconds. Mei gains 40 Spell Armor while Cryo-Freeze is active and for 1 second after.

7.name: Induce Hibernation
7.description: Blizzard reduces the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside of its area by 40%.  When Blizzard ends, enemy Heroes still within its area gain this effect for an additional 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Blizzard reduces the damage dealt by enemy Heroes inside of its area by 40%.  When Blizzard ends, enemy Heroes still within its area gain this effect for an additional 4 seconds.

7.name: Skating Away
7.description: When Icing ends, Mei and all nearby allied Heroes gain 20% Movement Speed and 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Icing ends, Mei and all nearby allied Heroes gain 20% Movement Speed and 50 Physical Armor for 3 seconds.

7.name: Backup Battery
7.description: Activate to remove all Roots and Slows and regenerate 20% of maximum Health over 2 seconds. The cooldown of this ability is reduced by 10 seconds each time Mei picks up a Regeneration Globe.
7.longDescription: Activate to remove all Roots and Slows and regenerate 20% of maximum Health over 2 seconds. The cooldown of this ability is reduced by 10 seconds each time Mei picks up a Regeneration Globe.

10.name: Avalanche
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, roll a massive snowball that consumes enemy Heroes in its path. At the end of its path, the snowball crumbles, releasing the consumed Heroes, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds per Hero consumed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, roll a massive snowball that consumes enemy Heroes in its path. At the end of its path, the snowball crumbles, releasing the consumed Heroes, dealing 220 damage and stunning them for 0.5 per Hero consumed.

10.name: Ice Wall
10.description: Vector Targeting After a 0.75 second delay, create an impassable wall that traps enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. When the wall expires, trapped Heroes are Slowed by 75%, decaying over 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After a 0.75 second delay, create an impassible wall that traps enemy Heroes hit for 2.5 seconds. When the wall expires, trapped Heroes are slowed by 75% decaying over 3 seconds.

13.name: Flurry
13.description: While in her own Blizzard, Mei gains 50% increased Attack Speed and Blizzard's cooldown refreshes 100% faster. If Mei is in her own Blizzard when it ends, gain these bonuses for 3 additional seconds.
13.longDescription: While in her own Blizzard, Mei gains 50% increased Attack Speed and Blizzard's cooldown refreshes 100% faster. If Mei is in her own Blizzard when it ends, gain these bonuses for 3 additional seconds.

13.name: Cooling Servos
13.description: While Cryo-Freeze is active, Mei's Basic Ability cooldowns recover 200% faster.  Passive: Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: While Cryo-Freeze is active, Mei's Basic Ability cooldowns recover 200% faster.  Passive: Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Polar Vortex
13.description: Using an ability causes Mei to deal 24 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes damaged by this effect also have their Movement Speed and Attack Speed Slowed by 20%.
13.longDescription: Using an ability causes Mei to deal 24 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies for 4 seconds. Enemy Heroes damaged by this effect also have their Movement Speed and Attack Speed Slowed by 20%.

16.name: Fresh Powder
16.description: Snow Blind gains an additional charge and its range is increased by 33%.
16.longDescription: Snow Blind gains an additional charge and its range is increased by 33%.

16.name: Black Ice
16.description: Icing's Slow effect no longer decays over its duration. Icing deals 300% more damage to enemies very close to Mei.
16.longDescription: Icing's Slow effect no longer decays over its duration. Icing deals 300% more damage to enemies very close to Mei.

16.name: Acclimation
16.description: Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero, the damage she deals and healing she receives is increased by 1%, stacking up to 20 times. While at maximum stacks, Mei also gains 10 Armor. Lasts 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Each time Mei Stuns or Slows an enemy Hero, the damage she deals and healing she receives is increased by 1%, stacking up to 20 times. While at maximum stacks, Mei also gains 10 Armor. Lasts 8 seconds.

20.name: Cascade
20.description: While traveling, Avalanche constantly launches a volley of untalented Snow Blind snowballs ahead of itself.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Avalanche by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: While traveling, Avalanche constantly launches a volley of untalented Snow Blind snowballs ahead of itself.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Avalanche by 30 seconds.

20.name: Shatter
20.description: When Ice Wall expires, trapped enemy Heroes hit take 210 (+4% per level) damage and have their Armor reduced by 25 for 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: When Ice Wall expires, trapped enemy Heroes hit take 210 (+4% per level) damage and have their Armor reduced by 25 for 5 seconds.

20.name: The Big One
20.description: Every 15 seconds, the next Snow Blind you cast has 67% increased area and 200% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Every 15 seconds, the next Snow Blind you cast has 67% increased area and 200% increased damage.

20.name: Flash Freeze
20.description: When Mei takes fatal damage she instantly gains Cryo-Freeze. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: When Mei takes fatal damage she instantly gains Cryo-Freeze. This effect has a 180 second cooldown.

1.name: Veteran Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 1%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper is a Hero, permanently increase its damage bonus by 1%.

1.name: Ace in the Hole
1.description: Passive: Deal 10% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.  Enemy Heroes hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Passive: Deal 10% more damage to Stunned or Slowed Heroes.  Enemy Heroes hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper are Slowed by 10% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Exterminator
1.description: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 125% while Inspire is active.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 50% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. This is increased to 125% while Inspire is active.

4.name: Fight or Flight
4.description: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce Adrenaline Rush's cooldown by 10 seconds. Casting Adrenaline Rush grants 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Sustaining Rounds
4.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.
4.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper heals Raynor for 3% of his maximum Health, increased to 6% if the primary target is a Hero.

4.name: Behemoth Armor
4.description: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Gain 200 bonus maximum Health.   Quest: Every time Give 'Em Some Pepper's primary target is a Hero, gain an additional 5 maximum Health.

7.name: Fuel the Rush
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50.  While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Adrenaline Rush from 75 to 50.  While Inspire is active, increase Adrenaline Rush's cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks by 200%.

7.name: Unstable Compound
7.description: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round and Inspire by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Give 'Em Some Pepper by 15%. Each enemy Hero hit by Give 'Em Some Pepper grants Raynor 10 Mana and reduces the cooldown of Penetrating Round and Inspire by 1 second.

7.name: Heavy Slugs
7.description: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the distance of the next Penetrating Round by 30% and increase its Slow duration to 6 seconds.

10.name: Hyperion
10.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run for 12 seconds, hitting up to 4 enemies for 66 (+4% per level) damage every second. Every 4 seconds, it can fire its Yamato Cannon at a Structure, dealing 794 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Raynor's Raider
10.description: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Banshee that assists Raynor. The Banshee deals 84 (+4% per level) damage per second and regenerates 75 (+4% per level) Health per second if it hasn't taken damage in the last 4 seconds. Can reactivate to retarget or move the Banshee.  The Banshee respawns automatically after 45 seconds.

13.name: Debilitating Rounds
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from 65 to 45, and its cooldown by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.
13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Penetrating Round from 65 to 45, and its cooldown by 3 seconds. While Inspire is active, Penetrating Round's Slow is increased by 20%.

13.name: Rallying Cry
13.description: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.
13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Inspire by 1 second. Casting Inspire grants nearby allied Heroes 10% Movement and Attack Speed for its duration.

13.name: Giddy-Up
13.description: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Gain 8% Movement Speed while mounted and unmounted. Inspire grants 8% more Movement Speed.

16.name: Paint Them Red
16.description: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase the damage of Penetrating Round by 50% and heal for 90% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

16.name: Give Me More!
16.description: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.
16.longDescription: Increase Adrenaline Rush healing by 50%. While Inspire is active, gain 1 Basic Attack range.

16.name: Bounty Hunter
16.description: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.
16.longDescription: If Give 'Em Some Pepper's target is a Hero, it deals an additional 3% of their maximum Health as damage and grants Raynor 10 Armor for 3 seconds.  Activate Give 'Em Some Pepper to apply it to Raynor's next Basic Attack.

20.name: Indomitable Resolve
20.description: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Give 'Em Some Pepper lowers the cooldown of Hyperion by 5 seconds if the primary target is a Hero. Inspire grants Raynor Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Dusk Wing
20.description: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage, Health, and leash range of Raynor's Raider by 100%. When it dies, both Inspire and Adrenaline Rush are activated for free.

20.name: Weak Spot Acquired
20.description: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are the primary target of Give 'Em Some Pepper have their Armor reduced by 25 for 2 seconds.

20.name: Execute
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attack damage is increased by 25% against targets below 50% Health.

1.name: One-Two Punch
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Melee by 1 second and it gains an additional charge.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Melee by 1 second and it gains an additional charge.

1.name: Parting Gift
1.description: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 250 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets. Each Hero hit with these bombs grants 5% Pulse Bomb charge.
1.longDescription: Recall leaves behind 3 bombs that deal 250 (+4% per level) damage each to different targets. Each Hero hit with these bombs grants 5% Pulse Bomb charge.

1.name: Tracer Rounds
1.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 10%. Basic Attacks against Heroes reveal a small area around them for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 10%. Basic Attacks against Heroes reveal a small area around them for 3 seconds.

4.name: Leeching Rounds
4.description: Increase the healing from Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes by 5% for each Blink charge you currently have.
4.longDescription: Increase the healing from Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes by 5% for each Blink charge you currently have.

4.name: Pulse Generator
4.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero heals Tracer for 25% of her maximum Health over 1.5 seconds and refunds a charge of Blink.
4.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero heals Tracer for 25% of her maximum Health over 1.5 seconds and refunds a charge of Blink.

4.name: Is That a Health Pack?!
4.description: Passive: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.  Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cooldown of Healing Fountain by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Passive: Increases Regeneration Globe and Healing Fountain healing by 100%.  Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cooldown of Healing Fountain by 10 seconds.

7.name: Sleight of Hand
7.description: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.
7.longDescription: Reduces Reload time by 50%. This equals 20% more damage per second.

7.name: Focus Fire
7.description: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 84 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.
7.longDescription: If an entire ammo magazine is unloaded on an enemy, the last bullet will deal 84 (+4% per level) bonus damage.  This is equal to 35% of the total magazine.

7.name: Locked and Loaded
7.description: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.
7.longDescription: Reactivate Reload within the last 50% of its cast time to increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 40% for that magazine.

10.name: Sticky Bomb
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are Slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's radius by 50% and enemies hit are Slowed by 70% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Quantum Spike
10.description: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 6% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.
10.longDescription: Pulse Bomb deals an additional 6% of maximum Health as damage to Heroes.

10.name: Pulse Rounds
10.description: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.
10.longDescription: Increases Pulse Bomb's range and charge rate from Basic Attacks against Heroes by 100%.

13.name: Untouchable
13.description: Passive: After Blinking, gain 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 5%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.
13.longDescription: Passive: After Blinking, gain 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.  Quest: Takedowns increase Tracer's Basic Attack damage by 5%, up to 30%. These bonuses are lost on death.

13.name: Jumper
13.description: Passive: When Blink has no charges remaining, its cooldown refreshes 125% faster.  Casting Blink grants Tracer a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health for 3 seconds. This Shield stacks up to 3 times.
13.longDescription: Passive: When Blink has no charges remaining, its cooldown refreshes 125% faster.  Casting Blink grants Tracer a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health for 3 seconds. This Shield stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Telefrag
13.description: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Recall by 0.25 seconds.  When Tracer arrives at her Recall location, nearby enemies are knocked back and take 160 (+4% per level) damage.
13.longDescription: Passive: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Recall by 0.25 seconds.  When Tracer arrives at her Recall location, nearby enemies are knocked back and take 160 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Bullet Spray
16.description: Increases the radius of Melee by 30%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.
16.longDescription: Increases the radius of Melee by 30%, and causes it to damage all enemies in range.

16.name: Heavy Handed
16.description: Heroes hit by Melee have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Melee have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Ricochet
16.description: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 60% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.
16.longDescription: Tracer's Basic Attacks have a 60% chance to hit another nearby enemy, prioritizing Heroes.

20.name: Chrono Triggers
20.description: Casting Blink causes Basic Attacks to not consume ammo for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Casting Blink causes Basic Attacks to not consume ammo for 1 second.

20.name: Get Stuffed!
20.description: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge against Heroes from 12% to 24%. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knock the target away.
20.longDescription: Increases Melee's Pulse Bomb charge against Heroes from 12% to 24%. Hitting an enemy with Melee who is stuck with a Pulse Bomb causes the bomb to instantly explode and knock the target away.

20.name: Total Recall
20.description: Recall heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.
20.longDescription: Recall heals Tracer equal to the amount of Health she lost during that time.

20.name: Composition B
20.description: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.
20.longDescription: Successfully sticking a Pulse Bomb to an enemy Hero also drops another one at their feet that deals 50% damage and explodes slightly earlier.

1.name: Rejuvenation
1.description: Casting Regrowth on an ally also grants Malfurion its effect for 50% normal duration.
1.longDescription: Casting Regrowth on an ally also grants Malfurion its effect for 50% normal duration.

1.name: Celestial Alignment
1.description: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.
1.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's reveal duration by 3 seconds. Malfurion's Basic Attacks against Heroes revealed by Moonfire deal 75% more damage.

1.name: Shan'do's Clarity
1.description: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.
1.longDescription: Innervate's cooldown recharges 25% faster per ally affected by Regrowth.

4.name: Strangling Vines
4.description: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Enemy Heroes Rooted by Entangling Roots receive 40% less healing from all sources for 3 seconds.

4.name: Deep Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots grows 25% larger, and persist on the ground 40% longer.

4.name: Vengeful Roots
4.description: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.
4.longDescription: Entangling Roots spawns a Treant that deals 58 damage per second and lasts 10 seconds.  Repeatable Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Entangling Roots permanently increases the Treant's Basic Attack damage by 7.

7.name: Wild Growth
7.description: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Moonfire extends the duration of currently active Regrowths by 1 second.

7.name: Tenacious Roots
7.description: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Entangling Roots by 25%. When Malfurion is Stunned, the cooldown of Entangling Roots is instantly reset. This can only occur every 10 seconds.

7.name: Nature's Cure
7.description: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.
7.longDescription: Activate to remove all Stuns, Roots, and Slows from allies affected by Regrowth.

10.name: Tranquility
10.description: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.
10.longDescription: Heal nearby allied Heroes for 80 (+4% per level) Health per second for 8 seconds. Allies affected by Regrowth within Tranquility's area gain 10 Armor.

10.name: Twilight Dream
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 310 (+4% per level) damage in a large area around Malfurion, Silencing enemies making them unable to use Abilities for 3 seconds.

13.name: Nature's Swiftness
13.description: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.
13.longDescription: Malfurion gains 6% Movement Speed for every active Regrowth.

13.name: Hindering Moonfire
13.description: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Moonfire Slows Heroes hit by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Revitalize
13.description: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 80 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Innervate also grants Malfurion 80 Mana and causes his Basic Ability cooldowns to refresh 50% faster for 5 seconds.

16.name: Ysera's Gift
16.description: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.
16.longDescription: While Malfurion is above 75% Health, Regrowth's healing-over-time is increased by 60%.

16.name: Nature's Balance
16.description: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's area by 25% and Regrowth's duration by 3 seconds.

16.name: Moonlit Harmony
16.description: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.
16.longDescription: Increase Moonfire's heal by 15% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Serenity
20.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.
20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Moonfire reduces the cooldown of Tranquility by 3 seconds. Increase Tranquility's healing by 10% per ally affected by Regrowth.

20.name: Astral Communion
20.description: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to Channel for 1 second, and then instantly teleport and cast Twilight Dream at the targeted location.  Cooldown is shared with Twilight Dream.  Passive: Increase Twilight Dream's Silence duration to 4 seconds.

20.name: Lifebloom
20.description: Casting Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.
20.longDescription: Casting Regrowth instantly heals its target for 10% of their missing Health.

20.name: Lunar Shower
20.description: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.
20.longDescription: If Moonfire hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second and the next Moonfire within 6 seconds deals 20% more damage. This damage bonus stacks up to 60%.

1.name: Transcendence
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals the lowest nearby allied Hero for 104 (+4% per level) and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Iron Fists
1.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack deals 110% bonus damage and gives 25% increased Move Speed for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Insight
1.description: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 3rd Basic Attack restores 14 (+4% per level) Mana, grants a stack of Insight, and gives 25% increased Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds.  Reward: Upon getting 100 stacks of Insight, every 3rd attack also reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 1.75 seconds.

4.name: Spirit Ally
4.description: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.
4.longDescription: Place a Spirit Ally that heals allied Heroes in a large area around it for 2% of their maximum Health every second. Has 150 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Spirit Allies.

4.name: Earth Ally
4.description: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.
4.longDescription: Place an Earth Ally that grants nearby allied Heroes 50 Physical Armor against Heroic Basic Attacks, reducing damage taken by 50%. Has 400 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds.  Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Earth Allies.

4.name: Air Ally
4.description: Place an Air Ally that gives allied Heroes 15% Spell Power, grants vision, and reveals a large area around it. Has 200 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.
4.longDescription: Place an Air Ally that gives allied Heroes 15% Spell Power, grants vision, and reveals a large area around it. Has 200 (+4% per level) Health and lasts 10 seconds. Kharazim can Radiant Dash to Air Allies.

7.name: Blinding Speed
7.description: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.
7.longDescription: Decreases Radiant Dash's cooldown by 2 seconds and increases the maximum number of charges by 1.

7.name: Heavenly Zeal
7.description: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increases Breath of Heaven's Movement Speed bonus to 30%.  Radiant Dashing to an ally increases the healing they receive from Breath of Heaven by 50% for 3.5 seconds.

7.name: Blazing Fists
7.description: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Deadly Reach by 100%.  Every 3rd Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Deadly Reach by 0.75 seconds.

10.name: Divine Palm
10.description: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Protect an allied Hero from death, causing them to be healed for 1200 (+4% per level) if they take fatal damage in the next 3 seconds.

10.name: Seven-Sided Strike
10.description: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.
10.longDescription: Become Invulnerable and strike 7 times over 2 seconds. Each strike hits the highest Health nearby Hero for 7% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Quicksilver
13.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally gives Kharazim and the target 30% bonus Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.
13.longDescription: While Stunned or Rooted, gain 75 Physical Armor against Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Cleansing Touch
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an ally makes them Unstoppable for 1 second.

16.name: Way of the Hundred Fists
16.description: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.
16.longDescription: Radiant Dashing to an enemy launches a rapid volley of 6 Basic Attacks dealing 45% damage each.

16.name: Echo of Heaven
16.description: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.
16.longDescription: Breath of Heaven heals 75% of its normal amount, but heals a second time 3 seconds later.

20.name: Peaceful Repose
20.description: Divine Palm's healing amount is increased by 75% and its cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.
20.longDescription: Divine Palm's healing amount is increased by 75% and its cooldown is set to 5 seconds if the Hero does not die.

20.name: Transgression
20.description: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.
20.longDescription: Seven-Sided Strike hits 4 additional times.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Epiphany
20.description: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.
20.longDescription: Activate to restore 33% of Kharazim's maximum Mana and refill 2 charges of Radiant Dash.

1.name: Sulfuras Hungers
1.description: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Empower Sulfuras kills a Minion, its damage is increased by 1, up to 30.  Reward: After killing 30 Minions, increase its damage by an additional 90.

1.name: Shifting Meteor
1.description: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it.  Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.
1.longDescription: Each time an enemy is hit by the same Living Meteor, they take 5% increased damage from it.  Quest: Hit 75 Heroes with Living Meteor.  Reward: After hitting 75 Heroes with Living Meteor, its duration is increased to 2.25 seconds, and it can be reactivated to change its direction once per use.

1.name: Engulfing Flame
1.description: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.
1.longDescription: Increase Blast Wave's damage by 75% and its radius by 15%.

4.name: Fire Ward
