4.description: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: When Living Meteor hits an enemy Hero, gain a charge of Spell Armor, reducing damage from the next enemy ability by 50%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

4.name: Slow Burn
4.description: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Blast Wave slows enemies hit by 40% for 2 seconds.

4.name: Catching Fire
4.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Ragnaros' Health Regeneration by 1.25 per second, up to 18.75.  Reward: After gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, activate Catching Fire to gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

7.name: Hand of Ragnaros
7.description: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: If Empower Sulfuras hits at least 2 enemy Heroes, it restores 10 Mana and its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Molten Power
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Living Meteor increases the damage of the next Living Meteor by 20%, up to a maximum of 100%.

7.name: Blistering Attacks
7.description: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Every 10 seconds, Ragnaros's next Basic Attack against a Hero deals 60% bonus damage. Hitting enemies with Basic Abilities reduces this cooldown by 1 second.

10.name: Sulfuras Smash
10.description: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Hurl Sulfuras at the target area, landing after 0.75 seconds, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies in the center take 594 (+4% per level) damage instead and are Stunned for 0.5 seconds.

10.name: Lava Wave
10.description: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.
10.longDescription: Release a wave of lava from Ragnaros's Core that travels down the targeted lane, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage per second to non-Structure enemies in its path and instantly killing enemy Minions. Damage increased by 100% versus Heroes.

13.name: Cauterize Wounds
13.description: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras heals for an additional 40% of damage dealt to Heroes over 2 seconds.

13.name: Tempered Flame
13.description: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Blast Wave damages an enemy Hero, gain a Shield equal to 100% of the damage dealt for 3 seconds.

13.name: Resilient Flame
13.description: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
13.longDescription: When Ragnaros is Stunned, he gains 40 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 40%.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

16.name: Giant Scorcher
16.description: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: Empower Sulfuras burns enemy Heroes for 9% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds. This additional damage does not heal Ragnaros.

16.name: Meteor Bomb
16.description: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Living Meteor explodes at the end of its path, dealing 220 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Blast Echo
16.description: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.
16.longDescription: After Blast Wave explodes, another Blast Wave is created on Ragnaros.

20.name: Flames of Sulfuron
20.description: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Sulfuras Smash Slows enemies by 50% for 2.5 seconds, and the Stun duration of enemies hit in the center is increased by 1 second.

20.name: Lava Surge
20.description: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lava Wave gains an additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Heroic Difficulty
20.description: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.
20.longDescription: Molten Core has 25% increased Health and Damage, and its cooldown is reduced by 50 seconds.

20.name: Submerge
20.description: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Ragnaros submerges below, entering Stasis and healing for 600 (+4% per level) Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Fish Eye
1.description: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Egg's Health is increased by 100%, its sight radius is increased by 300% and it can see Stealthed enemies.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg increases Murky's mount speed to 45% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Egg Hunt
1.description: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to place a fake Egg. If the fake Egg dies, it casts an untalented Slime. Maximum 3 fake Eggs.  Passive: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky Stealth for 5 seconds.

1.name: A Fishy Deal
1.description: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.
1.longDescription: Killing a Minion with Pufferfish grants a stack of Bribe. Use 8 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 32 stacks of Bribe.

4.name: Slime Time
4.description: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Slime enemy Heroes that are already Slimed.  Reward: After Sliming 10 Heroes, increase Slime's bonus damage by 125.  Reward: After Sliming 20 Heroes, increase Slime's slow amount to 30%.

4.name: Tufferfish
4.description: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.
4.longDescription: Pufferfish gains 50 Spell Armor and deals 50% more damage to Slimed targets.

4.name: Living the Dream
4.description: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.
4.longDescription: Quest: Every 15 seconds Murky is alive, he gains 5% Spell Power, up to 25%. This bonus is reset upon his death.

7.name: Black Lagoon
7.description: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.
7.longDescription: Increase Slime's radius by 30%.

7.name: Slippery When Wet
7.description: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Gain 50% Movement Speed and move through units while in Safety Bubble. Additionally, Safety Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

7.name: Time to Krill
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal an additional 7 (+4% per level) damage a second and slow the target by 7% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 5 times.

10.name: March of the Murlocs
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, Murky commands a legion of Murlocs to march in a target direction, each one leaping onto the first enemy Hero or Structure they find. Each Murloc deals 125 (+4% per level) damage and slows its target by 15% for 5 seconds. Murlocs deal 50% damage to Structures.

10.name: Octo-Grab
10.description: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.
10.longDescription: Murky becomes Unstoppable and Stuns target enemy Hero for 3 seconds while he hits them for 1 damage a second.

13.name: Rejuvenating Bubble
13.description: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Safety Bubble restores 40% of Murky's maximum Health.

13.name: Egg Shell
13.description: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.
13.longDescription: Spawning from his Egg grants Murky a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Health. The shield lasts indefinitely.

13.name: Fish Tank
13.description: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.
13.longDescription: Murky is healed for 25% of the damage he deals with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities.

16.name: Toxic Buildup
16.description: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd consecutive Basic Attack against an enemy Hero causes a free Slime to be cast upon them.

16.name: Fish Oil
16.description: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.
16.longDescription: The Pufferfish casts Slime at its location upon landing.

16.name: Wrath of Cod
16.description: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Heroes hit by Pufferfish take additional damage equal to 15% of their maximum Health over 5 seconds.

20.name: Never-Ending Murlocs
20.description: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.
20.longDescription: March of the Murlocs can be channeled, sending little Murlocs indefinitely.

20.name: ... And a Shark Too!
20.description: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).
20.longDescription: Increase the damage of Octo-Grab by 13700% (+4% per level).

20.name: Big Tuna Kahuna
20.description: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.
20.longDescription: Murky's maximum Health and Egg respawn time are doubled.

20.name: Making Inky
20.description: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Slime from 4 seconds to 2 seconds.

1.name: Static Charge
1.description: Quest: Heroes hit by Shock Ray permanently increases its damage by 5 and grants 33% Resonance Beam charge.  Maximum of 200 bonus damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Heroes hit by Shock Ray permanently increases its damage by 5 and grants 33% Resonance Beam charge.  Maximum of 200 bonus damage.

1.name: Psi-Infusion
1.description: Increases the range of Psionic Storm by 33%. Each non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm restores 0.5 Mana, increased to 5 against Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Psionic Storm by 33%. Each non-Structure enemy hit by Psionic Storm restores 0.5 Mana, increased to 5 against Heroes.

1.name: Khaydarin Amulet
1.description: Quest: Resonance Beam charges 50% faster.  Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 80 seconds, it bounces to hit 1 additional target for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.  Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 160 seconds, it bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.
1.longDescription: Quest: Resonance Beam charges 50% faster.  Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 80 seconds, it bounces to hit 1 additional target for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.  Reward: After Resonance Beam has been fully charged for 160 seconds, it bounces to hit 2 additional targets for 75% damage, prioritizing Heroes.

4.name: Induction
4.description: Casting Shock Ray grants Tassadar 20% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, increase this speed bonus to 30%.
4.longDescription: Casting Shock Ray grants Tassadar 20% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If an enemy Hero is hit, increase this speed bonus to 30%.

4.name: Electric Fence
4.description: Force Wall deals 92 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies and Slows them by 35%.
4.longDescription: Force Wall deals 92 (+4% per level) damage a second to nearby enemies and Slows them by 35%.

4.name: Plasma Shield
4.description: While Resonance Beam is fully charged, gain a Shield equal to 3% of max Health every second, stacking up to 15%.
4.longDescription: While Resonance Beam is fully charged, gain a Shield equal to 3% of max Health every second, stacking up to 15%.

7.name: Beam Alignment
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Shock Ray from 55 to 45.  While Resonance Beam is fully charged, Shock Ray's cooldown refreshes 100% faster.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Shock Ray from 55 to 45.  While Resonance Beam is fully charged, Shock Ray's cooldown refreshes 100% faster.

7.name: Psionic Echo
7.description: Casting Psionic Storm causes your next Shock Ray within 3 seconds to only cost 30 Mana and create a Psionic Storm on the first enemy Hero hit.
7.longDescription: Casting Psionic Storm causes your next Shock Ray within 3 seconds to only cost 30 Mana and create a Psionic Storm on the first enemy Hero hit.

7.name: Arc Discharge
7.description: When Resonance Beam is fully charged, Tassadar's Basic Attack range is increased by 1 and its next instance of damage also creates a Psionic Storm on the target.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown that decays twice as fast while Resonance Beam is fully charged.
7.longDescription: When Resonance Beam is fully charged, Tassadar's Basic Attack range is increased by 1 and its next instance of damage also creates a Psionic Storm on the target.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown that decays twice as fast while Resonance Beam is fully charged.

10.name: Archon
10.description: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 25% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.  Resonance Beam: Deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the target and splashes 70 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.
10.longDescription: Tassadar transforms into an Archon, gaining a Shield equal to 25% of his maximum Health and empowering Resonance Beam. Lasts for 12 seconds.  Resonance Beam: Deals 140 (+4% per level) damage to the target and splashes 70 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Heroes hit have their Spell Armor reduced by 20 for 2 seconds. Resonance Beam is fully charged while Archon is active.

10.name: Black Hole
10.description: After a 0.5 second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns the target for 1.25 seconds.
10.longDescription: After a 0.5 second cast, create a Black Hole that travels in a long line. Enemy Heroes within the Black Hole's area are quickly pulled towards its center. Touching the center deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Stuns the target for 1.25 seconds.

13.name: Feedback
13.description: When an enemy Hero is affected by Psionic Storm, Resonance Beam's Slow is increased to 50% and it reduces Physical Armor by 25.
13.longDescription: When an enemy Hero is affected by Psionic Storm, Resonance Beam's Slow is increased to 50% and it reduces Physical Armor by 25.

13.name: Shadow Walk
13.description: Tassadar becomes Stealthed and Unrevealable, but cannot attack or use Abilities for 1.5 seconds. While this effect is active, gain 40% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor.  Can be cast while Channeling Shock Ray.
13.longDescription: Tassadar becomes Stealthed and Unrevealable, but cannot attack or use Abilities for 1.5 seconds. While this effect is active, gain 40% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor.  Can be cast while Channeling Shock Ray.

13.name: Oracle
13.description: Passive: While stationary, gain 30 Spell Armor for 0.75 seconds and restore 12 (+4% per level) Health a second.  Activate to Channel for up to 4 seconds, revealing a gradually increasing area anywhere on the map.
13.longDescription: Passive: While stationary, gain 30 Spell Armor for 0.75 seconds and restore 12 (+4% per level) Health a second.  Activate to Channel for up to 4 seconds, revealing a gradually increasing area anywhere on the map.

16.name: Thermal Lance
16.description: Shock Ray deals an additional 8% of maximum Health as damage to the first Hero it hits.
16.longDescription: Shock Ray deals an additional 8% of maximum Health as damage to the first Hero it hits.

16.name: Psychic Shock
16.description: Psionic Storm deals damage 25% faster.
16.longDescription: Psionic Storm deals damage 25% faster.

16.name: Executor's Will
16.description: Activate to gain full Resonance Beam charge, 20% Spell Power, and cause Basic and Heroic Ability cooldowns to regenerate 25% faster. This effect lasts as long as Resonance Beam remains at full charge.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain full Resonance Beam charge, 20% Spell Power, and cause Basic and Heroic Ability cooldowns to regenerate 25% faster. This effect lasts as long as Resonance Beam remains at full charge.

20.name: Twilight Archon
20.description: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Archon form increase its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Kugelblitz
20.description: Each Hero hit by Black Hole's center creates a Psionic Storm at their location.
20.longDescription: Each Hero hit by Black Hole's center creates a Psionic Storm at their location.

20.name: Force Barrier
20.description: Increase the duration of Force Wall by 0.5 seconds, its range by 50%, and reduce its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Force Wall by 0.5 seconds, its range by 50%, and reduce its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Khala's Gift
20.description: Gain 4% Spell Power for yourself and each nearby ally Hero, up to 20% total Spell Power. Your total bonus is shared with all contributing allies.
20.longDescription: Gain 4% Spell Power for yourself and each nearby ally Hero, up to 20% total Spell Power. Your total bonus is shared with all contributing allies.

1.name: Pity the Frail
1.description: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by 1.5 seconds. Allies below 30% Health receive 25% more healing from Whitemane.
1.longDescription: For every Hero hit with Searing Lash, lower the cooldown of Inquisition by 1.5 seconds. Allies below 30% Health receive 25% more healing from Whitemane.

1.name: Righteous Flame
1.description: Searing Lash deals 25% more damage to enemies. If the second strike hits an enemy Hero, they take an additional 25% damage and Whitemane gains 25% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Searing Lash deals 25% more damage to enemies. If the second strike hits an enemy Hero, they take an additional 25% damage and Whitemane gains 25% Attack Speed for 4 seconds.

1.name: Inquisitor's Prayer
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Searing Lash.  Reward: Each Hero hit grants 3 permanent Health and 2 permanent Mana. Heroes hit with the second strike count as 2 hits.

4.name: Unwavering Faith
4.description: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 15% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.
4.longDescription: Increase Whitemane's Basic Attack range by 1.1. Whitemane gains 15% increased Basic Attack damage for each active Zeal buff.

4.name: Martyrdom
4.description: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 30%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.
4.longDescription: Desperate Plea's healing is increased by 30%. Increase this by an additional 10% for each active Zeal.

4.name: Indulgence
4.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.
4.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Increase this by an additional 5% for each active Zeal.

7.name: Zealous Spirit
7.description: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.
7.longDescription: Upon reaching 2 stacks of Desperation, Whitemane gains Zeal.

7.name: Saintly Greatstaff
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 55 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Searing Lash are marked for 3 seconds. Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 55 (+4% per level) Spell damage and remove the mark.

7.name: Intercession
7.description: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.
7.longDescription: Activate to make an ally Unstoppable for 1 second and gain 1 stack of Desperation.

10.name: Scarlet Aegis
10.description: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Bolster the spirits of nearby allied Heroes, healing them for 250 (+4% per level) and granting them 40 Armor for 4 seconds.

10.name: Divine Reckoning
10.description: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, consecrate an area for 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies inside. 25% of the damage dealt to Heroes is returned as Mana.

13.name: Subjugation
13.description: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.
13.longDescription: Inquisition reduces all damage the target deals by 50%.

13.name: Lashing Out
13.description: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.
13.longDescription: If Searing Lash's second strike hits an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown to 1 second.

13.name: Scarlet Wrath
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active Zeals by 0.5 seconds and lower the cooldown of Zeals activation by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the duration of all active Zeals by 0.5 seconds and lower the cooldown of Zeals activation by 1 second.

16.name: Radiance
16.description: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level). Activating Zeal while at 3 stacks of Desperation now increases Armor by 10 instead of reducing it.
16.longDescription: Upon reaching 3 stacks of Desperation, all allies with Zeal are healed for 175 (+4% per level). Activating Zeal while at 3 stacks of Desperation now increases Armor by 10 instead of reducing it.

16.name: Shared Punishment
16.description: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.
16.longDescription: Upon casting, Inquisition can chain to an additional enemy Hero near its target, dealing 35 (+4% per level) damage every 0.5 seconds. Affected enemies lose 10 Armor.

16.name: Harsh Discipline
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Searing Lash while they are being targeted by Inquisition Roots them for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Scarlet Crusade
20.description: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Scarlet Aegis heals for 50% more and makes affected allies Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

20.name: Judgement Day
20.description: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.
20.longDescription: Divine Reckoning deals 50% more damage and pulls enemies to its center the first time it hits them.

20.name: Guiding Light
20.description: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.
20.longDescription: Activate to cast a permanent Zeal on an allied Hero that costs no Mana and doesn't grant Desperation. Only one can be active at a time and has global cast range.

20.name: Purge the Wicked
20.description: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to blast an enemy Hero with holy fire, reducing their Armor by 25 and dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds.

1.name: Siphoning Impact
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants 90 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields.

1.name: Assimilation Mastery
1.description: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globe healing grants 45 (+4% per level) points of Assimilation Shields per second while active. While Assimilation is active, Kerrigan's Health and Mana regeneration is increased by 150%.

1.name: Fury of the Swarm
1.description: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.
1.longDescription: Gain 10% more Assimilation Shields from Basic Attacks. After casting Ravage, Kerrigan's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds splashes for 100% damage around the target.

4.name: Sharpened Blades
4.description: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.
4.longDescription: Quest: Minions and Heroes that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Ravage increase its damage up to a maximum of 75.  Minions grant 1 increased damage and Heroes grant 5 increased damage.  Reward: After reaching a 75 damage increase, Ravage gains 50 additional damage.

4.name: Kinetic Fulmination
4.description: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.
4.longDescription: Damaging an enemy increases the damage of Kerrigan's next Impaling Blades within 10 seconds by 10%, up to 100%.

4.name: Psionic Pulse
4.description: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.
4.longDescription: Primal Grasp explodes a second time 2.5 seconds after its first explosion.

7.name: Queen of Blades
7.description: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Damaging a Hero with Primal Grasp reduces Ravage's cooldown by 6 seconds.

7.name: Boundless Fury
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Ravage grants a charge of Ravage. Can only occur once every 10 seconds per Hero.

7.name: Bladed Momentum
7.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Kerrigan's Basic Abilities by 0.6 seconds.

10.name: Maelstrom
10.description: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 74 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Lasts for 7 seconds.

10.name: Summon Ultralisk
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon an Ultralisk that rushes forward upon spawning, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  The Ultralisk's Basic Attacks deal 50% of their damage in an area around their target. Reactivate to retarget the Ultralisk.

13.name: Psionic Barrier
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor and 4% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20% Movement Speed.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Primal Grasp grants 20 Spell Armor and 4% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, stacking up to 20% Movement Speed.

13.name: Volatile Power
13.description: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the amount of Assimilation Shields granted from damage dealt by 10%, but reduce duration of Assimilation by 3 seconds.

13.name: Chrysalis
13.description: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Kerrigan in a Chrysalis with 750 (+4% per level) Health for 5 seconds. While inside, Kerrigan regenerates 5% of her maximum Health per second.  Enemies can destroy the Chrysalis to end its effects early.

16.name: Mounting Potency
16.description: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
16.longDescription: Ravage grants 5% Spell Power for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

16.name: Painful Spikes
16.description: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemies hit by Impaling Blades take an additional 70 (+4% per level) damage the next 6 times Kerrigan damages them within 5 seconds.

16.name: Unbridled Energy
16.description: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Damaging a Hero with a Heroic Ability grants 35% Spell Power for 4 seconds.

20.name: Omegastorm
20.description: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.
20.longDescription: Maelstrom's duration is increased by 0.25 seconds every time it damages a Hero.

20.name: Torrasque
20.description: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.
20.longDescription: The Ultralisk morphs into an egg when it dies. If the egg isn't killed within 4 seconds, a new Ultralisk is born.

20.name: Assimilation Blades
20.description: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Damaging an enemy increases Basic Attack damage by 2% for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

20.name: Psionic Shift
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Generates 300% increased Assimilation Shields from the damage dealt.

1.name: Perfect Storm
1.description: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Storm Bolt hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5.

1.name: Dwarf Block
1.description: Casting Dwarf Toss grants 4 charges of Block.  Each Block charge grants 75 Physical Armor against a single enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. These Block charges last for 10 seconds.
1.longDescription: Casting Dwarf Toss grants 4 charges of Block.  Each Block charge grants 75 Physical Armor against a single enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. These Block charges last for 10 seconds.

1.name: Third Wind
1.description: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.
1.longDescription: Increases Health Restoration rate to 90 (+4% per level) per second, and raises Health threshold to 60% Health for improved 180 (+4% per level) per second Restoration.

4.name: Sledgehammer
4.description: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of his baseline quest.
4.longDescription: Stormbolt deals 350% damage to non-Heroic enemies. Hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of his baseline quest.

4.name: Reverberation
4.description: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from 30% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.
4.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed Slow of Thunder Clap from 30% to 50% and the duration from 2.5 seconds to 3.5 seconds. Each enemy Hero hit reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 5%.

4.name: Thunder Burn
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% damage.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Thunder Clap triggers a second explosion 2 seconds later in the same location that deals 50% damage.

7.name: Heavy Impact
7.description: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemies hit by Dwarf Toss are Slowed by 80% for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Give 'em the Axe!
7.description: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increases Muradin's Basic Attack damage by 50% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Skullcracker
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same enemy deals 90% bonus damage and Stuns them for 0.25 seconds.

10.name: Avatar
10.description: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 1053 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Haymaker
10.description: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.
10.longDescription: Stun target enemy Hero, and wind up a punch dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking the target back, hitting enemies in the way for 319 (+4% per level) damage and knocking them aside.

13.name: Healing Static
13.description: Muradin heals for 5% of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.
13.longDescription: Muradin heals for 5% of his maximum Health for each Hero hit by Thunder Clap.

13.name: Thunder Strike
13.description: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.  Passive: Increase the duration of Dwarf Toss's Armor by 2 seconds.

13.name: Bronzebeard Rage
13.description: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Deal 20 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies and heal for 75% of the damage dealt this way. Basic Attacks against a Hero that is Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed increase this damage by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Dwarf Launch
16.description: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Dwarf Toss by 40%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Dwarf Toss reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Stoneform
16.description: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.
16.longDescription: Activate to heal Muradin for 30% of his maximum Health over 10 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.

20.name: Unstoppable Force
20.description: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: While active, Avatar grants 20 Armor and causes Muradin's Basic Attacks to reduce the cooldowns of Thunder Clap and Dwarf Toss by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Grand Slam
20.description: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.
20.longDescription: Haymaker gains a 2nd charge and its damage is increased by 25%. If a Hero dies within 3 seconds of being hit by Haymaker, instantly gain 1 charge.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

1.name: Backlash
1.description: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.
1.longDescription: When Bone Armor expires, nearby enemy Heroes take damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health.

1.name: Shackler
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, nearby enemies are Slowed by 35% for 1 second. Basic Attacks against Heroes that are Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor by 2 seconds.

1.name: Shade
1.description: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Bone Armor is active, Xul evades all Basic Attacks, but increases the cooldown of Bone Armor by 10 seconds.

4.name: Reaper's Toll
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 2 seconds and its Mana cost by 15.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Spectral Scythe by 2 seconds and its Mana cost by 15.

4.name: Grim Scythe
4.description: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by 15%.  Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Xul's Basic Attack damage by 15%.  Each enemy hit by Cursed Strikes reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 12 seconds.

4.name: Jailors
4.description: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Bone Prison spawns 2 Skeletal Warriors.  These do not count towards Xul's Raise Skeleton maximum.  Quest: Spawn 80 Skeletal Warriors.  Reward: While fixating on an enemy, Skeletal Warriors gain 25% Movement and Attack Speed.

7.name: Harvest Vitality
7.description: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.
7.longDescription: Cursed Strikes heals for 70% of the damage dealt to Heroes.

7.name: Trag'Oul's Essence
7.description: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.
7.longDescription: Every time a Skeletal Warrior attacks an enemy, restore 0.5% of Xul's maximum Health and 0.2% of his maximum Mana.

7.name: Wall Of Bones
7.description: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.
7.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount of Bone Armor to 35% of Xul's maximum Health, and Xul gains 20 Spell Armor for its duration.

10.name: Poison Nova
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, release poisonous missiles that deal 630 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies hit over 10 seconds.

10.name: Skeletal Mages
10.description: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Summon 4 Frost Mages in a line that attack nearby enemies for 47 (+4% per level) damage a second and Slow them by 30% for 2 seconds. Last up to 15 seconds.

13.name: Echoes of Death
13.description: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.
13.longDescription: Spectral Scythe spawns 2 additional scythes next to the first after 1.5 seconds, dealing 40% damage.

13.name: Rapid Harvest
13.description: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Attack Speed for 3 seconds each time Cursed Strikes hits an enemy, up to 75%.

13.name: Amplify Damage
13.description: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by 0.25 seconds.  Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Bone Prison by 0.25 seconds.  Enemies Rooted by Bone Prison lose 25 Armor for 2 seconds.

16.name: Decrepify
16.description: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that are damaged by Spectral Scythe or Skeletal Warriors are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Weaken
16.description: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are damaged by Cursed Strikes or Skeletal Warriors deal 35% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Bone Spear
16.description: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.
16.longDescription: Deal 230 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.

20.name: Andariel's Visage
20.description: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.
20.longDescription: Poison Nova heals for 50% of the damage dealt and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Cold Hand of Death
20.description: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.   Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Frost Mages by 20%.   Every 5th Spectral Scythe that hits enemy Heroes spawns a Frost Mage instead of a Skeletal Warrior at their location.

20.name: Mortal Wound
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Spectral Scythe receive 75% less healing for 4 seconds.

20.name: Kalan's Edict
20.description: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.
20.longDescription: Each time Skeletal Warriors deal damage, reduce the cooldown of Bone Armor and Xul's Heroic Ability by 1.5%.

1.name: Dragon Soul
1.description: Destroyer: Incinerate heals Deathwing for 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.  World Breaker: Lava Burst's explosion damage heals Deathwing for 150% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.
1.longDescription: Destroyer: Incinerate heals Deathwing for 75% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.  World Breaker: Lava Burst's explosion damage heals Deathwing for 150% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes.

1.name: Molten Blood
1.description: While Deathwing has 3 or more Armor Plates, he heals for 0.6% of his maximum Health per second.
1.longDescription: While Deathwing has 3 or more Armor Plates, he heals for 0.6% of his maximum Health per second.

1.name: Draconic Might
1.description: Deathwing's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes heal him for 25% of the damage dealt. Upon losing an Armor Plate, Deathwing becomes Protected for 0.75 seconds.
1.longDescription: Deathwing's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes heal him for 25% of the damage dealt. Upon losing an Armor Plate, Deathwing becomes Protected for 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Infernus
4.description: When Molten Flame is cast at 75% Energy or higher, its damage is increased by 75% against Heroes.
4.longDescription: When Molten Flame is cast at 75% Energy or higher, its damage is increased by 75% against Heroes.

4.name: Heat Wave
4.description: Destroyer: After hitting an enemy Hero with Incinerate, Deathwing deals 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to all nearby enemies for the next 8 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  World Breaker: Increase the explosion damage of Lava Burst by 125%.
4.longDescription: Destroyer: After hitting an enemy Hero with Incinerate, Deathwing deals 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to all nearby enemies for the next 8 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  World Breaker: Increase the explosion damage of Lava Burst by 125%.

4.name: Dragon's Ire
4.description: While Deathwing has 3 or fewer Armor Plates, his damage is increased by 25%.
4.longDescription: While Deathwing has 3 or fewer Armor Plates, his damage is increased by 25%.

7.name: Firestorm
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Deathwing's landing Abilities by 2 seconds.  When Deathwing lands, he drops 7 meteors near the landing area, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Heroes hit by the meteors reduce Dragonflight's cooldown by 25 seconds.  Meteors prioritize landing on Heroes, otherwise they fall randomly in the area.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Deathwing's landing Abilities by 2 seconds.  When Deathwing lands, he drops 7 meteors near the landing area, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit. Heroes hit by the meteors reduce Dragonflight's cooldown by 25 seconds.  Meteors prioritize landing on Heroes, otherwise they fall randomly in the area.

7.name: Death Drop
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 6 seconds and Deathwing's Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage reduces their Spell Armor by 15 for 6 seconds and Deathwing's Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Skyfall
7.description: After using Dragonflight, Deathwing can drop meteors anywhere within vision dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area. Has 3 charges.  If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for 3% of his maximum Health.
7.longDescription: After using Dragonflight, Deathwing can drop meteors anywhere within vision dealing 58 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area. Has 3 charges.  If a Hero is hit, Deathwing heals for 3% of his maximum Health.

10.name: Burn Beneath My Shadow
10.description: When an enemy Fort or Keep is destroyed the cooldown of Cataclysm is reset. Cataclysm's periodic damage is increased by 80%.
10.longDescription: When an enemy Fort or Keep is destroyed the cooldown of Cataclysm is reset. Cataclysm's periodic damage is increased by 80%.

10.name: Bellowing Roar
10.description: After 1 second, Deathwing unleashes a mighty roar, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Heroes and causing them to run in Fear for 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Deathwing unleashes a mighty roar, dealing 25 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Heroes and causing them to run in Fear for 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Wicked Inferno
13.description: Molten Flame's Energy cost per second is reduced by 10.  After using Molten Flame, Deathwing gains 15 Energy over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Molten Flame's Energy cost per second is reduced by 10.  After using Molten Flame, Deathwing gains 15 Energy over 3 seconds.

13.name: Ruination
13.description: Destroyer: The bite from Onslaught now Slows by 60% for 1.5 seconds.  World Breaker: Reduce Earth Shatter's cooldown by 6 seconds and its Energy cost by 10.
13.longDescription: Destroyer: The bite from Onslaught now Slows by 60% for 1.5 seconds.  World Breaker: Reduce Earth Shatter's cooldown by 6 seconds and its Energy cost by 10.

13.name: Fire and Fury
13.description: Basic Attacks against Rooted, Slowed, or Stunned enemy Heroes deal 30% additional damage and reduce the cooldowns of Deathwing's Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Rooted, Slowed, or Stunned enemy Heroes deal 30% additional damage and reduce the cooldowns of Deathwing's Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Conflagration
16.description: Dealing 320 (+4% per level) damage with Molten Flame to enemy Heroes within 4 seconds causes them to burn for an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. While burning, they explode every 1 second, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Dealing 320 (+4% per level) damage with Molten Flame to enemy Heroes within 4 seconds causes them to burn for an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. While burning, they explode every 1 second, dealing 80 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

16.name: Gaze Onto Destruction
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing causes their damage to be reduced by 75% and Slows them by 40% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Destroyer or World Breaker's landing causes their damage to be reduced by 75% and Slows them by 40% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Elementium Plating
16.description: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 30% of Deathwing's missing Health for 8 seconds. While the Shield holds, Deathwing regenerates 2% of his maximum Health per second.  When the Shield expires or is destroyed, Deathwing regains Armor Plates appropriate for his new Health.  The Shield and effect end immediately if Deathwing uses Dragonflight.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield equal to 30% of Deathwing's missing Health for 8 seconds. While the Shield holds, Deathwing regenerates 2% of his maximum Health per second.  When the Shield expires or is destroyed, Deathwing regains Armor Plates appropriate for his new Health.  The Shield and effect end immediately if Deathwing uses Dragonflight.

20.name: Stood in the Fire
20.description: Enemy Heroes are Slowed by 40% while standing in scorched ground, and its duration is increased by 50%.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes are Slowed by 40% while standing in scorched ground, and its duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Arrival of a God
20.description: Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage is increased by 400%.  Deathwing also gains the benefits of all of his level 7 talents.
20.longDescription: Destroyer or World Breaker's landing damage is increased by 400%.  Deathwing also gains the benefits of all of his level 7 talents.

20.name: Destroyer's Rampage
20.description: For the next 6 seconds after landing in Destroyer form, Deathwing's damage is increased by 40% and his Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Damaging Heroes refreshes this effect and switching to World Breaker form removes the effect.
20.longDescription: For the next 6 seconds after landing in Destroyer form, Deathwing's damage is increased by 40% and his Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 50% faster.  Damaging Heroes refreshes this effect and switching to World Breaker form removes the effect.

1.name: Advanced Targeting
1.description: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting enemy Heroes with Plasma Cutter permanently increases Fenix's Basic Attack damage by 0.5, up to 60.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, Plasma Cutter circles an additional time.

1.name: Arsenal Synergy
1.description: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.
1.longDescription: After hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks 3 times while Repeater Cannon is active, the next Basic Attack with Phase Bomb deals 150% more damage and splashes in a 50% larger area.

1.name: Mobile Offense
1.description: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.
1.longDescription: After moving, Fenix's next Basic Attack deals 35% more damage to Heroes.

4.name: Target Acquired
4.description: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes with Repeater Cannon active grant 10% Movement Speed for 4 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Inhibiting Energy
4.description: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: While Phase Bomb is active, Basic Attacks against Slowed Heroes Slow all enemies in the area by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Emergency Protocol
4.description: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains 10% Movement Speed.  This bonus is increased to 15% when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.
4.longDescription: While Fenix has shields from Shield Capacitor, he gains 10% Movement Speed.  This bonus is increased to 15% when Fenix loses shields from Shield Capacitor.

7.name: Combat Advantage
7.description: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.
7.longDescription: Plasma Cutter deals 35% more damage to Slowed targets.

7.name: Warp Warfare
7.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.
7.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 175% Attack Speed for 4 seconds while in Repeater Cannon mode. Hero Takedowns reset Warp's cooldown.

7.name: Divert Power: Weapons
7.description: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 40% Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds. Basic Attacking a Hero refreshes this duration. Once Divert Power: Weapons ends, drain all of Shield Capacitor's Shields.

10.name: Purification Salvo
10.description: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
10.longDescription: Channel for 1.5 seconds, sweeping a laser in front of Fenix that locks onto enemy Heroes. Once Channeling finishes, fire 5 missiles at each locked Hero, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage each. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

10.name: Planet Cracker
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel a powerful beam that spans across the battleground for 4 seconds, dealing 112 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to non-Structure enemies hit.

13.name: Adanium Shell
13.description: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: After arriving with Warp, gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Dampening Field
13.description: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
13.longDescription: Fenix gains 25 Spell Armor while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

13.name: Rapid Recharge
13.description: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by 2 seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.
13.longDescription: The time before Shield Capacitor begins regenerating after taking damage is reduced by 2 seconds. Whenever Fenix is healed, Shield Capacitor's Shield recharges for 60% of the healing received.

13.name: Auxiliary Shields
13.description: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Permanently reduce Fenix's maximum Health by 30% but increase Shield Capacitor's Shield by 40%. Basic Attacks regenerate Shields equal to 10% of the damage dealt.

16.name: Offensive Cadence
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against Heroes while Repeater Cannon is active deals an additional 6% of the target's maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Photonic Weaponry
16.description: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.
16.longDescription: Fenix deals 15% more damage while he has a Shield from Shield Capacitor.

16.name: Arsenal Overcharge
16.description: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Fenix's Basic Attacks reduce his Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Secondary Fire
20.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.
20.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plasma Cutter fires a Purification Salvo missile at them after 0.5 seconds, dealing 79 (+4% per level) damage. Deals 50% increased damage to Slowed targets.

20.name: Singularity Charge
20.description: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.
20.longDescription: Repeater Cannon grants 100% more Attack Speed, and Phase Bomb grants 1.25 more range.

20.name: Unconquered Spirit
20.description: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Shield Capacitor regains 800 (+4% per level) Shields. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

1.name: Nerubian Armor
1.description: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.
1.longDescription: Increase Hardened Carapace's Spell Armor by 20.

1.name: Legion of Beetles
1.description: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.
1.longDescription: Beetles have 30 Spell Armor. Automatically spawn a Beetle every 12 seconds. Can be toggled on and off.

1.name: Regeneration Master
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases your Health Regeneration by 1 per second, up to 30.  Reward: After gathering 30 Regeneration Globes, you also gain 500 Health.

4.name: Bed of Barbs
4.description: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Create a bed of spikes along Impale's path that slows enemies by 25% and deals 21 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Spikes persist for 3.5 seconds.

4.name: Shed Exoskeleton
4.description: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Harden Carapace grants 30% increased Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Underking
4.description: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases Burrow Charge range by 20% and damage by 100%.

7.name: Chitinous Plating
7.description: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: While Harden Carapace is active, taking damage from enemy Abilities reduces its cooldown by 1 second, up to 3 seconds.

7.name: Subterranean Shield
7.description: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Burrow Charge also grants a 345 (+4% per level) point Shield for 5 seconds.

7.name: Leeching Scarabs
7.description: Beetles gain 30% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.
7.longDescription: Beetles gain 30% bonus attack damage and they heal Anub'arak for 50% of their damage with each attack if he is nearby.

10.name: Locust Swarm
10.description: Deal 68 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 68 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each enemy damaged restores 24 (+4% per level) Health. Lasts 6 seconds.

10.name: Cocoon
10.description: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.
10.longDescription: Wraps target enemy Hero in a cocoon, rendering them unable to act or be targeted for 7 seconds. Allies of the Hero can attack the cocoon to break it and free them early.

13.name: Urticating Spines
13.description: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.
13.longDescription: Casting Harden Carapace will also deal 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies. Deals double damage against Heroes.

13.name: Burning Beetles
13.description: Deal 21 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Beetles deal 7 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Deal 21 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Beetles deal 7 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Acid Drenched Mandibles
13.description: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases Anub'arak's Basic Attack damage by 70% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Epicenter
16.description: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Increases Burrow Charge impact area by 60% and lowers the cooldown by 1 second for each Hero hit.

16.name: Debilitation
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Burrow Charge have their Spell Power reduced by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Beetle, Juiced
16.description: Passive: Beetles gain 40% increased health.  Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.
16.longDescription: Passive: Beetles gain 40% increased health.  Every 3rd Basic Attack against enemy Heroes spawns a Beetle.

20.name: Hive Master
20.description: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 50 (+4% per level) health.
20.longDescription: Gain a permanent Vampire Locust that attacks a nearby enemy every 3 seconds. The Vampire Locust deals 153 (+4% per level) damage and returns to heal Anub'arak for 50 (+4% per level) health.

20.name: Cryptweave
20.description: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 6 seconds per Cocoon.
20.longDescription: Staying near the Cocoon allows Anub'arak to extend the duration by up to 6 seconds per Cocoon.

20.name: Hardened Shield
20.description: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 75% less damage.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

1.name: Sentinel Wisp
1.description: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.
1.longDescription: After remaining in a bush for 5 seconds, Wisp's vision radius is increased by 200% and reveals the surrounding area.

1.name: Natural Perspective
1.description: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.
1.longDescription: Nature's Toxin reveals enemies for its duration.

1.name: Hippity Hop
1.description: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 4 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.
1.longDescription: After not Basic Attacking or taking damage for 4 seconds, increase the Move Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness by 10%.

4.name: Blossom Swell
4.description: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.  This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.
4.longDescription: Increases Noxious Blossom's range by 25% and its radius by 20%.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Noxious Blossom increases Lunara's Movement Speed by 15% for 3 seconds.  This stacks with other Movement Speed bonuses.

4.name: Siphoning Toxin
4.description: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.
4.longDescription: While at least one enemy is afflicted by Nature's Toxin, heal for 9 (+4% per level) per second.  When an enemy Hero has 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin, increase this healing by 19 (+4% per level) per second.

4.name: Nature's Culling
4.description: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases Nature's Toxin's damage by 125% to non-Heroes.

7.name: Splintered Spear
7.description: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.
7.longDescription: Using Noxious Blossom causes Lunara's next Basic Attack to hit up to 4 enemies. These extra attacks can apply Nature's Toxin.

7.name: Choking Pollen
7.description: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 150% against enemies with 3 stacks.
7.longDescription: Noxious Blossom deals 100% more damage to enemies afflicted by Nature's Toxin, increased to 150% against enemies with 3 stacks.

7.name: Wild Vigor
7.description: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.
7.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases the damage of Lunara's next 4 Basic Attacks by 50%.

10.name: Thornwood Vine
10.description: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.
10.longDescription: Send forth vines that deal 176 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in a line.  Stores up to 3 charges.

10.name: Leaping Strike
10.description: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Leap over an enemy, Slowing them by 80% for 0.35 seconds and dealing 271 (+4% per level) damage.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Endless Spores
13.description: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Casting Crippling Spores while at least 2 Heroes are afflicted by Nature's Toxin reduces the cooldown by 4 seconds.

13.name: Let Them Wither
13.description: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.
13.longDescription: Increases Crippling Spores' Slow duration by 1 second and causes it to no longer decay.

13.name: Greater Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 75 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

13.name: Abolish Magic
13.description: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.
13.longDescription: Target an ally to remove all damage over time and disabling effects from them and Lunara. For 2 seconds after, the duration of disabling effects is reduced by 50%.

16.name: Accelerated Contamination
16.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.
16.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Noxious Blossom from 60 to 40.  While at least 2 enemy Heroes are afflicted with Nature's Toxin, Noxious Blossom's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

16.name: Star Wood Spear
16.description: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.
16.longDescription: Using Crippling Spores increases Lunara's Basic Attack range by 2.75 for 6 seconds.

16.name: Invigorating Spores
16.description: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Crippling Spores grants 30% Attack Speed for 6 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Nature's Toxin deal damage equal to 1.5% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Unfair Advantage
16.description: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.
16.longDescription: Nature's Toxin deals 60% more damage to Heroes that are Slowed, Rooted, or Stunned.

20.name: Forest's Wrath
20.description: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.
20.longDescription: Thornwood Vine now applies 2 stacks of Nature's Toxin.  Increase Thornwood Vine's range by 30% and Lunara's vision radius by 35%.

20.name: Boundless Stride
20.description: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.
20.longDescription: All Leaping Strike charges are returned every 15 seconds. Leaping Strike can be used on allies.

20.name: Intensifying Toxin
20.description: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.
20.longDescription: At 3 stacks, Nature's Toxin deals 40% more damage.

20.name: Galloping Gait
20.description: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase the Movement Speed bonus of Dryad's Swiftness to 80% for 6 seconds.

1.name: En Pointe
1.description: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.
1.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals an increased 90% damage to enemies hit by its end.

1.name: Growing Nightmare
1.description: Increase Dread's eruption damage by 40%.   Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.  Reward: Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by an additional 25% and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by 15%.
1.longDescription: Increase Dread's eruption damage by 40%.   Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single cast of Dread's eruption.  Reward: Permanently increase Dread's eruption damage by an additional 25% and increase the Slow amount of Dread's eruption by 15%.

1.name: Ancestral Strength
1.description: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 15% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Non-Heroic Abilities deal 15% more damage to Stunned, Rooted, Silenced or Slowed enemies. Enemy Heroes who are hit with Overflowing Chaos are Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Allegrissimo
4.description: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with the end of Shadow Waltz sets its cooldown to 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Backbiter
4.description: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.
4.longDescription: If Chomp hits a Hero, Orphea immediately dashes a short distance backwards.  Passive: Gain 15% maximum Health.

4.name: Chaotic Assault
4.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having 3 stacks of Chaos deal an additional 75% bonus damage.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes while having 3 stacks of Chaos deal an additional 75% bonus damage.

7.name: Insatiable
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp sets its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Ravenous Hunger
7.description: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Quest: Minions that die within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Chomp permanently increase its damage by 2 and heal Orphea for 60 (+4% per level).  Heroes that die increase its damage by 40 and heal Orphea for 25% of her maximum Health.

7.name: Mind Devourer
7.description: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.
7.longDescription: Quest: Hitting Heroes with Dread increases its damage by 5, up to 150.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, hitting an enemy Hero with Dread's eruption sets its cooldown to 6 seconds and refunds 50 Mana.

10.name: Eternal Feast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, deal 210 (+4% per level) damage in an area. Eternal Feast repeats every 1 second as long as it hits an enemy Hero.

10.name: Crushing Jaws
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, pull enemies in an area towards the center, dealing 250 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Determination
13.description: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.
13.longDescription: After dashing with Shadow Waltz, Orphea gains 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability, stacking up to 2 times. While Orphea has Determination, her Physical damage is increased by 15%.

13.name: Abyssal Symbiosis
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a 170 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Chomp instantly grants Orphea maximum Chaos and a 170 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.

13.name: Invasive Miasma
13.description: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.
13.longDescription: Activate to deal 150 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies after 2 seconds. For each Hero hit, heal for 182 (+4% per level) and gain 1 Chaos.

16.name: Bond of Anguish
16.description: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Shadow Waltz deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 3% of their maximum Health, healing Orphea for 50% of damage dealt.

16.name: Dead Magic
16.description: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 90 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks that consume Chaos ignore Armor and deal 90 (+4% per level) Spell Damage to the target and all enemies around them.

16.name: Lurking Terror
16.description: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: After Dread erupts and for 2 seconds after, activate to cast Chomp from the eruption area. Enemy Heroes hit by this Chomp are Slowed by 70% for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Monster Within
20.description: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.
20.longDescription: Eternal Feast grants 1 Chaos each time it hits a Hero. While Eternal Feast is active, Orphea's Attack Speed is increased by 50%.

20.name: Engulfing Oblivion
20.description: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Crushing Jaws reduces the Armor of Heroes hit by 25 for 2 seconds. Takedowns set its cooldown to 5 seconds.

20.name: Eldritch Conduit
