20.description: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Each Chaos consumed increases Orphea's Spell Power by 3%, up to 30%. After reaching the maximum bonus, the Spell Power is increased by an additional 30%. Lasts 10 seconds.

20.name: Final Toccata
20.description: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.
20.longDescription: Activate to instantly reset the cooldown of Shadow Waltz. For the next 6 seconds, dashing with Shadow Waltz resets its cooldown.

1.name: Electric Charge
1.description: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%. Heal for 30% of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increases the radius of Lightning Shield by 25%. Heal for 30% of the damage it deals to enemy Heroes.

1.name: Colossal Totem
1.description: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50% and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.
1.longDescription: Increases the area and range of Earthbind Totem by 50% and it can be reactivated to move an existing totem to a new location once.

1.name: Wolf Run
1.description: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%. If an enemy Hero is hit by Ghost Wolf's Basic Attack, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed of Ghost Wolf from 20% to 30%. If an enemy Hero is hit by Ghost Wolf's Basic Attack, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Stormcaller
4.description: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.
4.longDescription: When Lightning Shield damages an enemy it restores 4 Mana, up to 100.

4.name: Feral Heart
4.description: Increases Rehgar's Health Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form. Ghost Wolf attacks also restore 1% of Rehgar's maximum Mana, increased to 5% against Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases Rehgar's Health Regeneration by 75% while in Ghost Wolf form. Ghost Wolf attacks also restore 1% of Rehgar's maximum Mana, increased to 5% against Heroes.

4.name: Healing Totem
4.description: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to place a Totem that heals allied Heroes in an area for 2% of their maximum Health every second for 10 seconds.

7.name: Grounded Totem
7.description: Increase the Health of Earthbind Totem by 100%.  Enemy Heroes who are Slowed by Earthbind Totem also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increase the Health of Earthbind Totem by 100%.  Enemy Heroes who are Slowed by Earthbind Totem also have their Attack Speed Slowed by 40%.

7.name: Blood and Thunder
7.description: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks reduce Basic Ability cooldowns by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cleanse
7.description: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.
7.longDescription: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

10.name: Ancestral Healing
10.description: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, heal an allied Hero for 1180 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Bloodlust
10.description: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: Grant nearby allied Heroes 40% Attack Speed and 35% Movement Speed and causes them to heal for 30% of the Basic Attack damage to their primary target. Lasts for 6 seconds.

13.name: Tidal Waves
13.description: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by .75 seconds for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 55 to 40.
13.longDescription: Reduces Chain Heal's cooldown by .75 seconds for each Hero healed, and reduces its Mana cost from 55 to 40.

13.name: Earthliving Enchant
13.description: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: When Chain Heal heals a Hero below 50% Health, they are healed an additional 225 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds.

13.name: Earth Shield
13.description: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Lightning Shield gives Heroes a Shield that absorbs damage equal to 12% of their maximum Health for 3 seconds.

16.name: Rising Storm
16.description: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.  Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.
16.longDescription: Casting Lightning Shield on an ally also casts an untalented version on Rehgar.  Every time either Lighting Shield damages an enemy Hero, increase the damage of both Lightning Shields by 10%. Stacks up to 15 times.

16.name: Earthgrasp Totem
16.description: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it Slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.
16.longDescription: When Earthbind Totem is first cast, it Slows nearby enemies by 90% for 1 second.

16.name: Hunger of the Wolf
16.description: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Ghost Wolf attacks against Heroes deal an additional 5% of the target's maximum Health and heal Rehgar for 5% of his maximum Health.

20.name: Farseer's Blessing
20.description: After 1.5 seconds, Ancestral Healing is cast a second time on the same target. Allies near the target are healed for 590 (+4% per level).
20.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, Ancestral Healing is cast a second time on the same target. Allies near the target are healed for 590 (+4% per level).

20.name: Gladiator's War Shout
20.description: Increase the duration and range of Bloodlust by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration and range of Bloodlust by 100%.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

1.name: Way of Illusion
1.description: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 30 Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time a Mirror Image Critically Strikes a Hero, Samuro gains 0.25 Attack Damage, up to 10.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Samuro gains an additional 30 Attack Damage.

1.name: Way of the Blade
1.description: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.   Samuro and his Mirror Images' Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by 5 for 2.25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
1.longDescription: Critical Strike now happens for Samuro and his Mirror Images every 3rd Basic Attack.   Samuro and his Mirror Images' Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes reduce their Physical Armor by 5 for 2.25 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

1.name: Way of the Wind
1.description: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.  Casting Wind Walk heals Samuro for 5% of his maximum Health.
1.longDescription: Gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds after entering or exiting Wind Walk.  Casting Wind Walk heals Samuro for 5% of his maximum Health.

4.name: Mirage
4.description: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 40%.
4.longDescription: Mirror Image grants Samuro and his Images 40 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 40%.

4.name: One with the Wind
4.description: While Samuro has Wind Walk active and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.
4.longDescription: While Samuro has Wind Walk active and for 3 seconds after breaking it, both he and his Mirror Images gain 30 Armor, taking 30% reduced damage from all sources.

4.name: Deflection
4.description: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 35 Physical Armor.
4.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants Samuro and his Mirror Images 35 Physical Armor.

7.name: Burning Blade
7.description: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: Critical Strikes from Samuro and Mirror Images deal an additional 50% of their Basic Attack damage as Spell Damage to the target and nearby enemies.

7.name: Phantom Pain
7.description: Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes deal an additional 35% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active and reduce the cooldown of Image Transmission by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Samuro's Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes deal an additional 35% of his Basic Attack damage for each Mirror Image that is active and reduce the cooldown of Image Transmission by 1 second.

7.name: Crushing Blows
7.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 2 seconds.   Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Basic Attack damage by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.
7.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Critical Strike by 2 seconds.   Critical Strikes against enemy Heroes increase Samuro's Basic Attack damage by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

10.name: Bladestorm
10.description: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Cause a Bladestorm of destructive force around Samuro for 3 seconds, granting him 25 Armor and dealing 180 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

10.name: Illusion Master
10.description: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Mirror Images can be controlled individually or as a group and their damage is increased by 100%.  Passive: Image Transmission's cooldown is reduced to 8 seconds.

13.name: Mirrored Steel
13.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Mirror Image by 0.75 seconds.

13.name: Kawarimi
13.description: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk creates a Mirror Image at Samuro's location that will continue whatever he was doing.

13.name: Shukuchi
13.description: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.
13.longDescription: Wind Walk teleports Samuro a short distance in the direction he's currently facing.

16.name: Merciless Strikes
16.description: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.
16.longDescription: Samuro's Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemies are always Critical Strikes.

16.name: Harsh Winds
16.description: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero during Wind Walk causes them to take 30% increased damage from Samuro for 3 seconds.

16.name: Press the Attack
16.description: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.
16.longDescription: While Advancing Strikes is active, Samuro and his Mirror Images gain 10% Attack Speed every time they Basic Attack, up to 40%.

20.name: Dance of Death
20.description: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 30% damage.  If Samuro hits at least 20 enemy Heroes with Bladestorm, then reset its cooldown.
20.longDescription: Mirror Images use Bladestorm when Samuro does, but for 30% damage.  If Samuro hits at least 20 enemy Heroes with Bladestorm, then reset its cooldown.

20.name: Three Blade Style
20.description: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their Health by 50% and their duration is increased to 16 seconds.
20.longDescription: Samuro's Mirror Images no longer take additional damage, effecively increasing their Health by 50% and their duration is increased to 16 seconds.

20.name: Wind Strider
20.description: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Wind Walk's cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds.

20.name: Blademaster's Pursuit
20.description: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Advancing Strikes grants an additional 15% Movement Speed for Samuro and his Mirror Images, and its duration is increased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Furious Blow
1.description: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.
1.longDescription: Every 4th cast of Seismic Slam deals 50% more damage to the primary target and costs no Fury.

1.name: War Paint
1.description: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.
1.longDescription: Sonya's Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt.

1.name: Tough As Nails
1.description: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.
1.longDescription: Every 16 seconds, gain 60 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 60%.  Stores up to 3 charges. Charges refresh 200% faster while Fury's Movement Speed bonus is active.

4.name: Shattered Ground
4.description: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.
4.longDescription: Increase the length of Seismic Slam's splash by 66% and increase its splash damage to 100% of its base damage.

4.name: Hurricane
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Whirlwind by 2 seconds. Casting Whirlwind removes all Slows and Roots from Sonya.

4.name: Shot Of Fury
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Fury. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: After casting Seismic Slam, your next Basic Attack deals 40% more damage.

7.name: Poisoned Spear
7.description: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.
7.longDescription: Ancient Spear deals an additional 100% damage over 6 seconds.

7.name: Life Funnel
7.description: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Increases the healing of Whirlwind to 35% of damage dealt.

7.name: Battle Rage
7.description: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 10% of Sonya's maximum Health. Stores up to 2 charges. Usable while Whirlwinding.  Passive: Sonya deals 25% more damage to Mercenaries.

10.name: Leap
10.description: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.
10.longDescription: Leap into the air, dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, and stunning them for 1.25 seconds.

10.name: Wrath of the Berserker
10.description: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.
10.longDescription: Increase damage dealt by 40%. Reduce the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows against Sonya by 50%. Lasts 15 seconds, and extends by 1 second for every 10 Fury gained.

13.name: Mystical Spear
13.description: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Ancient Spear always pulls Sonya to the target location even if it doesn't hit an enemy. When used this way, Ancient Spear's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

13.name: Ruthless
13.description: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.
13.longDescription: Whirlwind deals an additional 50 (+4% per level) damage per second to Heroes below 33% Health. Does not generate additional healing.

13.name: No Escape
13.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.
13.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus from using Basic and Heroic Abilities to 20%.

16.name: Giant Slammer
16.description: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks and Seismic Slam deal an additional 1.25% of Heroes' maximum Health as damage and heal Sonya for the damage dealt.

16.name: Rampage
16.description: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack damage by 25%. Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Ancient Spear by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Nerves of Steel
16.description: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 25% of your maximum Health as a Shield for 3 seconds. Usable while Whirlwinding.

20.name: Arreat Crater
20.description: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.
20.longDescription: Leap leaves behind an impassable crater for 5 seconds.  Reduces Leap's cooldown by 20 seconds.

20.name: Striding Giant
20.description: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.
20.longDescription: Wrath of the Berserker increases maximum Health by 10% and grants Striding Giant, which can be activated to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

20.name: Composite Spear
20.description: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Ancient Spear's range by 50%. Hitting an enemy Hero with Ancient Spear grants 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

20.name: Ignore Pain
20.description: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage. Usable while Whirlwinding.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 60 Armor for 4 seconds, taking 60% less damage.  Usable while Whirlwinding.

1.name: Keep Moving!
1.description: Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Shove by 10% and its duration by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increases the Movement Speed bonus of Shove by 10% and its duration by 2 seconds.

1.name: Taskmaster
1.description: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Every time Cho is hit by a Hero Basic Attack, reduce the cooldown of Shove by 1 second.

1.name: We See You!
1.description: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds, its range is increased by 33%, and the number of Basic Attacks required to kill it is increased by 1.
1.longDescription: Eye of Kilrogg's cooldown is decreased by 25 seconds, its range is increased by 33%, and the number of Basic Attacks required to kill it is increased by 1.

4.name: Rising Dread
4.description: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%. Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.
4.longDescription: Each bounce of Dread Orb increases its radius by 25% and damage by 25%. Activate Dread Orb before the second bounce ends to reverse the direction of the third bounce.

4.name: Runic Persistence
4.description: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.
4.longDescription: Runic Blast deals an additional 180 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds in an area around the detonation point.

4.name: Bomb's Away
4.description: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Damaging a Hero with Runic Blast increases its damage by 5, up to 200.  Reward: After damaging 20 Heroes, the range and speed of Cho's Rune Bomb is increased by 20%.

7.name: Edge of Madness
7.description: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 12% damage, to a maximum of 60%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every subsequent hit of Shadowflame against the same enemy Hero deals an additional 12% damage, to a maximum of 60%. These bonuses are lost if the Hero has not been hit for 7 seconds.

7.name: Double Trouble
7.description: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Quest: If Shadowflame hits an enemy Hero that is afflicted by Cho's Consuming Blaze, its cooldown is reduced by 0.5 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, Shadowflame's cooldown is instead permanently reduced by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Ogre Rampage
7.description: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by 5%. Each time Gall damages an enemy Hero this bonus increases by 1% for 4 seconds, up to an additional 10% bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Increase the damage bonus of Ogre Rage by 5%. Each time Gall damages an enemy Hero this bonus increases by 1% for 4 seconds, up to an additional 10% bonus damage.

10.name: Shadow Bolt Volley
10.description: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash 20 Shadow Bolts over 4 seconds, each dealing 87 (+4% per level) damage to the first target hit. The bolts fire towards your mouse.

10.name: Twisting Nether
10.description: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, nearby enemies are slowed by 50% while Gall channels, up to 5 seconds. Activate to deal 353 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Searing Shadows
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Shadowflame take an additional 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

13.name: Psychotic Break
13.description: Increase Gall's damage to enemy Heroes by 10%. Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Gall's damage to enemy Heroes by 10%. Upon dying, Gall gains Ogre Rage and can use Abilities for 10 seconds.

13.name: Twilight Nova
13.description: Passive: The cooldown of Dread Orb is reduced by 1 second.  After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.
13.longDescription: Passive: The cooldown of Dread Orb is reduced by 1 second.  After the first bounce of Dread Orb, 2 extra bombs bounce to the sides once.

16.name: Leaden Orb
16.description: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Dread Orb Stuns enemy Heroes for 1 second.

16.name: Deafening Blast
16.description: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Runic Blast Silences enemy Heroes for 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Shadowsnare
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by your Basic Abilities are Slowed by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by your Basic Abilities are Slowed by 15% for 4 seconds. This effect can stack up to 2 times.

20.name: Shadowfury
20.description: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.
20.longDescription: Shadow Bolt Volley hits all enemies in its path.

20.name: Shifting Nether
20.description: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.
20.longDescription: Twisting Nether now teleports Cho to a targeted location before it begins Channeling.

20.name: The Will of Gall
20.description: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.
20.longDescription: Takedowns permanently increase the bonus of Ogre Rage by 2%.

20.name: Twilight Frenzy
20.description: Activate to reduce the cooldowns of Shadowflame and Dread Orb to 2 seconds for the next 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to reduce the cooldowns of Shadowflame and Dread Orb to 2 seconds for the next 6 seconds.

1.name: Consuming Fire
1.description: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.
1.longDescription: Consuming Blaze heals for 150% more when a Hero is Ignited.

1.name: Calloused Hide
1.description: While under 60% maximum Health, Cho gains 15% increased Movement Speed and healing received.
1.longDescription: While under 60% maximum Health, Cho gains 15% increased Movement Speed and healing received.

1.name: The Will of Cho
1.description: Quest: Killing enemy Minions grants 1 stack of The Will of Cho, and Hero takedowns grant 10 stacks.  Gain 1 Armor for every 30 stacks of The Will of Cho, up to a maximum of 10 Armor.  This Armor bonus stacks with Ogre Hide.
1.longDescription: Quest: Killing enemy Minions grants 1 stack of The Will of Cho, and Hero takedowns grant 10 stacks.  Gain 1 Armor for every 30 stacks of The Will of Cho, up to a maximum of 10 Armor.  This Armor bonus stacks with Ogre Hide.

4.name: Uppercut
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their max Health and reduces the cooldown of Surging Fist by 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Surging Fist deals additional damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their max Health and reduces the cooldown of Surging Fist by 5 seconds.

4.name: Rollback
4.description: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.
4.longDescription: Rune Bomb rolls back to Cho, damaging enemies in its path.

4.name: Seared Flesh
4.description: Each consecutive Basic Attack to enemy Heroes deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a non-Heroic enemy is attacked.
4.longDescription: Each consecutive Basic Attack to enemy Heroes deals 20% more damage, to a maximum of 60% damage. This bonus lasts 5 seconds or until a non-Heroic enemy is attacked.

7.name: Power Surge
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Surging Fist are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  Gain 15% Movement Speed while charging Surging Fist and for 2.5 seconds after casting the Ability.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Surging Fist are Slowed by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  Gain 15% Movement Speed while charging Surging Fist and for 2.5 seconds after casting the Ability.

7.name: Firestarter
7.description: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against ignited Heroes decreases the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 1 second.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Consuming Blaze by 3 seconds.

7.name: Enraged Regeneration
7.description: Each time Cho hits an enemy Hero with an Ability or Basic Attack, he heals for 60 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Gall's Dread Orb receive 35% less healing for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each time Cho hits an enemy Hero with an Ability or Basic Attack, he heals for 60 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit by Gall's Dread Orb receive 35% less healing for 4 seconds.

10.name: Hammer of Twilight
10.description: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to swing the Hammer of Twilight, dealing 150 (+4.5% per level) damage, pushing enemies away, and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.  Passive: Cho's Basic Attacks deal 25% increased damage.

10.name: Upheaval
10.description: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, pull enemies towards Cho'gall, Slowing them by 25% for 3 seconds and dealing 175 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Surging Dash
13.description: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.
13.longDescription: While Channeling Surging Fist, Cho heals for 150 (+4% per level) Health per second.

13.name: Twilight Veil
13.description: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide to 75 for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.
13.longDescription: Activate to increase the Armor bonus of Ogre Hide to 75 for 4 seconds. If cast while Ogre Rage is active, it instantly swaps to Ogre Hide.

13.name: Molten Block
13.description: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.
13.longDescription: Activate to enter Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds, damaging nearby enemies for 92 (+4% per level) damage per second.

16.name: Frenzied Fists
16.description: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.
16.longDescription: Gain 75% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after using Surging Fist.

16.name: Runic Feedback
16.description: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
16.longDescription: Gall's Runic Blast reduces Cho's Rune Bomb cooldown by 1 second per enemy hit, and 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Runed Gauntlet
16.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 6%.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Cho and Gall's Heroic Abilities by 6%.

20.name: C'Thun's Gift
20.description: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Cho's Basic Attack becomes ranged and Slows targets by 20% for 2 seconds.

20.name: Favor of the Old Gods
20.description: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upheaval Roots enemy Heroes for 2 seconds.

20.name: Fuel for the Flame
20.description: Basic Attacks against enemies cause them to explode, dealing 21 (+4% per level) damage to them and 45 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  This damage is doubled against enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemies cause them to explode, dealing 21 (+4% per level) damage to them and 45 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  This damage is doubled against enemy Heroes.

20.name: Hour of Twilight
20.description: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.
20.longDescription: Decreases Cho'gall's death timer by 50%.

1.name: Ranger
1.description: Sentinel pierces the first Hero hit. Its width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.
1.longDescription: Sentinel pierces the first Hero hit. Its width is increased by 25% and deals up to 250% more damage based on distance traveled.

1.name: Lunar Blaze
1.description: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.
1.longDescription: Increase Lunar Flare's range by 30%.  Quest: Hitting a Hero with Lunar Flare increases its damage by 5%, up to 100%.

1.name: Trueshot Aura
1.description: Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.  Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark, increase the bonus of Trueshot Aura to 25%, and apply it to other nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Passive: Basic Attack damage increased by 15%.  Activate to reset the cooldown of Hunter's Mark, increase the bonus of Trueshot Aura to 25%, and apply it to other nearby allied Heroes for 5 seconds.

4.name: Everlasting Light
4.description: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 80% more.
4.longDescription: If Light of Elune's second charge is cast on a different target from the first, it heals for 80% more.

4.name: Mark of Mending
4.description: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2.5% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal her for 2.5% of her maximum Health. Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark heal the attacker for 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Elune's Chosen
4.description: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 175% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to make Tyrande's Basic Attacks heal target allied Hero for 175% of the damage dealt. Lasts for 8 seconds.

7.name: Moonlit Arrows
7.description: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks decrease the cooldown of Light of Elune by an additional 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Kaldorei Resistance
7.description: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.
7.longDescription: Light of Elune grants the target 10 Spell Armor for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 2 times.

7.name: Huntress' Fury
7.description: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemy Heroes.
7.longDescription: Increase the cast range and duration of Hunter's Mark by 25%. Tyrande's Basic Attacks against targets with Hunter's Mark splash to nearby enemy Heroes.

10.name: Shadowstalk
10.description: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
10.longDescription: Grant all allied Heroes Stealth for 10 seconds and heal them for 380 (+4% per level) Health over 10 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

10.name: Starfall
10.description: Deal 92 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 92 (+4% per level) damage per second and Slow enemies by 20% in an area. Lasts 6 seconds.

13.name: Quickening Blessing
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. Light of Elune increases the target's Movement Speed by 20% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Harsh Moonlight
13.description: Sentinel Slows enemies hit by 35% and reduces their damage dealt by 35% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Sentinel Slows enemies hit by 35% and reduces their damage dealt by 35% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Ranger's Mark
13.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Hunter's Mark by 1 second. Basic Attacks against marked targets reduce the cooldown of Lunar Flare by 3 seconds.

16.name: Celestial Attunement
16.description: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.
16.longDescription: Light of Elune removes Stuns, Silences, and Slows from its target.

16.name: Empower
16.description: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. Heroes hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Reduce Sentinel's cooldown by 3 seconds. Heroes hit by Sentinel takes bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Darnassian Archery
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant a stacking 10% increased Attack Damage bonus for 4 seconds.

20.name: Eyes of the Huntress
20.description: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 10 seconds and heals for 50% more.
20.longDescription: Shadowstalk reveals all enemy Heroes for 10 seconds and heals for 50% more.

20.name: Celestial Wrath
20.description: Increase the Slow of Starfall to 40% and cause it to apply Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.
20.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Starfall to 40% and cause it to apply Hunter's Mark to enemy Heroes while inside of its area of effect.

20.name: Shooting Star
20.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.
20.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1. Every 8th Basic Attack casts a free Lunar Flare at a random enemy near Tyrande's position. This prefers Heroic targets.

20.name: Iceblade Arrows
20.description: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 20%. Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes reduce their damage dealt by 8% for 2 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

1.name: Greed
1.description: Globe of Annihilation deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, increase the range of All Shall Burn by 25% and Demon Warriors gain 20% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.
1.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation deals 20% more damage to non-Heroic targets.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, increase the range of All Shall Burn by 25% and Demon Warriors gain 20% Attack Speed and Movement Speed.

1.name: Gluttony
1.description: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.
1.longDescription: Increase the number of stacks of Annihilation gained by hitting Heroes with Globe of Annihilation from 2 to 3.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, each enemy hit by Globe of Annihilation reduces its cooldown by 0.25 seconds, doubled against Heroes.

1.name: Wrath
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes under 75% Health grant 1 Annihilation.  Quest: After gaining 200 Annihilation, hitting a Hero with Globe of Annihilation increases the damage of Azmodan's next Basic Attack against them within 3 seconds by 75% the amount of Annihilation he has.

4.name: Army of Hell
4.description: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Summon Demon Warrior spawns an additional Demon, but its cooldown is increased by 10 seconds.

4.name: Hellforged Armor
4.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.
4.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25 Armor and last 4 seconds longer.

4.name: Battleborn
4.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Summon Demon Warrior from 25 to 20.  Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Summon Demon Warrior from 25 to 20.  Azmodan's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Summon Demon Warrior by 0.75 seconds and Demon Lieutenant by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Art of Chaos
7.description: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 40 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: If Globe of Annihilation hits 2 or more Heroes, restore 40 Mana and gain an extra 4 Annihilation.

7.name: Bombardment
7.description: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.
7.longDescription: After casting Globe of Annihilation, Azmodan's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds have an additional 1.5 range and can hit 2 additional targets. Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks empowered by Bombardment grant 1 Annihilation.

7.name: Master of Destruction
7.description: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 4 Annihilation per Hero hit.
7.longDescription: All Shall Burn's final damage applies to all enemies in an area around the target and grants 4 Annihilation per Hero hit.

10.name: Demonic Invasion
10.description: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
10.longDescription: Rain a small army of Demonic Grunts down on enemies, dealing 65 (+4% per level) damage per impact. Grunts deal 42 (+4% per level) damage, have 750 (+4% per level) Health and last up to 10 seconds. When Grunts die they explode, dealing 98 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

10.name: Tide of Sin
10.description: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.
10.longDescription: Activate to make the next Globe of Annihilation cost no Mana and deal 50% more damage.  Usable while Channeling All Shall Burn.

13.name: Brutish Vanguard
13.description: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.
13.longDescription: Demon Warriors and Lieutenants gain 25% increased Health. Demon Warriors Slow nearby enemies by 20%.

13.name: Cydaea's Kiss
13.description: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Reduces the Channel time of All Shall Burn by 0.5 seconds. If All Shall Burn's Channel lasts its full duration against a Hero, Azmodan is healed for 8% of his maximum Health.

13.name: Chain of Command
13.description: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.
13.longDescription: The cooldown of Demon Lieutenants' Demonic Smite is reduced by 2 seconds and they grant 25% increased damage to nearby friendly Minions, Mercenaries, and Azmodan's summoned Demons.

16.name: Total Annihilation
16.description: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Globe of Annihilation damages Heroes for an additional 4% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Hell Rift
16.description: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration, a Demon Warrior is summoned at the target's location and all Demon Warriors deal 100% increased damage for 5 seconds.

16.name: Trample
16.description: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 275 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1.25 second.
16.longDescription: Activate to charge a short distance, dealing 275 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies caught in the path by 60% for 1.25 second.

20.name: Siegebreaker
20.description: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.
20.longDescription: Azmodan's Demons deal 50% increased damage to Structures.

20.name: Black Pool
20.description: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second.
20.longDescription: Globes of Annihilation empowered by Tide of Sin also leave a Black Pool at their impact location for 5 seconds. Enemies within the pool lose 8 Armor per second, up to 15, and take 56 (+4% per level) damage per second.

20.name: Pride
20.description: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.
20.longDescription: After gaining 400 Annihilation, the area of Globe of Annihilation is increased by 15% and it deals 100 additional damage.

20.name: Sin's Grasp
20.description: All Shall Burn Slows enemy Heroes by 15% during its Channel. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration on an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%, and the target is Slowed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: All Shall Burn Slows enemy Heroes by 15% during its Channel. If All Shall Burn Channels for its full duration on an enemy Hero, its cooldown is reduced by 50%, and the target is Slowed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: The Plaguelands
1.description: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase Death and Decay's duration by 1 second. After gaining 30 Blight, increase the radius of Death and Decay's pool by 30%.

1.name: Blighted Frost
1.description: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Frost Nova deals 75% more damage to enemies in the center. After gaining 30 Blight, increase Frost Nova's Root duration by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Barbed Chains
1.description: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Chains of Kel'Thuzad damage by 125%. After gaining 30 Blight, Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces the Armor of pulled Heroes by 10 for 4 seconds.

4.name: Strip Shields
4.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.
4.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad grants Kel'Thuzad a permanent 128 (+4% per level) Shield, stacking up to 2 times.  Additionally, Chains of Kel'Thuzad deals up to 270 (+2.5% per level) bonus damage to Heroes' Shields.

4.name: Phylactery of Kel'Thuzad
4.description: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.
4.longDescription: Quest: Collect 12 Regeneration Globes to charge Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery.  Reward: Kel'Thuzad's Phylactery can be activated while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms, but must be charged again.  Passive: Kel'Thuzad heals for 10% of all Spell Damage dealt while the Phylactery is charged.

4.name: Armor of the Archlich
4.description: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Physical Armor for 4 seconds. Upon activation, nearby enemies take 45 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 35% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Accelerated Decay
7.description: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.
7.longDescription: Each time a Hero is hit by Death and Decay's pool, they take 25% more periodic damage from Death and Decay for the next 4 seconds, stacking up to 4 times.

7.name: Chilling Touch
7.description: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 80%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 8 seconds, Kel'Thuzad's next Basic Attack hits all enemies in the area for 80%  additional damage, deals Spell damage instead of Physical, and Slows by 30% for 2 seconds.

7.name: Ice Cold
7.description: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.
7.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Glacial Spike by 8 seconds and increase its damage by 400%.

10.name: Frost Blast
10.description: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Launch a meteor of ice at an enemy Hero. Upon impact, the meteor deals 115 (+2.5% per level) damage to its target and 275 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the area. All enemies hit by Frost Blast are Rooted for 2 seconds.

10.name: Shadow Fissure
10.description: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a fissure anywhere on the Battleground that explodes after 1.5 seconds, dealing 320 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in its area. If an enemy Hero is hit, set its cooldown to 1.5 seconds.

13.name: Icy Grasp
13.description: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 20%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Frost Nova's Slow by 20%. Each time Kel'Thuzad damages enemies Slowed by Frost Nova, reduce the cooldown of Frost Nova by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Chains of Ice
13.description: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.
13.longDescription: After Chains of Kel'Thuzad's Stun expires, the enemy is also Slowed by 60% for 1 second.

13.name: Chain-Link
13.description: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
13.longDescription: Pulling a Hero with Chains of Kel'Thuzad reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

16.name: Arcane Echoes
16.description: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Whenever Kel'Thuzad hits an enemy Hero with Death and Decay's explosion, its cooldown is reduced by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Hungering Cold
16.description: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.
16.longDescription: Enemies that are Rooted take an additional 55 (+2.5% per level) damage each time they are damaged by Kel'Thuzad.

16.name: Power of Icecrown
16.description: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Stunning, Rooting, or Slowing a Hero grants 6% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

20.name: Deathchill
20.description: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.
20.longDescription: When Frost Blast's Root expires, enemies are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds. Heroes killed while under the effects of Frost Blast instantly release another Frost Blast explosion.

20.name: Might of the Scourge
20.description: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.
20.longDescription: If a Hero is hit with Shadow Fissure, a second one is cast below them 1 second later.  This second cast will not duplicate itself.

20.name: Shifting Malice
20.description: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.
20.longDescription: Activate to dash forward, dealing 150 (+2.5% per level) damage to enemies in the path. Takedowns reset the cooldown of Shifting Malice.

20.name: The Damned Return
20.description: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.
20.longDescription: Activate to create a Shade of Naxxramas that lasts 15 seconds and mimics Kel'Thuzad's casts of Death and Decay.

1.name: Party Mix
1.description: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Play Lúcio's Crossfade tracks to nearby allies for a total of 8 minutes. Multiple allies provide additional time.  Reward: Permanently increase Crossfade's range by 20%.

1.name: Accelerando
1.description: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.
1.longDescription: Wall Ride's Movement Speed bonus gradually increases to 40% over 4 seconds while Lúcio maintains its effect.

1.name: Smooth Moves
1.description: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt and restore 0.5 Mana.  Passive: Increase Wall Ride duration by 1 second.
1.longDescription: While Wall Ride is active, Basic Attacks heal for 30% of the damage dealt and restore 0.5 Mana.  Passive: Increase Wall Ride duration by 1 second.

4.name: Subwoofer
4.description: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further.  Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.
4.longDescription: Enemies within the first half of Soundwave's range are knocked back 75% further.  Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Soundwave.  Reward: Increase Soundwave's arc by 50% and its range by 20%.

4.name: Off the Wall
4.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave while Wall Ride is active reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Supersonic
4.description: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.
4.longDescription: While Wall Ride is active, Push Off's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

7.name: Good Vibrations
7.description: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a 35 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Soundwave grants Lúcio a 35 (+4% per level) Shield for 7 seconds. Hitting enemy Heroes grants 3 times this amount.

7.name: Reverse Amp
7.description: Blast Lúcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.
7.longDescription: Blast Lúcio's active Crossfade track at enemy Heroes. While Amp It Up is active, Healing Boost deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second and Speed Boost Slows by 20%.  This ability is unaffected by Crossfade talents.

7.name: Boombox
7.description: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.
7.longDescription: Place a boombox that plays Lúcio's active Crossfade track for 30 seconds. Its volume adjusts with Amp It Up.  Crossfade tracks do not stack.

10.name: Sound Barrier
10.description: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Lúcio and nearby allied Heroes gain a 1296 (+4% per level) point Shield that rapidly decays over 6 seconds.

10.name: High Five
10.description: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).
10.longDescription: Quickly skate to an allied Hero. Upon arrival, the ally is granted Unstoppable for 1 second and is healed for 250 (+4% per level).

13.name: All Together
13.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.
13.longDescription: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 5% Movement Speed that stacks with other bonuses.

13.name: Heavy Casters
13.description: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Push Off no longer Slows enemies, and instead Stuns them for 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Slip
13.description: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.
13.longDescription: While Wall Ride is active, passing near an enemy Hero increases its Movement Speed bonus to 40% for 1 second.  Passive: Wall Ride grants 20 Armor.

16.name: Rejuvenescência
16.description: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health each second.
16.longDescription: While Amp It Up is active, Crossfade's Healing Boost heals for an additional 2.5% of the target's maximum Health each second.

16.name: Up the Frequency
16.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds.  Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.
16.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Amp It Up by 0.4 seconds.  Passive: Wall Ride increases Basic Attack range by 2.2.

16.name: Up To Eleven
16.description: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to extend the duration of Amp It Up by 2 seconds.

20.name: Bossa Nova
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the Shield now decays over 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Sound Barrier to 30 seconds, but the Shield now decays over 4 seconds.

20.name: Mixing Fire
20.description: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increase the duration of Amp It Up by 1 second.
20.longDescription: High Five can now be cast on enemy Heroes, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and reducing all healing received by 50% for 3 seconds.  Passive: Increase the duration of Amp It Up by 1 second.

20.name: House Party
20.description: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 8% increased healing.
20.longDescription: For each ally affected by Crossfade, Lúcio gains 8% increased healing.

20.name: Summer Anthem
20.description: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate for all other allies affected by Crossfade to become Unkillable for 1.5 seconds.

1.name: Might of the Banshee Queen
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Withering Fire increases Sylvanas's Attack Speed and Spell Power by 5% for 6 seconds, stacking up to 5 times.

1.name: Unfurling Shadows
1.description: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each time an enemy Hero with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse is hit by Shadow Dagger, its damage is permanently increased by 0.5%.

1.name: Overwhelming Affliction
1.description: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.
1.longDescription: Enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse are Slowed by 15%. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against Slowed enemy Heroes deal 1% of their maximum Health as damage.

4.name: Unstable Poison
4.description: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.
4.longDescription: Minions that die under the effects of Shadow Dagger or Sylvanas's Traits explode, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Summons.

4.name: Mercenary Queen
4.description: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.
4.longDescription: Friendly non-Elite Mercenaries near Sylvanas deal 60% more damage. Sylvanas Stuns and deals 30% additional damage to Mercenaries with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

4.name: Possession
4.description: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.
4.longDescription: Activate to force an enemy Minion to fight for Sylvanas's team. Catapults require 3 charges. Stores up to 3 charges.

7.name: Barbed Shot
7.description: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Hitting the same enemy with 5 shots of Withering Fire causes the 5th shot to deal 350% bonus damage.

7.name: Lost Soul
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse reduce the cooldown of Shadow Dagger by 1.75 seconds.

7.name: Festering Wounds
7.description: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.
7.longDescription: Increase Haunting Wave's damage by 25%. Haunting Wave applies 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse.

10.name: Wailing Arrow
10.description: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.
10.longDescription: Shoot an arrow that can be reactivated to deal 228 (+4% per level) damage and Silence enemies in an area for 2.5 seconds. The arrow detonates automatically if it reaches maximum range.

10.name: Mind Control
10.description: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.25 seconds, fire a missile that Mind Controls the first enemy Hero hit. Heroes hit are Silenced, Slowed by 30%, and forced to walk towards Sylvanas for 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Cold Embrace
13.description: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Shadow Dagger reduces the Armor of the initial target by 25 and any enemy it spreads to by 10 for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Windrunner
13.description: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.
13.longDescription: Haunting Wave can be cast a second time for free within 5 seconds after teleporting. Teleporting with Haunting Wave resets the cooldown of Withering Fire.

13.name: Remorseless
13.description: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.
13.longDescription: Increase Sylvanas's Basic Attack range by 1. Sylvanas's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse shoot an untalented shot of Withering Fire. This shot of Withering Fire applies Banshee's Curse.

16.name: Evasive Fire
16.description: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with Withering Fire grants 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%. Basic Attacks refresh this duration.

16.name: Life Drain
16.description: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.
16.longDescription: Heal for 15% of damage dealt by Sylvanas to enemies with 3 stacks of Banshee's Curse. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

16.name: Will of the Forsaken
16.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 40% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Deafening Blast
20.description: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.
20.longDescription: Enemies at the center of Wailing Arrow's explosion take 50% more damage and are Silenced for twice as long.

20.name: Dark Lady's Call
20.description: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Mind Control have their vision radius greatly reduced for 5 seconds. Mind Control's cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Withering Barrage
20.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Withering Fire reduce its cooldown by 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Feast on Fear
1.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower heals Diablo for 12% of his maximum Health over 3 seconds.

1.name: Devil's Due
1.description: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.
1.longDescription: Black Soulstone increases the effects of Regen Globes and Healing Fountains by 2.25% per Soul.

1.name: Soul Shield
1.description: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 plus 50% of Diablo's current Souls as Spell Armor for 4 seconds. Every time Diablo damages an enemy Hero, reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Sacrificial Soul
4.description: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 10 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.
4.longDescription: Stunning a Hero with Shadow Charge grants 10 Souls and 25 Armor for 4 seconds. While at 100 Souls, increase this Armor to 50.

4.name: Souls to the Flame
4.description: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.
4.longDescription: Fire Stomp grants 1 Soul every 3 times it damages an enemy Hero, and heals for an additional 1.3% of its damage dealt per Soul.

4.name: Life Leech
4.description: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 2% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 4% of his maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Diablo gains 1 Soul and heals for 2% of his maximum Health when Basic Attacking an enemy Hero. While at 100 Souls, increase this healing to 4% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Eternal Flames
7.description: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains 35 Mana.
7.longDescription: When Diablo Stuns an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower, reset the cooldown of Fire Stomp and Diablo gains 35 Mana.

7.name: Malevolence
7.description: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities cause Diablo's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds to deal an additional 100 (+4% per level) Spell Damage. Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Diabolical Momentum
7.description: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: When Diablo's Basic Attacks damage enemies, reduce the cooldown of his Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Apocalypse
10.description: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.
10.longDescription: Create a demonic rune under each enemy Hero on the battleground. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

10.name: Lightning Breath
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, become Unstoppable and Channel for up to 4 seconds, dealing 50 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemies in front of Diablo. Enemies affected are Slowed by 4% for 2 seconds, up to 40%.  Lightning Breath's direction changes with your mouse cursor position.

13.name: Devastating Charge
13.description: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase Shadow Charge's terrain collision damage by 50%.  Quest: Hit an enemy Hero against terrain 5 times.  Reward: Hitting enemy Heroes against terrain reduces their Armor by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Hellfire
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 17 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fire Stomp grants 2% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.  While at maximum stacks, Diablo deals 17 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

13.name: Cruelty
13.description: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.
13.longDescription: Stunning an enemy Hero with Shadow Charge or Overpower increases Diablo's Attack Speed by 50% for 7 seconds, up to 100%.

16.name: Domination
16.description: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.
16.longDescription: Casting Overpower resets the cooldown of Shadow Charge.

16.name: Debilitating Flames
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Fire Stomp are Slowed by 5% for 4 seconds, up to 50%. Heroes Slowed by 25% or more by Debilitating Flames deal 50% less damage.

16.name: Overpowering Nightmare
16.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.
16.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Overpower, with a 2 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Dying Breath
20.description: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.
20.longDescription: Apocalypse's cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit (to a minimum of 5 seconds) and is cast for free when Diablo dies.

20.name: Hellstorm
20.description: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.
20.longDescription: Lightning Breath lasts 200% longer.

20.name: Lord of Terror
20.description: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Activate to steal 10% of the maximum Health of nearby enemy Heroes and gain 5 Souls per Hero hit.

20.name: Hellgate
20.description: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.
20.longDescription: Teleport and place a demonic rune at target location. After 1.75 seconds the rune explodes dealing 137 (+4% per level) damage and stunning enemies for 1.75 seconds.

1.name: Quarterback
1.description: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Frag Grenade by 50%.

1.name: Dash
1.description: Increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Run and Gun by 50%. When cast, increase Tychus's Movement Speed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Press the Advantage
1.description: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Run and Gun increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5 for 5 seconds.

4.name: In the Rhythm
4.description: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.
4.longDescription: Quest: While Minigun is active, Basic Attacks against Heroes permanently increase future Minigun durations by 0.03 seconds.

4.name: The Bigger They Are...
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.
4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Minigun by 2 seconds. Increase the damage bonus to 4% while enemy Heroes are above 35% Health, but Minigun no longer has any effect on targets below 35%.

4.name: Master Assassin
4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Tychus's Attack Speed by 1%, up to 15%.  Reward: After getting 15 Takedowns, Tychus's Attack Speed is increased by an additional 10%.

7.name: Melting Point
7.description: Frag Grenade deals additional damage over time.
7.longDescription: Frag Grenade deals additional damage over time.

7.name: Combat Tactician
7.description: Casting Run And Gun reduces the cooldown of Minigun by 8 seconds.
7.longDescription: Casting Run And Gun reduces the cooldown of Minigun by 8 seconds.

7.name: Relentless Soldier
7.description: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 30%.
7.longDescription: Being Stunned or Rooted grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds, reducing damage taken by 30%.

10.name: Commandeer Odin
10.description: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.
10.longDescription: Call down an Odin to pilot. The Odin deals increased Damage, has 100% increased Basic Attack range, and uses different Abilities. The Odin has 25 Armor and lasts 23 seconds.

10.name: Drakken Laser Drill
10.description: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.
10.longDescription: Call down a Laser Drill to attack nearby enemies, dealing 142 (+4% per level) damage every second. Reactivate to assign a new target. Lasts 22 seconds.

13.name: Spray 'n' Pray
13.description: Overkill Slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% and its range is increased by 25%.
13.longDescription: Overkill Slows enemy Movement Speed by 25% and its range is increased by 25%.

13.name: That's the Stuff!
13.description: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.
13.longDescription: Minigun heals Tychus for 100% of the bonus damage dealt after it expires.

13.name: Neosteel Coating
13.description: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.
13.longDescription: Activate to gain 75 Spell Armor for 4 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.

16.name: Armor Piercing Rounds
16.description: Each time Overkill hits an enemy, its damage against them is increased by 15%, stacking up to 60% bonus damage.
16.longDescription: Each time Overkill hits an enemy, its damage against them is increased by 15%, stacking up to 60% bonus damage.

16.name: Titan Grenade
16.description: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.  Each enemy Hero hit by Frag Grenade reduces its cooldown by 1 second.
16.longDescription: Frag Grenade deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 5% of their maximum Health.  Each enemy Hero hit by Frag Grenade reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Sizzlin' Attacks
16.description: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal bonus damage to Heroes equal to 1% of their maximum Health. Stacks with Minigun.

20.name: Big Red Button
20.description: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.
20.longDescription: Odin lasts 50% longer and Ragnarok Missiles also launches a Nuclear Missile which lands 2.5 seconds later, dealing 319 (+4% per level) damage in its area.

20.name: Focusing Diodes
20.description: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the range of the Drakken Laser Drill by 50%.  Deals increasing damage the longer it remains on a single target, up to 100% extra damage.

20.name: Can Do This All Day
20.description: Reduce Overkill's cooldown by 4 seconds.  While Channeling Overkill, Tychus gains 40 Armor.
