20.longDescription: Reduce Overkill's cooldown by 4 seconds.  While Channeling Overkill, Tychus gains 40 Armor.

20.name: Bob and Weave
20.description: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5.  Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.
20.longDescription: Increases Tychus's Basic Attack range by 1.5.  Run and Gun and Odin's Thrusters gain 2 additional charges and reduces Run and Gun's Mana cost from 50 to 25.

1.name: Greater Polymorph
1.description: Passive: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%.  If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within 2 seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by 7 seconds and gain 50 Mana.
1.longDescription: Passive: Increase Polymorph's range by 30%.  If Brightwing hits an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center within 2 seconds of being Polymorphed, then reduce Polymorph's cooldown by 7 seconds and gain 50 Mana.

1.name: Hyper Shift
1.description: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase Phase Shift's healing by an additional 10% of the target's maximum Health. Nearby enemy Minion deaths reduce Phase Shift's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

1.name: Pixie Charm
1.description: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.
1.longDescription: Activate to consume 20 stacks of Bribe to instantly defeat an uncaptured non-Elite Mercenary.  Passive: Gain 1 stack of Bribe when a nearby enemy Minion dies, and 5 stacks when hitting an enemy Hero with Arcane Flare's center. Maximum 80 stacks.

4.name: Dream Shot
4.description: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Arcane Flare's range by 50%. Hitting a Hero with Arcane Flare's center reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

4.name: Unstable Anomaly
4.description: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: Increase Polymorph's Slow by 15%. Upon expiration, Polymorph deals damage to nearby enemy Heroes equal to 2% of their maximum Health.

4.name: Magic Spit
4.description: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack range by 1.1. Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Soothing Mist by 6 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Flare
7.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Arcane Flare have their Movement Speed Slowed by 20% for 3 seconds. Increase the Slow to 40% if they are hit by the center portion.

7.name: Peekaboo!
7.description: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Phase Shifting to an ally grants both Brightwing and her target a 335 (+4% per level) point Shield and reveals a large area around them for 5 seconds.

7.name: Critical Mist
7.description: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for 165 (+4% per level). Increase this healing by 100% if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.
7.longDescription: Soothing Mist heals allied Heroes for 165 (+4% per level). Increase this healing by 100% if Soothing Mist removed a disabling effect from that ally.

10.name: Blink Heal
10.description: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Teleport to a nearby ally. When teleporting to a Hero, heal them for 200 (+4% per level).  Stores up to 2 charges.

10.name: Emerald Wind
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, create an expanding nova of wind, dealing 225 (+4% per level) damage and pushing enemies away.

13.name: Pixie Boost
13.description: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Pixie Dust gives 40% bonus Movement Speed, decaying to 20% over 3 seconds.

13.name: Safety Dust
13.description: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 75% more.
13.longDescription: Increase Pixie Dust's duration by 1 second. Brightwing heals allies with an active Pixie Dust for 75% more.

13.name: Pixie Power
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Pixie Dust by 3 seconds and increase the Spell Armor granted by 25.

16.name: Hush!
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by the center of Arcane Flare are Silenced for 1 second and deal 25% less damage for 3 seconds.

16.name: Critterize
16.description: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.
16.longDescription: While Polymorphed, the target's Armor is reduced by 25, increasing the damage they take by 25%.

16.name: Phase Out
16.description: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place Brightwing in Stasis for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Invisible Friends
20.description: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
20.longDescription: Blink Heal grants Stealth to Brightwing. If Blink Heal is cast on a Hero, they are also granted Stealth. While Stealthed by Invisible Friends, Heroes heal for 20 (+4% per level) Health per second and are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

20.name: Intensive Winds
20.description: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.
20.longDescription: Permanently reduce Emerald Wind's cooldown to 5 seconds and increase its Mana cost to 200.

20.name: Speedy Dragon
20.description: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed.
20.longDescription: Permanently gain 20% Movement Speed.

20.name: Faerie Protector
20.description: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.
20.longDescription: Activate to apply Pixie Dust to all nearby Heroes.

1.name: Winter's Reach
1.description: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Frostbolt by 30%.

1.name: Lingering Chill
1.description: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Increase the duration of Chill from 4 seconds to 6 seconds.

1.name: Fingers of Frost
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to increase Jaina's Mana regeneration by 0.1 per second, up to 2 per second.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, the damage bonus from Frostbite is increased by 10%.

4.name: Frost Shards
4.description: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.
4.longDescription: Frostbolt will now pierce the first target to hit an additional target behind them.

4.name: Arcane Intellect
4.description: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Chilled target returns Mana to Jaina. Basic Attacks return 5 Mana and Abilities return 20.

4.name: Frost Armor
4.description: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Enemies that attack Jaina are Chilled. Additionally, every 10 seconds, Jaina gains 50 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

7.name: Ice Lance
7.description: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds and restores 10 Mana.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Chilled target with Frostbolt reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds and restores 10 Mana.

7.name: Ice Floes
7.description: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 7 seconds per use.
7.longDescription: Increase the width of Cone of Cold by 100% and cause each chilled Hero hit to reduce its cooldown by 3.5 seconds, up to a maximum of 7 seconds per use.

7.name: Icefury Wand
7.description: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Chilled Heroes deal 100% more damage and lower the cooldown of Blizzard by 2 seconds.

10.name: Ring of Frost
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, create a Ring of Frost in an area that deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies for 3 seconds. The ring persists for 3 seconds afterward, Chilling any enemies who touch it.

10.name: Summon Water Elemental
10.description: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Water Elemental at target location. The Water Elemental's Basic Attacks deal 62 (+4% per level) damage, splash for 25% damage and Chill. The Ability can be reactivated to retarget the Water Elemental.  Lasts 20 seconds.

13.name: Storm Front
13.description: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.
13.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Blizzard by 75% and its radius by 30%.

13.name: Ice Barrier
13.description: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain a Shield for 25% of Ability damage dealt to Chilled targets. The shield lasts 4 seconds.

13.name: Icy Veins
13.description: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to make Jaina's Basic Abilities' cooldowns recharge 200% faster and reduce their Mana cost by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.name: Snowstorm
16.description: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 50%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 100%.
16.longDescription: The damage of the second wave of Blizzard is increased by 50%. The damage of the third wave is increased by 100%.

16.name: Northern Exposure
16.description: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.
16.longDescription: Enemies damaged by Cone of Cold have their Armor lowered by 20 for 2 seconds, increasing their damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Numbing Blast
16.description: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.
16.longDescription: Cone of Cold Roots Chilled targets for 1 second.

20.name: Cold Snap
20.description: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: The center area of Ring of Frost deals 310 (+4% per level) damage and Roots enemies after the outer ring expires. Each enemy Hero hit reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

20.name: Wintermute
20.description: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Water Elemental by 50%, and the Water Elemental will now mimic Jaina's Basic Abilities for 50% damage.

20.name: Ice Blink
20.description: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport a short distance and Chill all nearby enemies.

20.name: Deep Chill
20.description: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.
20.longDescription: Frostbite's Chill can now stack a second time, slowing targets up to 40%.

1.name: Bonds of Justice
1.description: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each tether applied to a secondary target of Umbral Bind permanently increases Umbral Bind's pull damage by 15.  Reward: After applying 5 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's pull damage by 75.  Reward: After applying 10 tethers to secondary targets, increase Umbral Bind's cleave damage by 30%.

1.name: Pursuit of Vengeance
1.description: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds and each Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance reduces the cooldown of Umbral Bind by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Each Hero tethered by Umbral Bind reduces the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance by 2.5 seconds. Each Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance reduces the cooldown of Umbral Bind by 1 second.

1.name: Naisha's Memento
1.description: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.
1.longDescription: Activate to make primary Basic Attacks bounce between nearby enemies up to 2 times. Lasts 8 seconds.  Recharge Naisha's Memento by hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.

4.name: Pin Down
4.description: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 3 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives.  Reward: Increase Fan of Knives damage by 25%.  Reward: Each additional time 3 enemy Heroes are hit by a single Fan of Knives, gain an additional 5% damage, up to 40%.  Reward: Hit 4 enemy Heroes with a single Fan of Knives to instantly gain all Rewards.

4.name: Blade Dance
4.description: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.
4.longDescription: Using Fan of Knives deals 50 (+4% per level) Physical Damage to enemies around Maiev.

4.name: Sudden Vengeance
4.description: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.
4.longDescription: After blinking with Spirit of Vengeance, the shadow explodes, damaging all nearby enemy Heroes for 6% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Elune's Wrath
7.description: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.
7.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single Fan of Knives causes the next Fan of Knives to drop a star on targets that deals 77 (+4% per level) damage when it impacts.

7.name: Bonds of Corruption
7.description: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 and are Slowed by 20% for 4 seconds
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes pulled by Umbral Bind have their Armor reduced by 10 and are Slowed by 20% for 4 seconds

7.name: Ruthless Spirit
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Spirit of Vengeance increases all damage Maiev deals by 15% for 4 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

10.name: Containment Disc
10.description: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.
10.longDescription: Throw a glaive in the target direction. If an enemy Hero is hit, Containment Disc can be reactivated to remove their vision and Time Stop them for 4 seconds.  Containment Disc automatically activates 6 seconds after hitting a Hero.

10.name: Warden's Cage
10.description: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon 8 Warden Avatars as a cage around Maiev. After 1.5 seconds, enemy Heroes that come in contact with an Avatar consume it and are knocked to the center of the cage. Warden Avatars last 5 seconds.

13.name: Bladed Armor
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Fan of Knives grants 5 Armor for 5 seconds, up to 20 Armor.

13.name: Chain Gang
13.description: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Tethering at least 2 enemy Heroes with Umbral Bind grants 35 Armor for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shadow Armor
13.description: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.
13.longDescription: Blink grants 20 Armor for 3.5 seconds. Maiev's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Vengeful Knives
16.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Fan of Knives that hits enemy Heroes to deal 1% maximum Health as bonus damage, up to 5%.
16.longDescription: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Fan of Knives that hits enemy Heroes to deal 1% maximum Health as bonus damage, up to 5%.

16.name: Cruel Chain
16.description: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.
16.longDescription: Umbral Bind grants 25% Movement Speed for 2.5 seconds. In addition, each time Maiev deals damage to tethered targets, Umbral Bind's pull damage to all targets is increased by 30%, up to 150%.

16.name: Armored Assault
16.description: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.
16.longDescription: While Maiev has positive Armor of any kind, all Physical Damage dealt is increased by 20%.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Vengeance
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Spirit of Vengeance.  Recharge Shadow Orb by damaging enemy Heroes with Spirit of Vengeance 5 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Huntress
20.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed and Attack Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Physical Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

20.name: Shadow Orb: Shadow Strike
20.description: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.
20.longDescription: Activate to deal 75 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy Hero, Slowing them by 30% and reducing their Armor by 20 for 4 seconds.  Recharge Shadow Orb by dealing Spell Damage to enemy Heroes 10 times.

1.name: Fetid Touch
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Weighted Pustule.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by 2.5 seconds and its Mana cost by 25.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Weighted Pustule by an additional 2.5 seconds and remove its Mana cost.

1.name: Reactive Ballistospores
1.description: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: When taking damage below 50% Health, instantly spread a Weighted Pustule to all nearby enemy Heroes and reset the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch.  This effect has a 15 second cooldown.

1.name: Low Blow
1.description: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.
1.longDescription: Lurking Arm deals 100% more damage to enemy Heroes below 30% Health.

1.name: Spine Launcher
1.description: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks become ranged and Slow enemies by 20% for 1.5 seconds, but deal 40% less damage.

4.name: One Good Spread...
4.description: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: After a Healing Pathogen infests 3 targets, restore 10 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Healing Pathogen by 2 seconds.

4.name: Biotic Armor
4.description: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 75 for 2.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Pathogen grants 15 Physical Armor to targets while active on them. Detonating Bio-Kill Switch increases this bonus to 75 for 2.5 seconds.

4.name: Vigorous Reuptake
4.description: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.
4.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch heals for 30% more when detonating 3 or more Healing Pathogens.

7.name: The Long Pitch
7.description: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase the range of Weighted Pustule by 50%. Detonating 2 or more Weighted Pustules causes Stukov's Bio-Kill Switch and Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 3 seconds.

7.name: Growing Infestation
7.description: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Lurking Arm's area expands by 50% over 2.5 seconds, but it cannot be Channeled for longer than 4 seconds.

7.name: Targeted Excision
7.description: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Detonating exactly 1 Weighted Pustule (but any number of Healing Pathogens) with Bio-Kill Switch reduces the cooldown of Bio-Kill Switch to 5 seconds and other Basic Abilities by 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Flailing Swipe
10.description: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.
10.longDescription: Swipe 3 times in front of Stukov over 1.75 seconds, dealing 48 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit and knocking them away. Each swipe is larger than the previous.

10.name: Massive Shove
10.description: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.
10.longDescription: Extend Stukov's arm. If it hits an enemy Hero, they are rapidly shoved until they collide with terrain, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds. Stukov gains 50 Armor while shoving an enemy.

13.name: It Hungers
13.description: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 10 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.
13.longDescription: Increase the range of Lurking Arm by 20%. If Lurking Arm damages enemy Heroes 10 times, its cooldown is reset and its Mana cost is refunded.

13.name: Lingering Spines
13.description: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.
13.longDescription: Lurking Arm persists for 1.5 seconds after it is canceled.

13.name: Virulent Reaction
13.description: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Detonating a Weighted Pustule on an enemy who is inside of Lurking Arm Roots them for 2 seconds.

13.name: Poppin' Pustules
13.description: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.
13.longDescription: Detonating Weighted Pustule with Bio-Kill Switch within 1.5 seconds of its expiration increases its damage by 150% and applies its damage and Slow in an area. Enemy Heroes hit have a Weighted Pustule applied to them.

16.name: Superstrain
16.description: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.
16.longDescription: Whenever an ally with Healing Pathogen is Stunned or Rooted, they are instantly healed for 250 (+4% per level) Health.

16.name: Universal Carrier
16.description: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.
16.longDescription: Healing Pathogen can continually spread through Stukov, but its healing is reduced by 40%.

16.name: Pox Populi
16.description: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch no longer removes Healing Pathogen but instead sets its duration to 3 seconds.

20.name: Controlled Chaos
20.description: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.
20.longDescription: Flailing Swipe gains 2 additional charges, but each use only swings 1 time, at maximum range.  Additionally, its cooldown is decreased to 25 seconds, and its Mana cost is reduced from 60 to 25.

20.name: Push Comes To Shove
20.description: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.
20.longDescription: Massive Shove Slows its target by 50% for 4 seconds upon colliding with terrain. If Massive Shove pushes a target for more than 1.25 seconds, its cooldown is reduced by 15 seconds.

20.name: Top Off
20.description: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.
20.longDescription: Healing Pathogen's heal over time is increased by 30% while its target is above 60% Health.

20.name: Bio-Explosion Switch
20.description: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, dealing 230 (+4% per level) damage, applying a Weighted Pustule, and Silencing enemy Heroes inside for 2.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Bio-Kill Switch now also detonates Lurking Arm, dealing 230 (+4% per level) damage, applying a Weighted Pustule, and Silencing enemy Heroes inside for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Once Again the First Time
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 Heroes with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes.  Reward: Increase the maximum number of active Echoes to 2.

1.name: Deep Breathing
1.description: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 1%, up to 20%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Dragon's Breath by 4 seconds and its Mana cost from 65 to 40.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Dragon's Breath hits a Hero increase its damage by 1%, up to 20%.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Dragon's Breath by 4 seconds and its Mana cost from 65 to 40.

1.name: Timewalker's Pursuit
1.description: Gain 15% Spell Power and reduce the arming time of Time Traps by 0.75 seconds. Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Gain 15% Spell Power and reduce the arming time of Time Traps by 0.75 seconds. Activate to reveal the targeted area for 2 seconds. Enemies seen are revealed for 4 seconds.

4.name: Chronic Conditions
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds and allies gain 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Time Troubles
4.description: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: After its Time Stop ends, enemies affected by Time Trap lose 20 Armor for 3 seconds and allies gain 20 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Andorhal Anomaly
4.description: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the charges and maximum active Time Traps to 3, and reduce its cooldown by 8 seconds.

7.name: Bronze Talons
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants 50% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes grants 50% additional Basic Attack damage for 5 seconds.

7.name: Mobius Loop
7.description: Dragon's Breath deals 30% bonus damage to enemies hit by its center.  Enemy Heroes hit by its center are Slowed by 60% for 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Dragon's Breath deals 30% bonus damage to enemies hit by its center.  Enemy Heroes hit by its center are Slowed by 60% for 0.75 seconds.

7.name: A Proper Greeting
7.description: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Damaging a Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Hero grants 25% additional damage for 5 seconds.

10.name: Slowing Sands
10.description: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.
10.longDescription: Summon a sand vortex that Slows enemies by 10% every 0.25 seconds, up to 70%.

10.name: Temporal Loop
10.description: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.
10.longDescription: Choose an enemy Hero. After 3 seconds, they are teleported back to the location where Temporal Loop was cast on them.  Basic Abilities recharge 500% faster for 3 seconds after casting Temporal Loop.

13.name: Gnome Speed Ahead!
13.description: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: After casting Sand Blast, Chromie gains 20% Movement Speed and 200% increased Health Regeneration for 3 seconds.

13.name: Here and There
13.description: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.
13.longDescription: Activate to teleport to an area near an Echo, swapping it with Chromie's previous location.

13.name: Time Out
13.description: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.
13.longDescription: Activate to place Chromie in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for up to 5 seconds. Can be reactivated to end the effect early.

16.name: Shifting Sands
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Chromie's primary Sand Blast grants 5% Spell Power for 8 seconds, up to a maximum of 50%. The duration is refreshed whenever an enemy is damaged by the primary Sand Blast.

16.name: Fast Forward
16.description: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.
16.longDescription: If Chromie's primary Sand Blast travels at least 50% of its base distance and hits a Hero, its cooldown is reduced to 0.5 seconds and it refunds 10 Mana.

16.name: Quantum Overdrive
16.description: Activate to increase Spell Power by 30% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Spell Power by 30% for 8 seconds. Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast reduces this cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Unravelling
20.description: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 7 up to 35. Slowing Sands persists for 5 seconds after it is cancelled.
20.longDescription: Every 0.25 seconds, enemy Heroes Slowed by Slowing Sands have their Spell Armor reduced by 7 up to 35. Slowing Sands persists for 5 seconds after it is cancelled.

20.name: Stuck in a Loop
20.description: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.
20.longDescription: Temporal Loop teleports the target a second time after the first, and Basic Abilities continue recharging for an additional 3 seconds. Increase the cooldown recharge rate from 500% to 700%.

20.name: Piercing Sands
20.description: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.
20.longDescription: Sand Blasts cast from Chromie and her Echoes now pierce all enemies hit.

20.name: Blessing of the Bronze
20.description: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to cause Chromie and all allied Heroes to gain 20% Movement Speed and their Basic Abilities recharge 35% faster for 8 seconds.  Hitting an enemy Hero with Sand Blast from Chromie or her Echoes reduces the cooldown of Blessing of the Bronze by 1 second.

1.name: Impaling Light
1.description: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 125% and its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.
1.longDescription: Celestial Charge's final damage is increased by 125% and its cooldown is reduced by 1.25 seconds for each Valorous Brand on the target when the Stun completes.

1.name: Consuming Flame
1.description: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.
1.longDescription: Increase the center damage of Solarion's Fire by an additional 125% and its Slow amount by 15%. The first enemy Hero hit with Solarion's Fire restores 30 Mana.

1.name: Burn The Impure
1.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
1.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark deals bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

4.name: Sovereign Armor
4.description: Molten Armor grants 25 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Molten Armor grants 25 Armor for 1.5 seconds. Damaging an enemy Hero with Molten Armor increases the duration of the Armor by 0.5 seconds.

4.name: Battle Hunger
4.description: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 70%.
4.longDescription: Increase the healing of Valorous Brand by 70%.

4.name: Press Forward
4.description: Gain 10 Armor while being healed by a Regeneration Globe.  Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).
4.longDescription: Gain 10 Armor while being healed by a Regeneration Globe.  Damaging an enemy Hero sets the duration of an active Regeneration Globe on Imperius to 8 seconds (unless it is already higher).

7.name: Flash of Anger
7.description: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 165 (+4% per level) damage to the target and nearby enemies and grants Imperius a 275 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Consuming a mark from Celestial Charge deals 165 (+4% per level) damage to the target and nearby enemies and grants Imperius a 275 (+4% per level) point Shield for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blaze of Glory
7.description: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.
7.longDescription: Solarion's Fire leaves a line of scorched earth along its center, exploding after 2 seconds and dealing 135 (+4% per level) damage.  This explosion benefits from and consumes Valorous Brand marks.

7.name: Holy Fervor
7.description: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.
7.longDescription: Activate to cause the next 4 Basic Attacks within 10 seconds to cleave for 30% additional damage.

10.name: Angelic Armaments
10.description: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.
10.longDescription: Summon a ring of blazing swords that grants 1000 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, this ability can be reactivated within 5 seconds to launch 6 swords toward an area, each dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

10.name: Wrath of the Angiris
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge in the target direction, lifting the first enemy Hero hit into the Heavens. While in the air, Imperius can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds, slam the target into the ground, dealing 375 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1 second.

13.name: Pathetic Mortals
13.description: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their Movement Speed by 25% and their damage by 50% for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Stunning enemy Heroes with Celestial Charge reduces their Movement Speed by 25% and their damage by 50% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Divine Rage
13.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand mark reduces the cooldown of Molten Armor by 1 second.

13.name: Heat of Battle
13.description: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.
13.longDescription: Increase Molten Armor's healing against Heroes by 2% for every 1% Health Imperius is missing.

16.name: Celestial Swiftness
16.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.
16.longDescription: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds after casting Celestial Charge. Gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds for each Hero stunned with Celestial Charge.

16.name: Melting Touch
16.description: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Consuming a Molten Armor mark reduces the target's Armor by 25 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Valorous Pursuit
16.description: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to teleport to an enemy that has been marked by Valorous Brand and gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Heavenly Host
20.description: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.
20.longDescription: Nearby allied Heroes gain 600 (+4% per level) Shield for 3 seconds.  If the Shield lasts the full duration, fire a sword at the nearest enemy Hero, dealing 140 (+4% per level) damage.

20.name: Unrelenting Descent
20.description: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Consuming a Valorous Brand reduces the cooldown of Wrath of the Angiris by 10 seconds.

20.name: Brand of Solarion
20.description: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 5 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.
20.longDescription: Reduce the duration of Valorous Brand to 5 seconds, but it is no longer consumed when triggered.

20.name: Impervious
20.description: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable and gain 75 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Hitting Heroes with the center of Solarion's Fire reduces this cooldown by 5 seconds.

1.name: Swift Sweep
1.description: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast speed of Sacred Sweep by 50%.

1.name: Increasing Clarity
1.description: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Sacred Sweep hits a Hero in the center, increase the center damage by 2, up to 50.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, this center damage bonus is increased to 180.

1.name: Righteous Assault
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sweep by 3 seconds for each enemy Hero hit by its center.

1.name: Searing Light
1.description: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.
1.longDescription: Ray of Heaven also deals damage to enemies in the area equal to 30% of the energy consumed.

4.name: Majestic Span
4.description: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.
4.longDescription: Increases the radius of Sacred Sweep by 15%.

4.name: Heavy Burden
4.description: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 50% for 3 seconds after the stun.
4.longDescription: When an enemy Hero is stunned by Detainment Strike, their Movement Speed is slowed by 50% for 3 seconds after the stun.

4.name: Repeated Offense
4.description: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.
4.longDescription: Enemies hit by Detainment Strike are knocked back 25% farther.  Quest: Every time Detainment Strike stuns a Hero, increase the stun damage by 10, up to 60.  Reward: After stunning 6 Heroes, increase this damage bonus to 250.

7.name: Glimmer of Hope
7.description: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.
7.longDescription: Collecting a Regeneration Globe reduces the cost of Auriel's next Ray of Heaven by 75%.

7.name: Empathic Link
7.description: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.
7.longDescription: Auriel stores 25% of damage taken by allies with Bestow Hope.

7.name: Energized Cord
7.description: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.
7.longDescription: Increases the energy stored from Auriel's Basic Attacks to 120% of the damage against Heroes and 55% of the damage against non-Heroes.  Does not affect Auriel's Bestow Hope ally.

10.name: Resurrect
10.description: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.  Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.
10.longDescription: Channel on the spirit of a dead ally for 1 second. After a 5 second delay, they are brought back to life with 100% of their maximum Health at the location where they died.  Auriel can use this ability while dead to resurrect herself.

10.name: Crystal Aegis
10.description: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Place an allied Hero into Stasis for 2 seconds. Upon expiration, Crystal Aegis deals 255 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

13.name: Blinding Flash
13.description: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the center area of Sacred Sweep are blinded for 2 seconds.

13.name: Converging Force
13.description: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.
13.longDescription: Enemies hit by the outer area are pushed slightly toward the center.

13.name: Piercing Lash
13.description: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Detainment Strike now pierces and hits all enemy Heroes in a line, reducing the cooldown by 2 seconds for each Hero hit.

16.name: Reservoir of Hope
16.description: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.
16.longDescription: Quest: Each maximum energy Ray of Heaven Auriel casts increases the maximum amount of energy that can be stored by 75.

16.name: Will of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 20% Attack Speed.

16.name: Wrath of Heaven
16.description: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.
16.longDescription: Allies with Bestow Hope gain 10% Spell Power.

20.name: Light Speed
20.description: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.
20.longDescription: Resurrected allies gain 200% increased Movement Speed, decaying over 4 seconds.  While a resurrected ally remains alive, Resurrect's next cooldown recharges 100% faster.

20.name: Diamond Resolve
20.description: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.
20.longDescription: When Crystal Aegis expires, it grants the target 75 Armor for 5 seconds, reducing damage taken by 75%.

20.name: Angelic Flight
20.description: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.
20.longDescription: After 2 seconds, fly to a target location.

20.name: Shield of Hope
20.description: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant all nearby allied Heroes a shield for 3 seconds equal to 50% of the amount of Health they are missing.

1.name: Renew
1.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes empower the next Flash Heal to also heal for 130 (+4% per level) over 5 seconds.

1.name: Pursued by Grace
1.description: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 35 (+4% per level).
1.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero heals the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 35 (+4% per level).

1.name: Bold Strategy
1.description: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Anduin gains his other level 1 Talents, but Flash Heal's cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

4.name: Moral Compass
4.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.
4.longDescription: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at 2 Heroes close to its apex for 70% damage.

4.name: Holy Reach
4.description: Increase the Root duration of Chastise from 1.25 to 1.5 seconds.  After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack deals 75% more damage and heals allied Heroes near him for 100 (+4% per level).
4.longDescription: Increase the Root duration of Chastise from 1.25 to 1.5 seconds.  After hitting an enemy with Chastise, Anduin's next Basic Attack deals 75% more damage and heals allied Heroes near him for 100 (+4% per level).

4.name: Inner Fire
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Basic Attack range by 15%.

7.name: Binding Heal
7.description: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 115 (+4% per level).
7.longDescription: Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 115 (+4% per level).

7.name: Power Word: Shield
7.description: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 185 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: If Divine Star hits an enemy Hero, gain a Shield that absorbs 185 (+4% per level) damage for 4 seconds.

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)
7.longDescription: If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds.  This effect has a 10 second cooldown.  Current Health required: 133 (+4% per level)

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 25% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.  The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 (+4% per level) damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.  Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.
13.longDescription: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% Movement Speed.  Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Push Forward!
13.description: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.  While gaining 20% Movement Speed, Chastise's cooldown recharges 25% faster.
13.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero grants 2.5% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 20%.  While gaining 20% Movement Speed, Chastise's cooldown recharges 25% faster.

13.name: Enchant Boots - Lion's Speed
13.description: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.  Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for 280 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 5% Movement Speed. This bonus is quadrupled while Leap of Faith's cooldown is available.  Allies pulled by Leap of Faith are healed for 280 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

16.name: Evenhanded Blessings
16.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 20% and  refund 50% of its cooldown.
16.longDescription: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 20% and  refund 50% of its cooldown.

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).
16.longDescription: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 (+4% per level) and damaging enemies for 105 (+4% per level).

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal and its next cast heals for 40% more.  Damaging enemy Heroes with Divine Star reduces this cooldown by 8 seconds.

16.name: Lightwell
16.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.
16.longDescription: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 75 (+4% per level). The well only fades after healing 10 times or when recast.  This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.
20.longDescription: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin.

20.name: Glyph of Faith
20.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.
20.longDescription: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

20.name: Varian's Legacy
20.description: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks burn enemies for 87 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.

20.name: Desperate Prayer
20.description: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.
20.longDescription: Activate to desperately heal an allied Hero for 540 (+4% per level), but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.

1.name: Wolfheart
1.description: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increase the cooldown reduction from Basic Attacks during Inner Beast from 0.5 to 1 second.

1.name: Perfect Aim
1.description: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.
1.longDescription: Increases Gilnean Cocktail's range by 30% and refunds 45 Mana if it hits an enemy Hero.

1.name: Viciousness
1.description: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.
1.longDescription: Increases Inner Beast's duration to 4 seconds, and causes Ability damage to also refresh its duration.

4.name: Thick Skin
4.description: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.
4.longDescription: Using Darkflight grants 50 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks while in Worgen Form, reducing the damage taken by 50%.

4.name: Eyes in the Dark
4.description: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Disengage grants Stealth for 3 seconds.

4.name: Insatiable
4.description: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.
4.longDescription: Inner Beast causes Basic Attacks to restore 10 Mana.

7.name: Quicksilver Bullets
7.description: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.
7.longDescription: Increases Greymane's Human Basic Attack range by 1.1.

7.name: Incendiary Elixir
7.description: Quest: Reduce the cooldown of Gilnean Cocktail by 2 seconds. Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Quest: Reduce the cooldown of Gilnean Cocktail by 2 seconds. Every time Greymane hits an enemy Hero with the explosion damage from Gilnean Cocktail, increase its explosion damage by 20, up to 300.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, the cooldown is reduced by an additional 2 seconds.

7.name: Wizened Duelist
7.description: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.
7.longDescription: Quest: Every 6 Human Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Basic Attack damage by 1%, up to 30%. Worgen Basic Attacks grant credit for 3 Basic Attacks. Half of this bonus is lost upon death.

10.name: Go for the Throat
10.description: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.
10.longDescription: Leap at an enemy Hero and shapeshift into a Worgen, slashing for 355 (+4% per level) damage. If this kills them, the Ability can be used a second time within 10 seconds for free.

10.name: Cursed Bullet
10.description: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.
10.longDescription: Greymane shapeshifts into a Human and fires a bullet that hits the first enemy Hero in its path, dealing 35% of their current Health in damage.  Does not affect Vehicles.

13.name: Running Wild
13.description: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.
13.longDescription: Increases Darkflight and Disengage's range by 35%.

13.name: Unfettered Assault

13.longDescription: Increases Razor Swipe's lunge distance by 60%, and Worgen Basic Attacks reduce Razor Swipe's cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Inner Beast increases Movement Speed by 30% once it has been active for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Inner Beast by an additional 40% after it has been active for 4 seconds.

16.name: Executioner

16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.description: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 3% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.name: Unleashed
20.description: Passive: Go For The Throat's damage is increased by 25%.  If Go for the Throat kills its target, refund its Mana cost and reset the cooldowns of Greymane's Abilities.
20.longDescription: Passive: Go For The Throat's damage is increased by 25%.  If Go for the Throat kills its target, refund its Mana cost and reset the cooldowns of Greymane's Abilities.

20.longDescription: Cursed Bullet's damage is reduced to 30% of current health but its cooldown is reduced by 20 seconds.

20.longDescription: Human Basic Attacks splash for 100% damage behind the target.

20.name: Tooth and Claw
20.description: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage. Increase Razor Swipe's damage by 100%.
20.longDescription: Worgen Basic Attacks cleave for 100% damage. Increase Razor Swipe's damage by 100%.

1.name: Death's Reach
1.description: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.
1.longDescription: Increase Wraith Strike's range by 35%.

1.name: On a Pale Horse
1.description: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.
1.longDescription: Gain an additional 20% Movement Speed while mounted.

1.name: Fear the Reaper
1.description: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Movement Speed by 25% and pass through other units for 4 seconds.

4.description: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.
4.longDescription: Soul Rip deals 50% more damage to Heroes if it hits only one Hero.

4.name: Throwing Shade
4.description: Increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 30.
4.longDescription: Increase Death Shroud's range by 33%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and reduce its Mana cost from 50 to 30.

4.name: Black Harvest
4.description: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Quest: Apply Reaper's Mark to Heroes for a total of 180 seconds.  Reward: Permanently increase Reaper's Mark's duration by 2 seconds.

7.name: Cold Hand
7.description: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Soul Rip Slows enemies by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Massacre
7.description: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.
7.longDescription: Wraith Strike now damages and applies Reaper's Mark to enemies around its target.

7.name: Touch of Death
7.description: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to reduce healing received by Heroes afflicted by Reaper's Mark by 50% for 4 seconds.

10.name: Tormented Souls
10.description: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.
10.longDescription: Unleash a torrent of souls, continually applying Reaper's Mark to nearby enemies for 4 seconds.  When Tormented Souls is cast and when it expires, reset the cooldown of Wraith Strike.

10.name: Last Rites
10.description: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Apply a death sentence to an enemy Hero that, after 2 seconds, deals damage equal to 50% of their missing Health.  Quest: Enemies killed between the application of Last Rites and within 1.5 seconds of it dealing damage permanently reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds, to a minimum of 20 seconds.

13.name: Soul Siphon
13.description: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Increase Soul Rip's bonus healing from Heroes to 4.75% of the Hero's maximum Health.

13.name: Ethereal Existence
13.description: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.
13.longDescription: Gain 10 Physical Armor per enemy Hero afflicted by Reaper's Mark, up to a maximum of 30.

13.name: Inevitable End
13.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.
13.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 2 seconds, but remove all active Reaper's Marks.

13.name: Shroud of Wisdom
13.description: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: After 2 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor for 4 seconds.

16.name: Soul Collector
16.description: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.
16.longDescription: Reduce Soul Rip's cooldown by 0.5 seconds and increase its range by 25%.

16.name: Mortality
16.description: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When damaging a Hero, Wraith Strike deals bonus damage equal to 8% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Memento Mori
16.description: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Reaper's Mark deals 80% increased damage after afflicting an enemy for more than 4 seconds.

20.name: Reaper of Souls
20.description: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.
20.longDescription: Increase Tormented Souls' duration by 2 seconds.  While Tormented Souls is active, Hero Takedowns refresh the duration.

20.name: Angel of Death
20.description: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.
20.longDescription: Last Rites heals for 100% of the damage dealt, and its current and future cooldown reduction bonuses are doubled.

20.name: Final Curtain
20.description: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.
20.longDescription: Death Shroud leaves a trail in its wake for 4 seconds, applying Reaper's Mark to enemies in its area.

20.name: No One Can Stop Death
20.description: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.
20.longDescription: Activate while dead to immediately respawn at the Hall of Storms but increase Malthael's next respawn time by 25%.

1.name: Monster Hunter
1.description: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.
1.longDescription: Reduces the Mana cost of Hungering Arrow by 40 and increases the damage it deals to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 150%.

1.name: Caltrops
1.description: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.
1.longDescription: Drop 3 Caltrops while Vaulting. Caltrops do 60 (+4% per level) damage and Slow enemies by 40% for 1 second.  Quest: Spend 160 seconds at 10 stacks of Hatred.  Reward: Vault cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and its Mana cost is reduced from 50 to 25.

1.name: Hot Pursuit
1.description: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: When at 10 stacks of Hatred, the Movement Speed bonus increases to 20% total and Valla gains 4 Mana per second.

4.name: Puncturing Arrow
4.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Hungering Arrow increases its damage by 5, up to a maximum of 100.  Reward: After gaining 100 bonus damage, gain an additional 75 bonus damage and Hungering Arrow also bounces 1 additional time.

4.name: Punishment
4.description: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.
4.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred increases the damage of Multishot by 4%.

4.name: Creed of the Hunter
4.description: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.
4.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 10%.  Quest: Use 100 Basic Attacks against Heroes.  Reward: Hatred grants an additional 2% Basic Attack Damage per stack.

7.name: Arsenal
7.description: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Multishot also fires 3 grenades which deal 120 (+4% per level) damage. Each enemy Hero hit by a grenade reduces the cooldown of Multishot by 2 seconds.

7.name: Death Dealer
7.description: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.
7.longDescription: Increases Vault Basic Attack damage bonus from 6% to 14% per stack of Hatred. If this attack kills its victim, the Mana cost and cooldown of Vault are refunded.

7.name: Repeating Arrow
7.description: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.
7.longDescription: The cooldown for Hungering Arrow is reset when Vault is used.

10.name: Strafe
10.description: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Rapidly attack enemies within 10 range for 60 (+4% per level) damage per hit, prioritizing Heroes over Minions. Valla is able to move and use Vault while strafing. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Vengeance
10.description: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.
10.longDescription: Launch a wave of Shadow Beasts that deals 250 (+4% per level) damage and stuns enemies in the target area for 0.5 seconds.  Stores up to 2 charges.

13.name: Siphoning Arrow
13.description: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.
13.longDescription: Valla heals for 75% of the damage dealt to Heroes by Hungering Arrow.

13.name: Tempered by Discipline
13.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, Basic Attacks heal for 25% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Gloom
13.description: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.
13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Hatred, granting 3 Spell Armor per Hatred consumed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Permanently gain 20 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 20%.

16.name: Frost Shot
16.description: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increases the range of Multishot by 20% and it also slows by 25% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Seething Hatred
16.description: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.
16.longDescription: While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain 15% Spell Power. Basic Attacks now grant 2 stacks of Hatred.

16.name: Manticore
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same Heroic target deals an additional 5% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: Death Siphon
20.description: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.
20.longDescription: Strafe also fires penetrating bolts in a line for 34 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds. 25% of the damage dealt with Strafe is returned as Health.

20.description: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce the charge cooldown of Rain of Vengeance by 5 seconds.

20.name: Rancor
20.description: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.
20.longDescription: Each stack of Hatred also increases Attack Speed by 2%. While at 10 stacks of Hatred, gain an additional 30% Attack Speed.

20.name: Farflight Quiver
20.description: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.
20.longDescription: Increases Valla's Basic Attack range by 2.2.

1.name: Overwhelming Power
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 40% Attack Speed and causes Basic Attacks to heal for 50% of the damage dealt for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 40% Attack Speed and causes Basic Attacks to heal for 50% of the damage dealt for 4 seconds.

1.name: Ruthless Momentum
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 80% Health.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Telekinesis from 30 to 20.  Telekinesis's cooldown recharges 75% faster while above 80% Health.

1.name: Extended Lightning
1.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.
1.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%.  Quest: Hit Heroes with the center of Lightning Surge.  Reward: After hitting 5 Heroes, increase Lightning Surge's range by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, Lightning Surge's center also Slows enemies by 40% for 2 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with the center of a single cast, increase Sadism by 10% and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.name: Chaos Reigns
4.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Discord Strike.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, increase Discord Strike's damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 2 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 60.  Reward: After hitting 3 Heroes with a single Discord Strike, increase its damage by 100 and instantly gain all other Rewards.

4.longDescription: Increase the Lightning Surge damage bonus to enemies between Alarak and his victim to 175%.  Repeatable Quest: Each Hero hit by the center of Lightning Surge permanently increases the damage bonus by 4%.

4.name: Show of Force
4.description: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 61 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit with 3 of Alarak's Abilities within 2 seconds take an additional 61 (+4% per level) damage and increase Sadism by 2%, stacking up to 20%.   Sadism gained from Show of Force is lost on death.

7.name: Dissonance
7.description: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Discord Strike's Silence duration by 0.75 seconds.

7.name: Hindered Motion
7.description: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 30% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Telekinesis Slows enemies by 30% for 3 seconds.

7.name: Applied Force
7.description: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.
7.longDescription: Reduce Sadism by 10%, but Telekinesis pushes 20% further and has 20% increased range.

10.name: Deadly Charge
10.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
10.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

10.name: Counter-Strike
10.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: Blade of the Highlord
13.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes increase Sadism by 2% stacking up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Blade of the Highlord is lost on death.

13.name: Pure Malice
13.description: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Increase Sadism by 10% any time an allied Hero dies, up to 40%.  Sadism gained from Pure Malice is lost on death.

13.name: Rite of Rak'Shir
13.description: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.
13.longDescription: Activate to mark an enemy Hero for 300 seconds.  Hitting the marked Hero with Discord Strike increases Sadism by 3%. Killing the marked Hero increases Sadism by 5% and lowers the cooldown of Rite of Rak'Shir to 10 seconds.  Sadism gained from Rite of Rak'Shir is lost on death.

16.name: Lethal Onslaught
