16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Discord Strike grants 50% of Sadism's damage bonus to Alarak's Basic Attacks for 4 seconds. Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh this duration.

16.name: Lightning Barrage
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with the center of Lightning Surge allows it to be cast again for free on a different primary target within the next 2 seconds. This free cast cannot benefit from Lightning Barrage.

16.name: Mocking Strikes
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Silenced, Slowed, or Rooted Heroes reduce the cooldown of Alarak's Basic Abilities by 3 seconds.

20.name: Counter-Strike
20.description: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.
20.longDescription: Alarak targets an area and channels for 1 second, becoming Protected and Unstoppable. After, if he took damage from an enemy Hero, he sends a shockwave that deals 275 (+4% per level) damage.  This ability will take over Alarak's Trait button.

20.name: Deadly Charge
20.description: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.
20.longDescription: After channeling, Alarak charges forward dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage to all enemies in his path. Distance is increased based on the amount of time channeled, up to 1.5 seconds.  Issuing a Move order while this is channeling will cancel it at no cost. Taking damage will interrupt the channeling.

20.name: Last Laugh
20.description: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to the chosen location and remove all Roots, Slows, and damage over time effects. If Alarak fails to hit enemy Heroes 3 times with Basic Abilities within 4 seconds of using Last Laugh, his Health is reduced to 1.

20.name: Hasty Bargain
20.description: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to permanently reduce Alarak's Sadism by 4% and reset the cooldowns of his Basic Abilities.

1.name: Widowmakers
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Corpse Spiders by 10.  Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30% and the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Corpse Spiders by 10.  Reward: After Corpse Spiders attack Heroes 100 times, their attack damage is increased by 30% and the cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.

1.name: Pandemic
1.description: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.
1.longDescription: Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes with Plague of Toads, it spawns 2 additional toads.

1.name: Thing of the Deep
1.description: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.  Reward: After gaining 50 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain 5% Spell Power.  Reward: After gaining 100 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain an additional 5% Spell Power.
1.longDescription: Increase the range of Nazeebo's Basic Abilities by 20%.  Reward: After gaining 50 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain 5% Spell Power.  Reward: After gaining 100 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, gain an additional 5% Spell Power.

4.name: Hexed Crawlers
4.description: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.
4.longDescription: Corpse Spiders restore 1% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana when they attack an enemy Hero.

4.name: Big Voodoo
4.description: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.
4.longDescription: Increases the Health and Mana bonuses from Voodoo Ritual by 100%.

4.name: Blood Ritual
4.description: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.
4.longDescription: If an enemy dies while poisoned by Voodoo Ritual, restore 2% of Nazeebo's maximum Health and Mana.

7.name: Spirit of Arachyr
7.description: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.
7.longDescription: If Corpse Spiders hits only one enemy, it creates 2 additional spiders.

7.name: Dead Rush
7.description: Zombie Wall deals 100% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Zombie Wall deals 100% more damage. When it expires up to 5 remaining Zombies uproot and attack nearby enemies for 3 seconds.

7.name: Toads of Hugeness
7.description: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.
7.longDescription: Increase the damage and explosion radius of Plague of Toads by 25% after each hop, up to a maximum of 100%.

10.name: Gargantuan
10.description: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Gargantuan to guard an area for 20 seconds. Deals 100 (+4% per level) damage when summoned, attacks for 140 (+4% per level) damage, and can be ordered to stomp nearby enemies.

10.name: Ravenous Spirit
10.description: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel a Ravenous Spirit that deals 230 (+4% per level) damage per second. Cannot move while channeling. Lasts for 8 seconds.

13.name: Guardian Toads
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Plague of Toads gives 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Superstition
13.description: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 40 Spell Armor. Heroic Basic Attacks against Nazeebo remove this bonus for 3 seconds.

13.name: Ice Block
13.description: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to place yourself in Stasis and gain Invulnerability for 3 seconds.

16.name: Spider Colony
16.description: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Corpse Spider Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldowns of Zombie Wall and Plague of Toads by 0.25 seconds.

16.name: Ring of Poison
16.description: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.
16.longDescription: Zombie Wall lasts 1 second longer, and the center is filled with poison that deals a total of 319 (+4% per level) damage over 4 seconds. This damage starts small and increases over the duration.

16.name: Soul Harvest
16.description: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to increase Nazeebo's Health and Spell Power by 7% for each nearby enemy, up to a maximum of 35%. Lasts 15 seconds.

20.name: Humongoid
20.description: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce Gargantuan's cooldown by 40 seconds and its Mana cost by 50%.

20.name: Annihilating Spirit
20.description: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50%, and each time it damages an enemy Hero increase its damage 5% for the rest of its duration.
20.longDescription: Increases the range of Ravenous Spirit by 50%, and each time it damages an enemy Hero increase its damage 5% for the rest of its duration.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

20.name: Vile Infection
20.description: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Quest: Reach 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual.  Reward: After reaching 175 stacks of Voodoo Ritual, it can also be applied to Heroes and its damage is increased from 67 (+4% per level) to 167 (+4% per level) over 6 seconds.

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.
1.longDescription: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Shadow Hunter
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 3, up to 45.  Reward: Upon gathering 15 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1.5 seconds.

1.name: Move Unseen
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 1 second. Gain 30% Movement Speed while Stealthed.

4.name: Rending Cleave
4.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

4.name: Psionic Strength
4.description: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.
4.longDescription: Dealing damage to enemy Heroes increases all damage dealt by 6% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 30%.

4.name: Darkness Descends
4.description: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain 40% Attack Speed for 5 seconds.  Passive: Gain 20% Attack Speed.

7.name: Wormhole
7.description: After 1.25 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from within 4 seconds.

7.name: Seeker In the Dark
7.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Warp Skirmisher
7.description: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal 50% more damage.
7.longDescription: Vorpal Blade gains a 2nd charge. Teleporting to an enemy with Vorpal Blade or entering Permanent Cloak causes Zeratul's next Basic Attack to deal 50% more damage.

10.name: Might of the Nerazim
10.description: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.
10.longDescription: Activate to cast an untalented version of Zeratul's most recently used Basic Ability, dealing 50% less damage.  Passive: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 30% more damage.

10.name: Void Prison
10.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.
10.longDescription: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, placing allies and enemies in Time Stop for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

13.name: Shroud of Adun
13.description: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 20% of his Maximum Health over 3 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.
13.longDescription: Zeratul gains a Shield equal to 20% of his Maximum Health over 3 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

13.name: Mending Strikes
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Master Warp-Blade
16.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.
16.longDescription: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

16.name: Void Slash
16.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 40% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

16.name: Sentenced to Death
16.description: Deal 25% increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.
16.longDescription: Deal 25% increased damage to enemies while they are marked or Slowed by Singularity Spike.

20.name: Twilight Falls
20.description: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Might of the Nerazim resets the cooldown of all Basic Abilities.

20.name: Unwavering Pressure
20.description: Singularity Spike no longer costs Mana. Basic Attacks against enemies reduce its cooldown by 1.25 seconds, double versus Heroes.
20.longDescription: Singularity Spike no longer costs Mana. Basic Attacks against enemies reduce its cooldown by 1.25 seconds, double versus Heroes.

20.name: Shadow Stride
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Vorpal Blade by 10 seconds. Casting Vorpal Blade grants Zeratul a Shield that absorbs up to 260 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Vorpal Blade by 10 seconds. Casting Vorpal Blade grants Zeratul a Shield that absorbs up to 260 (+4% per level) damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Shadow Mending
20.description: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.
20.longDescription: Heal for 60% of Spell Damage dealt to Heroes.

1.name: Reactive Parry
1.description: Damaging enemies with the first slash of Twin Blades grants Artanis 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  If the target is an enemy Hero, then the second slash grants Artanis an additional stack.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Damaging enemies with the first slash of Twin Blades grants Artanis 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%.  If the target is an enemy Hero, then the second slash grants Artanis an additional stack.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Amateur Opponent
1.description: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.
1.longDescription: Twin Blades attacks deal 150% bonus damage to non-Heroes.

1.name: Protector Of Aiur
1.description: Quest: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Artanis's Attack damage by 0.1%.  Takedowns grant 1% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes increase Artanis's Attack damage by 0.1%.  Takedowns grant 1% bonus damage.

4.name: Psionic Synergy
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

4.name: Shield Battery
4.description: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.
4.longDescription: Shield Overload's cooldown recharges 125% faster while its Shield is active, and the Shield duration is increased by 1 second.

4.name: Shield Surge
4.description: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.
4.longDescription: Increases Shield Overload's Shields by 75% while below 25% Health.

7.name: Solarite Reaper
7.description: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.
7.longDescription: Increases the damage of the first dash of Blade Dash by 150%.

7.name: Chrono Surge
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds and Slows the enemy's Movment Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Phase Prism grants 40% bonus Attack Speed for 5 seconds and Slows the enemy's Movment Speed by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Suppression Pulse
10.description: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: Fire a large area pulse from the Spear of Adun, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Blinding enemies for 4 seconds. Unlimited range.

10.name: Purifier Beam
10.description: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: Target an enemy Hero with an orbital beam from the Spear of Adun, dealing 184 (+4% per level) damage per second for 8 seconds. The beam will chase the target as they move.  Unlimited range.

13.name: Templar's Zeal
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Blade Dash from 50 to 25. Each time that Shield Overload activates, reduce the cooldown of Blade Dash by 6 seconds.

13.name: Triple Strike
13.description: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.
13.longDescription: Increases Twin Blades's number of Basic Attacks to 3, but increase its cooldown by 1 second.

13.name: Graviton Vortex
13.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 50 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Phase Prism from 50 to 25. Hitting an enemy Hero with Basic Attacks or Blade Dash reduces the cooldown of Phase Prism by 1.75 seconds.

13.name: Phase Bulwark
13.description: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.
13.longDescription: Shield Overload grants 50 Spell Armor while active and for 2 seconds after it expires.

16.name: Titan Killer
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 0.5% of the target's maximum Health in damage, increased to 1.5% when empowered by Twin Blades.

16.name: Force of Will
16.description: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Casting Basic Abilities reduces the cooldown of Shield Overload by 5 seconds.

16.name: Blades of a Templar
16.description: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Attack Speed by 30%. Basic Attacks Slow by 20% for 1.25 seconds.

20.name: Orbital Bombardment
20.description: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.
20.longDescription: Suppression Pulse gains an additional charge.  There is a 10 second cooldown between uses.

20.name: Target Purified
20.description: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Increase the speed of Purifier Beam by 15%. If the target of Purifier Beam dies, it automatically recasts on the nearest visible enemy Hero.

20.name: Zealot Charge
20.description: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increase Twin Blades' charge distance by 100%.

20.name: Plasma Burn
20.description: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.
20.longDescription: While Shield Overload is active, deal 70 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.

1.name: Frost Presence
1.description: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 20%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.
1.longDescription: Quest: Root enemy Heroes with Howling Blast.  Reward: After Rooting 5 Heroes, Howling Blast's cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds.  Reward: After Rooting 10 Heroes, Howling Blast's range is increased by 20%.  Reward: After Rooting 20 Heroes, Howling Blast also Roots enemies in its path.

1.name: Eternal Hunger
1.description: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.
1.longDescription: Quest: Use Frostmourne Hungers on an enemy Hero.  Reward: Increases the Mana it restores by 4, to a maximum of 40, and its damage by 4.

1.name: Rime
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

4.name: Deathlord
4.description: Increase the range of Death Coil by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and if Death Coil is used on an enemy Hero, its Mana cost is refunded.
4.longDescription: Increase the range of Death Coil by 30%, reduce its cooldown by 3 seconds, and if Death Coil is used on an enemy Hero, its Mana cost is refunded.

4.name: Frozen Wastes
4.description: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Frozen Tempest Mana cost reduced by 2 per second.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Frozen Tempest.  Reward: After damaging enemy Heroes 150 times with Frozen Tempest, the Movement and Attack Speed Slows of Frozen Tempest last an extra 1.5 seconds against enemy Heroes.

4.name: Icy Talons
4.description: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.
4.longDescription: Gain 3% Attack Speed for 1.5 seconds every time a Hero is damaged by Frozen Tempest, to a maximum of 60%.

7.name: Immortal Coil
7.description: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.
7.longDescription: Gain the healing effect of Death Coil even when used on enemies. If Death Coil is used on Arthas, it heals for an additional 50% bonus healing.

7.name: Rune Tap
7.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 5% of his max Health.
7.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack heals Arthas for 5% of his max Health.

7.name: Icebound Fortitude
7.description: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%, and reduce the duration of Stuns, Slows, and Roots against Arthas by 75% for 3 seconds.

10.name: Army of the Dead
10.description: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 (+4% per level) damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Summons Ghouls that last 15 seconds and atttack for 20 (+4% per level) damage. Sacrifice Ghouls to heal for 267 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Summon Sindragosa
10.description: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 230 (+4% per level) damage and Slows enemies by 60% for 4 seconds. Also disables Minions, Mercenaries, Monsters and Structures for 20 seconds.

13.name: Shattered Armor
13.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Howling Blast have their Armor reduced by 15 for 4 seconds.

13.name: Biting Cold
13.description: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.
13.longDescription: Each second an enemy is damaged by Frozen Tempest, it deals 12.5% bonus damage, up to a 50% bonus.

13.name: Frost Strike
13.description: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Reduces Frostmourne Hungers' cooldown by 2 seconds. Frostmourne Hungers also Slows the enemy by 50% for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Embrace Death
16.description: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.
16.longDescription: Death Coil deals more damage and heals more the lower Arthas's current Health is, to a maximum of 100% bonus damage and healing.

16.name: Remorseless Winter
16.description: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes that remain within Frozen Tempest for 3 seconds are Rooted for 1.25 seconds. This effect can only happen once every 10 seconds.

16.name: Frostmourne Feeds
16.description: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.
16.longDescription: Increases the amount of Basic Attacks empowered by Frostmourne Hungers to 2.

20.name: Legion of Northrend
20.description: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls deal 50% more damage, heal for an additional 50%, and last 5 seconds longer.
20.longDescription: 3 additional Ghouls are created. Ghouls deal 50% more damage, heal for an additional 50%, and last 5 seconds longer.

20.name: Absolute Zero
20.description: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2.5 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Sindragosa flies twice as far. Enemy Heroes are Rooted for 2.5 seconds, and then Slowed by 60% for 4 seconds.

20.name: Death's Advance
20.description: Increases Movement Speed by 10%. Frozen Tempest's maximum Movement Speed Slow and Attack Speed Slow increased from 40% to 60%
20.longDescription: Increases Movement Speed by 10%. Frozen Tempest's maximum Movement Speed Slow and Attack Speed Slow increased from 40% to 60%

20.name: Anti-Magic Shell
20.description: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 4 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.
20.longDescription: Activate to make Arthas immune to Spell Damage for 4 seconds and heal Arthas for 25% of the damage prevented.

1.name: Vigor
1.description: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.
1.longDescription: Valeera regenerates an additional 3 Energy per second.  Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes, increase Valeera's maximum Energy to 120.

1.name: Subtlety
1.description: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: After teleporting with Ambush, Cheap Shot, or Garrote, regenerate 10 Energy per second for 5 seconds.

1.name: Combat Readiness
1.description: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Each Combo Point spent grants 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing its damage by 75%. Stores up to 3 charges.

1.name: Crippling Poison
1.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.
1.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds Slow targets by 20% for 4 seconds.  Activating Crippling Poison does not break Stealth.

4.name: Relentless Strikes
4.description: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.
4.longDescription: Reduces the Energy cost of Sinister Strike by 15.

4.name: Hemorrhage
4.description: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.
4.longDescription: Valeera's Basic Attacks deal 40% additional damage to enemies affected by Garrote.

4.name: Initiative
4.description: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.
4.longDescription: Ambush, Cheap Shot, and Garrote grant 15% Movement Speed for 3 seconds and award 2 Combo Points.

4.name: Wound Poison
4.description: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.
4.longDescription: Activate to make Valeera's next damaging Ability and subsequent Abilities within 4 seconds reduce enemy healing received by 50% for 4 seconds.  Activating Wound Poison does not break Stealth.

7.name: Mutilate
7.description: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.
7.longDescription: Sinister Strike now hits with both blades, dealing 125% additional damage, but its range is reduced by 1.

7.name: Fatal Finesse
7.description: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.
7.longDescription: Quest: Each time Blade Flurry damages an enemy Hero, its damage increases by 6, up to 90.  Reward: After damaging 15 Heroes with Blade Flurry, permanently reduce its Energy cost by 20.

7.name: Slice and Dice
7.description: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.
7.longDescription: Eviscerating an enemy with 3 Combo Points grants 150% Attack Speed. Lasts 3 seconds or 3 Basic Attacks.  Passive: Basic Attacks restore 2 Energy.

10.name: Smoke Bomb
10.description: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Create a cloud of smoke. While in the smoke, Valeera is Unrevealable, can pass through other units, and gains 30 Armor, reducing damage taken by 30%. Valeera can continue to attack and use abilities without being revealed. Lasts 5 seconds.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

10.name: Cloak of Shadows
10.description: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.
10.longDescription: Valeera is enveloped in a Cloak of Shadows, which immediately removes all damage over time effects from her. For 1.5 seconds, she becomes Unstoppable and gains 75 Spell Armor, reducing Ability Damage taken by 75%.  Using this Ability does not break Stealth.

13.name: Death From Above
13.description: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Teleporting with Ambush reduces the cooldown of Vanish by 4 seconds.

13.name: Blind
13.description: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the duration of Cheap Shot's Blind by 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Strangle
13.description: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Using Garrote on a Hero reduces their Spell Power by 40% for 6 seconds.

16.name: Seal Fate
16.description: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: Sinister Strike deals 50% additional damage and generates an additional Combo Point when used against Silenced, Rooted, or Stunned enemy Heroes.

16.name: Assassinate
16.description: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.
16.longDescription: Ambush deals 50% additional damage and reduces the target's Armor by an additional 10 if no other enemy Heroes are within 4 range of the victim.

16.name: Thistle Tea
16.description: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 100 Energy.  Activating Thistle Tea does not break Stealth.

20.name: Adrenaline Rush
20.description: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.
20.longDescription: While in the Smoke Bomb, Valeera regenerates an additional 40 Energy per second.

20.name: Enveloping Shadows
20.description: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.
20.longDescription: Whenever Valeera uses Vanish, she also gains Cloak of Shadows.

20.name: Rupture
20.description: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.
20.longDescription: Increase Garrote's damage over time by 100%. Valeera's Basic Attacks refresh the duration of Garrote.

20.name: Elusiveness
20.description: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.
20.longDescription: Increases Valeera's Movement Speed while Vanished by an additional 20%.

1.name: Immolation
1.description: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: After using Sweeping Strike, burn nearby enemies for 22 (+4% per level) damage a second for 4 seconds.

1.name: Battered Assault
1.description: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.
1.longDescription: Increase Sweeping Strike's Basic Attack damage bonus duration from 3 to 5 seconds. If Sweeping Strike hits 2 Heroes its damage bonus is increased from 35% to 125%.

1.name: Unending Hatred
1.description: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Minion kills grant 0.2 Basic Attack Damage. Hero Takedowns grant 1 Basic Attack Damage.  Reward: After gaining 20 increased Basic Attack Damage, receive an additional 20 Basic Attack Damage.

4.name: Rapid Chase
4.description: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.
4.longDescription: Dive grants 20% Movement Speed for 3 seconds. If the target is an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

4.name: Friend or Foe
4.description: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.
4.longDescription: Increases the range of Dive by 20% and allows it to be used to dive to allied Heroes.

4.name: Unbound
4.description: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.
4.longDescription: Sweeping Strike can go over walls and terrain.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes with Sweeping Strike, gain a second charge.

7.name: Reflexive Block
7.description: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.
7.longDescription: Using Dive grants 75 Physical Armor against the next 3 Hero Basic Attacks for 4 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.name: Thirsting Blade
7.description: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.
7.longDescription: Betrayer's Thirst's healing from Basic Attacks is increased from 30% to 50% while Sweeping Strike's damage bonus is active.

7.name: Hunter's Onslaught
7.description: Basic Abilities heal for 35% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.
7.longDescription: Basic Abilities heal for 35% of the damage they deal. This bonus is doubled versus Heroes.

10.name: Metamorphosis
10.description: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.
10.longDescription: Transform into Demon Form at the target location, dealing 46 (+4% per level) damage in the area. Temporarily increases maximum Health by 220 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit by the initial impact. Lasts for 18 seconds.

10.name: The Hunt
10.description: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Charge to target unit, dealing 251 (+4% per level) damage on impact and stunning for 1 second.

13.name: Nimble Defender
13.description: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.
13.longDescription: If Sweeping Strike hits an enemy Hero, gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds, reducing damage taken by 25%.

13.name: Elusive Strike
13.description: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.
13.longDescription: Sweeping Strike reduces the cooldown of Evasion by 3 seconds every time it damages an enemy Hero.

13.name: Sixth Sense
13.description: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.
13.longDescription: While active, Evasion grants Illidan 75 Spell Armor against the next 2 sources of Spell Damage, reducing their damage by 75%.

16.name: Marked for Death
16.description: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dive deals an extra 180 (+4% per level) damage if used consecutively on a target within 10 seconds.

16.name: Fiery Brand
16.description: Every 3rd attack against the same Hero deals an additional 7% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd attack against the same Hero deals an additional 7% of their maximum Health as damage.

16.name: Blades of Azzinoth
16.description: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting 5 Heroes with Sweeping Strike allows Blades of Azzinoth to be activated, increasing Basic Attack damage by 75% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Form
20.description: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.
20.longDescription: Permanently remain in Demonic Form. Metamorphosis also increases Attack Speed by 20% and reduces the duration of Stuns, Roots, and Slows by 50%. Illidan can now mount in Demonic Form.

20.name: Nowhere to Hide
20.description: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.
20.longDescription: The Hunt gains unlimited range. Illidan passively reveals enemy Heroes below 25% Health anywhere on the Battleground.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 30 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame.  Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25% and the healing provided by Regen Globes by 50%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regen Globes.  Reward: Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption.  Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.
4.longDescription: Drain Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster while it is channeling. If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Improved Life Tap
4.description: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.
4.longDescription: Increase the Mana restored by Life Tap to 35%.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.
4.longDescription: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health.  Stores up to 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.
7.longDescription: Drain Life deals 50% more damage and Slows the target's Movement Speed by 40%.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases Spell Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes in an area and Fear them for 2 seconds. While Feared, Heroes are Silenced and are forced to run away from Horrify's center.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.
13.longDescription: Drain Life heals for 75% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 30% but his respawn time is increased by 10 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.
16.longDescription: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 10% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Dealing 600 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes causes the next cast of Life Tap to cost no Health and grant Gul'dan 25% Spell Power for 5 seconds.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
20.longDescription: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 20 Armor, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
20.longDescription: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.

1.name: Warbreaker
1.description: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Stun Heroes with Groundbreaker.  Reward: After Stunning 5 Heroes, Groundbreaker's Stun deals an additional 165 (+4% per level) damage over 3 seconds to Heroes.  Reward: After Stunning 15 Heroes, permanently reduce Groundbreaker's cooldown by 2 seconds.

1.name: Unrivaled Strength
1.description: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.
1.longDescription: Increase Wrecking Ball's throw range by 25% and its damage by 125%.

1.name: Body Check
1.description: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to deal 111 (+4% per level) damage to a target enemy and Slow them by 35% for 3 seconds. Enemy Heroes hit receive 30% reduced healing for 3 seconds.

4.name: In for the Kill
4.description: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.
4.longDescription: Increase Bloodthirst's damage against non-Heroes by 70%. Killing enemies with Bloodthirst resets its cooldown and refunds its Mana cost.

4.name: Thirst for Battle
4.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the cooldown of Bloodthirst by 2 seconds.

4.name: Indomitable
4.description: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to become Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

7.name: Intimidation
7.description: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Groundbreaker reduces the Attack Speed of Heroes hit by 40% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Oppressor
7.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes reduce the target's Spell Power by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Into the Fray
7.description: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.
7.longDescription: Activate to throw a nearby ally and grant them 25 Armor for 3 seconds. Deals 91 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies upon impact and Slows them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.  While in flight, allied Heroes are Unstoppable.

10.name: Warlord's Challenge
10.description: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Silence nearby Heroes and force them to attack Garrosh for 2 seconds.

10.name: Decimate
10.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.
10.longDescription: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and Slow them by 40% for 1.5 seconds. Deals 100% more damage to Heroes, and each Hero hit reduces the cooldown by 1 second.  Stores up to 3 charges.

13.name: Defensive Measures
13.description: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: If Groundbreaker Stuns a Hero, Garrosh gains a 350 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

13.name: Bloodcraze
13.description: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: When hitting a Hero, Bloodthirst heals for an additional 15% of Garrosh's maximum Health over 3 seconds.

13.name: Double Up
13.description: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Armor Up can be activated to increase its Armor bonus by 100% for 3 seconds.

16.name: Mortal Combo
16.description: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.
16.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Groundbreaker's Stun and throwing them with Wrecking Ball within 3 seconds reduces Wrecking Ball's cooldown by 10 seconds, regardless of order.

16.name: Earthshaker
16.description: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Wrecking Ball Stuns enemies near the impact area for 0.5 seconds.

16.name: Seasoned Soldier
16.description: Gain 5% maximum Health, increase Groundbreaker's Slow duration by 1 second, and Bloodthirst gains an additional charge.
16.longDescription: Gain 5% maximum Health, increase Groundbreaker's Slow duration by 1 second, and Bloodthirst gains an additional charge.

20.name: Death Wish
20.description: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds.  If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Warlord's Challenge by 0.5 seconds.  If an enemy Hero is killed while Taunted by Warlord's Challenge, its cooldown is reduced by 45 seconds.

20.name: Deadly Calm
20.description: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Heroes hit by Decimate deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

20.name: Titanic Might
20.description: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.
20.longDescription: Wrecking Ball now throws the 2 closest enemies.

20.name: Inner Rage
20.description: Body Check gains an additional charge and its healing reduction is increased by an additional 45%.
20.longDescription: Body Check gains an additional charge and its healing reduction is increased by an additional 45%.

1.name: Unyielding Power
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Skull Missile.  Reward: After hitting 20 Heroes, increase Skull Missile's damage by 100.  Reward: After hitting 40 Heroes, Skull Missile's cooldown is permanently reduced to 5 seconds.

1.name: Furious Spark
1.description: Every 3rd hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 65 (+4% per level) bonus damage and grants Mephisto 2 Mana.
1.longDescription: Every 3rd hit from Lightning Nova against the same target deals 65 (+4% per level) bonus damage and grants Mephisto 2 Mana.

1.name: Malicious Intent
1.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 25% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then increase the duration of the Spell Power bonus to 10 seconds after it ends.
1.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 25% Spell Power while active and for 2.5 seconds after ending.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then increase the duration of the Spell Power bonus to 10 seconds after it ends.

4.name: Hateful Mending
4.description: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.
4.longDescription: Skull Missile heals Mephisto for 60% of the damage it deals to Heroes.

4.name: Static Barrier
4.description: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: At the end of its duration, Lightning Nova grants Mephisto a Shield equal to 40% of the damage it dealt to Heroes. Lasts 5 seconds.

4.name: Spite
4.description: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 150%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration Globe healing duration by 150%. Every tick of Regeneration Globe healing activates Lord of Hatred, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second.

7.name: Ghastly Armor
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20 Armor while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.

7.name: Frost Storm
7.description: While Shade of Mephisto is active, enemies who are hit by Lightning Nova are Slowed by 15% for 1 second and the Slow from Skull Missile is increased to 50%.
7.longDescription: While Shade of Mephisto is active, enemies who are hit by Lightning Nova are Slowed by 15% for 1 second and the Slow from Skull Missile is increased to 50%.

7.name: Trickery
7.description: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then reset the cooldown of Shade of Mephisto.
7.longDescription: Shade of Mephisto grants 20% Movement Speed while active and for 2.5 seconds after it ends.  If Mephisto hits enemy Heroes at least 18 times with his Basic Abilities while Shade of Mephisto is active, then reset the cooldown of Shade of Mephisto.

10.name: Consume Souls
10.description: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel for 2.5 seconds, revealing all enemy Heroes. After the Channel completes, all enemy Heroes take 357 (+4% per level) damage and are Slowed by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

10.name: Durance of Hate
10.description: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, unleash a wave of evil spirits that Root the first enemy Hero hit for 2.5 seconds and deal 250 (+4% per level) damage to them over the same duration.  Durance of Hate spreads outwards from its initial target, Rooting and damaging additional nearby enemy Heroes.

13.name: Abhorred Skull
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 25% Spell Power for 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Skull Missile grants 25% Spell Power for 6 seconds.

13.name: Hysteria
13.description: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.  Mephisto is healed for 15% of his maximum Health and Mana when he casts his Heroic Ability.
13.longDescription: Lord of Hatred also reduces the cooldown of Mephisto's Heroic Ability.  Mephisto is healed for 15% of his maximum Health and Mana when he casts his Heroic Ability.

13.name: Shard of Hate
13.description: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks hit enemies near the primary target and activate Lord of Hatred against enemy Heroes, reducing Basic Ability cooldowns by 1 second per Hero hit.

16.name: Lightning Reaction
16.description: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.
16.longDescription: Skull Missile explodes on contact with Lightning Nova, dealing 138 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

16.name: Static Field
16.description: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When Lightning Nova's damage bonus reaches 30%, enemy Heroes within its radius take damage equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Animosity
16.description: Increase the duration of Lightning Nova by 1 second and the maximum amount of bonus damage it can deal from 30% to 36%.
16.longDescription: Increase the duration of Lightning Nova by 1 second and the maximum amount of bonus damage it can deal from 30% to 36%.

20.name: Consumed by Hatred
20.description: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.
20.longDescription: Consume Souls deals bonus damage equal to 10% of the target's missing Health. If Consume Souls initial cast kills a Hero it will cast 1 additional time.

20.name: Unspeakable Horror
20.description: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.
20.longDescription: Durance of Hate Silences enemies for 3 seconds after its Root expires.

20.name: Mimic
20.description: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.
20.longDescription: While both Shade of Mephisto and Lightning Nova are active, Lightning Nova also casts from the Shade's location.

20.name: Shade Lord
20.description: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.
20.longDescription: Activate to swap locations with Shade of Mephisto and refresh its duration.  Passive: Shade of Mephisto benefits from all of Mephisto's level 7 Talents.

1.name: Boneslicer
1.description: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.
1.longDescription: Grievous Throw now pierces through all enemies hit and restores 15 Mana per Hero hit. Additionally, Grievous Throw's mark is no longer removed by Basic Attacks.

1.name: Recklessness
1.description: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.
1.longDescription: While Zul'jin is below 75% Health, he gains 10% Spell Power. While he is below 50% Health, his Basic Attack damage is increased by 20%.

1.name: Headhunter
1.description: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.
1.longDescription: Quest: Zul'jin's first Takedown against each enemy Hero permanently increases his damage dealt by 2%.  Reward: After getting Takedowns on every enemy Hero, Basic Attack range is increased by 1.1.

4.name: Troll's Blood
4.description: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Increase Regeneration's healing by 25%. If Regeneration fully finishes, restore 10% of Zul'jin's maximum Mana.

4.name: Voodoo Shuffle
4.description: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.
4.longDescription: Activate to remove Roots and Slows.  Passive: Lower the cooldown and Mana cost of Regeneration by 40%.

4.name: Amani Hide
4.description: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.
4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Amani Rage by 10 seconds and gain 15 Armor while regenerating Health from it.

7.name: Vicious Assault
7.description: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Grievous Throw's mark by 3 seconds and its damage bonus by 35%.

7.name: Arcanite Axes
7.description: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.
7.longDescription: Quest: Twin Cleave's damage is permanently increased by 0.75 every time it hits a Hero.

7.name: Ferocity
7.description: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.
7.longDescription: Increases the Attack Speed bonus of Berserker by 40%.

10.name: Taz'dingo!
10.description: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!
10.longDescription: For the next 4 seconds, Zul'jin is Unkillable, and cannot be reduced to less than 1 Health. Taz'dingo!

10.name: Guillotine
10.description: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.
10.longDescription: Zul'jin launches a massive axe into the air that drops on the targeted area, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage plus bonus damage the lower his Health is.

13.name: Lacerate
13.description: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.
13.longDescription: Increase the Slow amount of each Twin Cleave axe by 10%.

13.name: Eye of Zul'jin
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant Zul'jin 6% Movement Speed for 2 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ensnare
13.description: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Throw a net forward, Rooting the first enemy Hero hit for 1.5 seconds.

16.name: No Mercy!
16.description: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.
16.longDescription: Zul'jin's Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes marked with Grievous Throw ignore Armor.

16.name: Wrong Place Wrong Time
16.description: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.
16.longDescription: If an enemy is hit by both Twin Cleave axes at the same time, they take an additional 100 (+4% per level) damage and count as 5 Hero hits for You Want Axe?.

16.name: Let the Killing Begin
16.description: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: When Zul'jin kills an enemy, his Attack Speed is increased by 5%, up to 40%, for 12 seconds. Basic Attacks refresh the duration.  Hero Takedowns instantly grant 40% Attack Speed.

20.name: Amani Resilience
20.description: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.
20.longDescription: Increase Taz'dingo's duration by 1 second. Upon expiring, Zul'jin heals for 50% of the damage he dealt during Taz'dingo.

20.name: Buzzsaw
20.description: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.
20.longDescription: After impact, Guillotine continues forward, dealing 75% damage to enemies hit. If a Hero is killed by Guillotine, Zul'jin is instantly healed to full.

20.name: Forest Medicine
20.description: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.
20.longDescription: Regeneration is no longer Channeled, and cannot be interrupted.

20.name: A Surprise For Ya
20.description: Basic Attacks bounce to a nearby enemy for 50% damage, prioritizing enemy Heroes.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks bounce to a nearby enemy for 50% damage, prioritizing enemy Heroes.

1.name: Salvation
1.description: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 40% and heal Tyrael for 140 (+4% per level) Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount Tyrael gains from Righteousness by 40% and heal Tyrael for 140 (+4% per level) Health if his Shield is destroyed. Does not increase the Shield amount gained by allies.

1.name: Justice for All
1.description: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield applied to allies by Righteousness to 75% of the Shield gained by Tyrael.

1.name: Ardent Restoration
1.description: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 20 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.
1.longDescription: Dealing damage to a Hero heals Tyrael for 20 (+4% per level) Health over 5 seconds. Dealing damage resets this timer, and the heal amount stacks up to 10 times.

4.name: Stalwart Angel
4.description: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.
4.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor while El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting.

4.name: Bound by Law
4.description: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase El'druin's Might's Slow by 10%. Tyrael's Basic Attacks against enemies Slowed by El'druin's Might increase the Slow duration by 1 second, up to 4 seconds.

4.name: Divine Vigor
4.description: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 75% of the damage dealt.
4.longDescription: If Smite hits an enemy, Tyrael's Basic Attacks within the next 4 seconds heal for 75% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Reciprocate
7.description: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.
7.longDescription: When Tyrael's Shield from Righteousness expires or is destroyed, it deals 170 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.name: Purge Evil
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite increases Tyrael's Basic Attack damage by 60% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Swift Retribution
7.description: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Smite grants 20% more Movement Speed and also grants 25% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

10.name: Judgment
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, charge an enemy Hero, dealing 150 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Nearby enemies are knocked away and take 75 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Sanctification
10.description: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds create a field of holy energy that makes allied Heroes Invulnerable. Lasts 3 seconds.

13.name: Sword of Justice
13.description: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.
13.longDescription: Upon teleporting using El'druin's Might, El'druin swaps places with Tyrael, and El'druin's Might can be reactivated to teleport an additional time.

13.name: Holy Ground
13.description: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.
13.longDescription: Create a ring for 3 seconds that blocks enemies from entering the area teleported to using El'druin's Might.

13.name: Law and Order
13.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 35%.
13.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Smite reduces the cooldown of Righteousness by 1 second. Each allied Hero Shielded by Righteousness increases the damage of the next Smite by 35%.

16.name: Horadric Reforging
16.description: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Tyrael's Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of El'druin's Might by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Burning Halo
16.description: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Both Tyrael and El'druin deal 18 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Teleporting increases this damage from Tyrael by 150% for 2 seconds.

16.name: Smite the Wicked
16.description: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.
16.longDescription: While El'druin's Might is active, and for 2 seconds after teleporting, Smite's cooldown recharges 125% faster.

20.name: Angel of Justice
20.description: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Judgment by 50%, and reduces the cooldown by 40 seconds.

20.name: Holy Arena
20.description: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.
20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Sanctification by 1 second and increase the damage of allies inside by 25%.

20.name: Seal of El'Druin
20.description: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 50% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

20.name: Defense of the Angels
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 3 seconds.  Each time Tyrael damages an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Basic Ability, increase the duration of this Armor bonus by 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 3 seconds.  Each time Tyrael damages an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack or Basic Ability, increase the duration of this Armor bonus by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Convection
1.description: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.
1.longDescription: Quest: Damaging an enemy Hero with Flamestrike increase its damage by 5, up to 100. This bonus is lost on death.  Reward: After hitting 20 enemy Heroes, increase Flamestrike damage by an additional 100 and no longer lose any bonuses on death.

1.name: Fel Infusion
1.description: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.
1.longDescription: Increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by 4%. Kael'thas heals for 94 (+4% per level) Health when activating Verdant Spheres.

1.name: Mana Addict
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Kael'thas's maximum Mana by 15.  Reward: After gathering 20 Globes, Kael'thas can activate Arcane Barrier to gain a Shield equal to 100% of his maximum Mana for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.

4.name: Nether Wind
4.description: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.
4.longDescription: Increases Gravity Lapse's range by 30%. When Gravity Lapse hits an enemy Hero, refund 80 Mana.

4.name: Energy Roil
4.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Gravity Lapse by 70.  If Gravity Lapse hits a Hero, reduce its cooldown by 9 seconds.

4.name: Mana Tap
4.description: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.
4.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres restores 4% of Kael'thas's maximum Mana.

7.name: Burned Flesh
7.description: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.
7.longDescription: When Flamestrike damages 2 or more Heroes, they take additional damage equal to 8% of their maximum Health.

7.name: Sun King's Fury
7.description: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.
7.longDescription: Living Bombs that spread to enemy Heroes deal 35% more damage.

7.name: Sunfire Enchantment
7.description: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activating Verdant Spheres causes Kael'thas's next 2 Basic Attacks to instead deal 115 (+4% per level) Spell Damage.  If both of these Attacks hit enemy Heroes, gain 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

10.name: Phoenix
10.description: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Launch a Phoenix to an area, dealing 78 (+4% per level) damage to enemies along the way. The Phoenix persists for 7 seconds, attacking enemies for 78 (+4% per level) damage and splashing for 39 (+4% per level) damage.

10.name: Pyroblast
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, cast a slow-moving fireball that deals 810 (+5% per level) damage to an enemy Hero and 405 (+5% per level) damage to enemies nearby.

13.name: Pyromaniac
13.description: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Backdraft
13.description: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Fission Bomb
13.description: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.
13.longDescription: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

16.name: Fury of the Sunwell
16.description: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.
16.longDescription: Flamestrike will explode a second time 1.5 seconds later.

16.name: Ignite
16.description: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.
16.longDescription: Flamestrikes apply Living Bomb to the enemy Hero closest to its center who is not currently affected by Living Bomb.

16.name: Twin Spheres
16.description: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.
16.longDescription: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

20.name: Rebirth
20.description: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.
20.longDescription: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

20.name: Presence Of Mind
20.description: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50%. Heroes that are hit by Flamestrike or have Living Bomb spread to them reduce the cooldown of Pyroblast by 10 seconds.

20.name: Master of Flames
20.description: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.
