20.longDescription: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

20.name: Flamethrower
20.description: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 4 seconds.

1.name: Invigoration
1.description: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.
1.longDescription: If Hamstring hits a Hero, half of the Mana cost is refunded and the cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

1.name: Block
1.description: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.
1.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by 75%.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.name: Chop Meat
1.description: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
1.longDescription: Increases Hamstring damage by 100% to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Flail Axe
4.description: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.
4.longDescription: Increases the length of Hamstring by 40%.

4.name: Unrelenting Pursuit
4.description: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.
4.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by 33% upon impact.

4.name: Cheap Shot
4.description: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.
4.longDescription: Hamstring does 100% more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

7.name: Insatiable Blade
7.description: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.
7.longDescription: While facing a branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by 25%.

7.name: Victuals
7.description: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.
7.longDescription: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals 5% of his maximum health.

7.name: Meat Shield
7.description: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.
7.longDescription: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 50%.

10.name: Furnace Blast
10.description: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.
10.longDescription: After a 3 second delay, fire explodes around The Butcher dealing 500 (+4% per level) damage to enemies.  Can be cast while using Ruthless Onslaught.

10.name: Lamb to the Slaughter
10.description: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Throw a hitching post that attaches to the nearest enemy Hero after a 1 second delay. This deals 171 (+4% per level) damage and causes the enemy to be chained to the post and Silenced for 3 seconds.

13.name: Cleaver
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 35% of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

13.name: Savage Charge
13.description: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Brutal Strike
13.description: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.
13.longDescription: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next 3 Basic Attacks within 5 seconds deal an additional 15% damage.

16.name: Crippling Slam
16.description: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.
16.longDescription: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 30%.

16.name: Enraged
16.description: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.
16.longDescription: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for 10 seconds, gaining 40% Attack Speed and 25 Armor, reducing damage taken by 25%.  This effect has a 25 second cooldown.

16.name: Blood Frenzy
16.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5% increased Attack and Movement Speed for 3 seconds, up to 25%.

20.name: Fires of Hell
20.description: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.
20.longDescription: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

20.name: Slaughterhouse
20.description: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.
20.longDescription: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Force Armor
1.description: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges.  Passive: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.
1.longDescription: When Magic Missiles damages an enemy Hero, gain 50 Spell Armor, reducing the damage taken by the next Ability by 50%. Gain 1 charge per cast and store up to 4 charges.  Passive: Li-Ming's Mana regeneration is increased by 100% while below 35% Mana.

1.name: Aether Walker
1.description: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: Teleport costs no Mana.  If Li-Ming hasn't taken damage in the last 3 seconds, Teleport's cooldown is decreased by 2 seconds.  Casting Teleport causes Li-Ming's next cast of Magic Missiles to deal 10% bonus damage.

1.name: Power Hungry
1.description: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes restore 100% more Mana and grant 10% Spell Power for 20 seconds.

4.name: Charged Blast
4.description: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking a target recently hit by a Magic Missile does an extra 87 (+4% per level) damage.

4.name: Triumvirate
4.description: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.
4.longDescription: If Arcane Orb hits an enemy Hero after traveling at least 50% of its base range, the cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds and 40 Mana is refunded.

4.name: Dominance
4.description: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.
4.longDescription: Takedowns restore 30% of Li-Ming's missing Health.

7.name: Seeker
7.description: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.
7.longDescription: If three Magic Missiles hit the same target, the third one deals an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

7.name: Zei's Vengeance
7.description: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 30%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.
7.longDescription: Increase Arcane Orb's damage increase for distance traveled by 30%. Additionally, reduce its cooldown by 1 second.

7.name: Calamity
7.description: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.
7.longDescription: Teleport does 300 (+3% per level) damage to enemy Heroes near the destination.

10.name: Disintegrate
10.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.
10.longDescription: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 480 (+5% per level) damage over 2.6 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

10.name: Wave Of Force
10.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.
10.longDescription: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 (+5% per level) damage.

13.name: Illusionist
13.description: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%
13.longDescription: If Li-Ming loses more than 20% of her Health at once, its cooldown is instantly refreshed.  This effect has a 4 second cooldown.  Passive: Increases Teleport range by 50%

13.name: Cannoneer
13.description: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.
13.longDescription: When Li-Ming uses an Ability, her next Basic Attack's damage is increased by 75% and deals Spell damage instead of Physical.  Stacks up to 3 times.

13.name: Glass Cannon
13.description: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.
13.longDescription: Increase Li-Ming's Spell Power by 20%, but decrease her maximum Health by 15%.

16.name: Fireflies
16.description: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.
16.longDescription: Drastically increases Magic Missiles speed. Its cooldown is reduced by 1 second, and its Mana cost is reduced by 5.

16.name: Mirrorball
16.description: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.
16.longDescription: Magic Missiles fires an additional 2 missiles, but its Mana cost is increased by 5.

16.name: Arcane Orbit
16.description: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).
16.longDescription: Arcane Orb travels 25% farther, increasing its maximum distance damage bonus from 270 (+3% per level) to 371 (+3% per level).

16.name: Diamond Skin
16.description: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Teleport grants a Shield equal to 25% of Li-Ming's maximum Health for 4 seconds.

20.name: Temporal Flux
20.description: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.
20.longDescription: Disintegrate gradually slows enemies caught in its beam, to a maximum of 60%.

20.name: Repulsion
20.description: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.
20.longDescription: Increases Wave of Force knockback distance by 150% and increases its cast range by 100%.

20.name: Tal Rasha's Elements
20.description: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.
20.longDescription: Casting Abilities increases the damage of the next Ability by 5%, up to 20%.  This bonus is reset when the same Ability is used within a chain.

20.name: Archon: Pure Power
20.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

1.name: Winged Guard
1.description: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Each time Necrotic Embrace hits an enemy Hero, gain 75 Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack.  If Winged Guard has no charges, Mal'Ganis will gain 1 charge after 6 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Aura
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 30% of Physical Damage dealt, and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.
1.longDescription: Mal'Ganis heals for 30% of Physical Damage dealt, and nearby allied Heroes heal for 15% of Physical Damage dealt.

1.name: Time to Feed
1.description: Mal'Ganis heals for 44 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero.  This healing is doubled if they are damaged by Fel Claws. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.
1.longDescription: Mal'Ganis heals for 44 (+4% per level) when damaging a nearby enemy Hero.  This healing is doubled if they are damaged by Fel Claws. This can occur once every 6 seconds against each enemy Hero.

4.name: Fueled by Torment
4.description: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 20% more Hero damage into healing.
4.longDescription: While Necrotic Embrace is active, Mal'Ganis heals for 11 (+4% per level) when damage is taken and Vampiric Touch converts 20% more Hero damage into healing.

4.name: Might of Sargeras
4.description: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50.
4.longDescription: Necrotic Embrace's Armor is increased to 50.

4.name: Echo of Doom
4.description: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 60 (+4% per level) damage.  For each enemy Hero hit, gain 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Necrotic Embrace by 0.75 seconds.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.
4.longDescription: When Necrotic Embrace expires, it explodes again for 60 (+4% per level) damage.  For each enemy Hero hit, gain 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Necrotic Embrace by 0.75 seconds.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

7.name: Black Claws
7.description: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage and reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes by 15 for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: After Mal'Ganis hits an enemy Hero with Fel Claws, his next Basic Attack deals 60% more damage and reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes by 15 for 2 seconds.

7.name: Will of Tichondrius
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit by the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws causes the final slash to steal 1% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes, up to 4%.  If at least 4 enemy Heroes are hit with the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws, then the final slash Stuns enemies for an additional 0.25 seconds.
7.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws causes the final slash to steal 1% of maximum Health from enemy Heroes, up to 4%.  If at least 4 enemy Heroes are hit with the first 2 slashes of Fel Claws, then the final slash Stuns enemies for an additional 0.25 seconds.

7.name: Spreading Plague
7.description: After casting Night Rush, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  This effect lasts for 5 seconds and Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh its duration.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.
7.longDescription: After casting Night Rush, deal 30 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies.  This effect lasts for 5 seconds and Basic Attacks against Heroes refresh its duration.  Does not wake Sleeping targets.

10.name: Carrion Swarm
10.description: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, disperse into an Invulnerable swarm of bats for 3 seconds, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies.  Vampiric Touch heals for 75% of Carrion Swarm's damage to Heroes.

10.name: Dark Conversion
10.description: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Channel on an enemy Hero for 0.75 seconds, then swap Health percentages with the target over 3 seconds.

13.name: Deep Sleep
13.description: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.
13.longDescription: Increase Night Rush's Sleep duration by 0.75 seconds and its Movement Speed bonus by 10%.

13.name: The Night Beckons
13.description: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Sleeping enemies.  After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 200% bonus damage to Sleeping enemies.  After Night Rush's Sleep ends, targets are Slowed by 30% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Blood Rush
13.description: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.
13.longDescription: When Mal'Ganis is healed by a Hero, he gains 1% Movement Speed for 8 seconds, up to 15%.

16.name: Plague Bats
16.description: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.
16.longDescription: Necrotic Embrace unleashes a wave of bats in front of Mal'Ganis, dealing 81 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Frenzied Assault
16.description: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage heal for an additional 50% of damage dealt.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with a lower Health percentage grant 35% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Heroes with a higher Health percentage heal for an additional 50% of damage dealt.  Basic Attacks against Heroes with a lower Health percentage grant 35% Attack Speed for 2 seconds.

16.name: Blind as a Bat
16.description: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.   Enemy Heroes hit by the final slash of Fel Claws reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to erupt with blind rage, removing the cooldown and Mana cost of Fel Claws, but losing all vision. Lasts 6 seconds.   Enemy Heroes hit by the final slash of Fel Claws reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 5 seconds.

20.name: Seeker Swarm
20.description: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Upon expiring, Carrion Swarm's bats seek nearby enemy Heroes, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage and Sleeping them for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Wrath of Nathreza
20.description: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.
20.longDescription: Enemy Heroes near the target suffer 75% of the transferred Health as damage over 3 seconds.  Does not benefit from Vampiric Touch.

20.name: Vanquish the Weak
20.description: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.
20.longDescription: Damage from Fel Claws and Basic Attacks Slows enemies by 25% for 1.5 seconds, and Vampiric Touch converts 10% more damage into healing versus Slowed Heroes.

20.name: Alone in the Dark
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Night Rush by 4 seconds.  Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Night Rush by 4 seconds.  Enemy Heroes put to Sleep by Night Rush have their vision greatly reduced during the Sleep and for 2 seconds after.

1.name: Gathering Storm
1.description: Quest: Each time a Hero is hit by Hammerang, its damage is permanently increased by 1.5 and it refunds 10 Mana.
1.longDescription: Quest: Each time a Hero is hit by Hammerang, its damage is permanently increased by 1.5 and it refunds 10 Mana.

1.name: Seasoned Marksman
1.description: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 4 seconds. 30 second cooldown.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every Minion killed near you grants 0.2 Attack Damage, and Takedowns grant 0.5 Attack Damage.  Reward: Upon gaining 40 bonus Attack Damage, you can also activate Seasoned Marksman to increase your Attack Speed by 40% for 4 seconds. 30 second cooldown.

1.name: Wingman
1.description: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum of 80 stacks.  Passive: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Falstad grant a stack of Bribe. Falstad can use 20 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them and permanently increasing the damage of Lightning Rod by 5%.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries. Maximum of 80 stacks.  Passive: Reduce Lightning Rod's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Static Shield
4.description: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.
4.longDescription: Gain a Shield equal to 4% of Falstad's maximum Health after every Lightning Rod strike. Lasts 4 seconds and stacks.

4.name: Updraft
4.description: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 60%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.
4.longDescription: Increases Barrel Roll's range by 40% and Shield amount by 60%, and its Shield now lasts indefinitely.

4.name: Hammer Gains
4.description: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt to the primary target.

7.name: Secret Weapon
7.description: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 80% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.
7.longDescription: Increases Hammerang's range by 30% and Basic Attacks deal 80% bonus damage while Hammerang is in flight.

7.name: BOOMerang
7.description: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.
7.longDescription: Reactivate Hammerang mid-flight to deal 165 (+4% per level) damage around the hammer.

7.name: Charged Up
7.description: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increases the number of Lightning Rod strikes by 2 and its range by 25%.

10.name: Hinterland Blast
10.description: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 475 (+4.75% per level) damage to enemies within a long line. The cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for every enemy Hero hit.

10.name: Mighty Gust
10.description: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Push enemies away, and slow their Movement Speed by 40% decaying over 4 seconds.

13.name: Thunderstrikes
13.description: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.
13.longDescription: Lightning Rod deals 20% more damage each subsequent strike.

13.name: Flow Rider
13.description: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.
13.longDescription: While Tailwind is active, Falstad's Basic Abilities recharge 100% faster.

13.name: Giant Killer
13.description: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

16.name: Crippling Hammer
16.description: Increases Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 60%.
16.longDescription: Increases Hammerang's Slow from 25% to 60%.

16.name: Aerie Gusts
16.description: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.
16.longDescription: Reduces the activation time for Tailwind from 6 to 3 seconds, and increases the Movement Speed bonus from 15% to 25%.

16.name: Afterburner
16.description: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Barrel Roll increases Movement Speed by 60%, decaying over 3 seconds.

20.name: Call of the Wildhammer
20.description: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.
20.longDescription: Hinterland Blast has double the range and deals 25% more damage.

20.name: Wind Tunnel
20.description: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.
20.longDescription: Mighty Gust creates a wind tunnel for 4 seconds. Enemies caught in the tunnel will periodically be pushed back.

20.name: Nexus Frenzy
20.description: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.
20.longDescription: Increases Attack Speed by 20% and Attack Range by 1.1.

20.name: Epic Mount
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 40 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Flight by 40 seconds, reduce the cast time before flying to 0.5 seconds, and increase the speed by 50%.

1.name: Adrenaline Stimpack
1.description: Passive: While over 80% Health, gain 25% bonus Attack Speed and 10% bonus Movement Speed.  Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Passive: While over 80% Health, gain 25% bonus Attack Speed and 10% bonus Movement Speed.  Activate to gain 100% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 5 seconds.

1.name: Endurance Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 530 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.  When taking damage while below 30% maximum Health, Endurance Stimpack will automatically be cast if it is not on cooldown.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain a Shield that absorbs 530 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.  When taking damage while below 30% maximum Health, Endurance Stimpack will automatically be cast if it is not on cooldown.

1.name: Neural Stimpack
1.description: Activate to gain 40 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Activate to gain 40 Mana and cause Basic Ability cooldowns to recharge 100% faster for 5 seconds.

1.name: New Habits
1.description: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Collecting Regeneration Globes reduces the cooldown of Pyromania by 8 seconds.  Quest: Collect 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Pyromania grants Unstoppable for 2 seconds.

4.name: Oil Dispersal
4.description: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%.  Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 1 second and refunds 5 Mana.
4.longDescription: Increase Oil Spill's area by 20%.  Each enemy Hero hit by Flame Stream reduces the cooldown of Oil Spill by 1 second and refunds 5 Mana.

4.name: Meltdown
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 8% for 2.5 seconds, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Pyromania reduces their damage dealt by 8% for 2.5 seconds, up to 40%.

4.name: Incinerator Gauntlets
4.description: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 50%.
4.longDescription: Increase Basic Attack area by 15%, and Basic Attack damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters by 50%.

7.name: Crossfire
7.description: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 (+4% per level) bonus damage.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy with both streams of Flame Stream deals 139 (+4% per level) bonus damage.

7.name: Grill and Kill
7.description: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.
7.longDescription: Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Ignited Oil Spills 60 times.  Reward: Increase Oil Spill's Ignite duration by 2 seconds, and damage by 20%.

7.name: Adhesive Petroleum
7.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 35% for 3 seconds.  Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.
7.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spill when it is Ignited are Slowed by 35% for 3 seconds.  Additionally, Basic Attack splashes Ignite Oil Spills.

10.name: Bunker Drop
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, deploy and enter a Bunker with 1435 (+4% per level) Health. Blaze and his allies can enter and exit the Bunker at will. While in the Bunker, occupants gain access to Flamethrower, dealing 170 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line.  Exiting the Bunker grants 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Bunkers last 10 seconds, or until destroyed.

10.name: Combustion
10.description: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 2.6 seconds. Upon ending, Slow nearby enemies by 60% and deal 55 (+4% per level) damage to them every 0.5 seconds. Combustion's Slow and damage over time duration is extended the longer Blaze Channels, from 1 second up to 5 seconds.  Blaze's Movement Speed is reduced by 40% while Channeling.

13.name: Suppressive Fire
13.description: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.
13.longDescription: Each stream of Flame Stream reduces the Spell Power of Heroes hit by 25% for 4 seconds, up to 50%.

13.name: Nanomachine Coating
13.description: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Enemies standing in Oil Spills and Ignited Oil Spills have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

13.name: Fuel Leak
13.description: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.
13.longDescription: Jet Propulsion creates Oil Spills along Blaze's path. If Jet Propulsion impacts an enemy Hero, an additional Oil Spill is created underneath them.

16.name: Thermal Protection
16.description: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.
16.longDescription: Each enemy hit by Jet Propulsion grants 10 Armor for 3 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 1.25 seconds.

16.name: Heat Treatment
16.description: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.
16.longDescription: Heal for 75% of the damage dealt by Pyromania.

16.name: Juggernaut Plating
16.description: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.
16.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Spell Armor for 3 seconds. Upon expiration, gain a Shield equal to 125% of the Spell Damage taken while Juggernaut Plating was active.

20.name: Fortified Bunker
20.description: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Occupants can cast Oil Spill from Bunker Drop every 6 seconds. Additionally, Bunker Drop's Armor bonus upon exiting is increased by 25, and its duration by 1 second.

20.name: Flash Fire
20.description: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.
20.longDescription: While Channeling Combustion, Blaze's Movement Speed is no longer reduced, and nearby enemies are Slowed by 60%.

20.name: Burn Notice
20.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 5% and deal an additional 18 (+4% per level) damage over 2.5 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.

1.name: Free Drinks
1.description: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.
1.longDescription: Healing Brew's cooldown is reduced by 1 second and its Mana cost is refunded if it heals a Hero under 50% Health.

1.name: Wind Serpent
1.description: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).
1.longDescription: Casting Cloud Serpent also launches a Blinding Wind at the nearest enemy to the target (prioritizing Heroes).

1.name: Eager Adventurer
1.description: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 125% while Fast Feet is active.
1.longDescription: Increase Fast Feet's duration by 125% and increase Mana regeneration by 125% while Fast Feet is active.

4.name: Serpent Sidekick
4.description: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.
4.longDescription: Cloud Serpent's duration is increased by 0.6 seconds every time it attacks a Hero.

4.name: Surging Winds
4.description: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: If Blinding Wind hits 2 Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by 2 seconds and Li Li gains 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

4.name: Safety Sprint
4.description: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.
4.longDescription: Activate to gain Fast Feet for 3 seconds and increase its Movement Speed bonus to 30% while active.  Passive: Increase the movement speed bonus of Fast Feet to 15%.

7.name: The Good Stuff
7.description: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.
7.longDescription: Healing Brew heals for an additional 42 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds. While Fast Feet is active, this heal amount is increased by 100%.

7.name: Lightning Serpent
7.description: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.
7.longDescription: Cloud Serpent attacks bounce to hit 2 additional Heroes for 13 (+4% per level) damage and 10 (+4% per level) healing.

7.name: Let's Go!
7.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.
7.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 140 (+4% per level) and make them Unstoppable for 1 second. Let's Go's cooldown is affected by Fast Feet.  Cannot be used on Li Li.

10.name: Jug of 1,000 Cups
10.description: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health.
10.longDescription: Channel for up to 6 seconds. Every 0.25 seconds, increase the cooldown of Jug of 1,000 Cups by 2 seconds, up to 50 additional seconds, and heal the lowest Health nearby allied Hero for 66 (+4% per level) Health.

10.name: Water Dragon
10.description: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Li Li channels for 2 seconds, summoning a Water Dragon that hits the nearest enemy Hero within 12 range and all enemies near them, dealing 300 (+4% per level) damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 70% for 4 seconds.

13.name: Gale Force
13.description: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Blinding Wind's duration by 0.75 seconds. Li Li's Basic Attacks against Blinded Heroes deal 75% increased damage.

13.name: Hindering Winds
13.description: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Blinding Wind Slows enemy Hero Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds.

13.name: Mass Vortex
13.description: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.
13.longDescription: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blinding Wind from 2 to 3. Blinding Wind deals 75% additional damage if all 3 enemies hit are Heroes.

16.name: Two For One
16.description: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.
16.longDescription: Increases the number of allies healed by Healing Brew to 2, but increases the cooldown by 1 second.

16.name: Pick Me Up
16.description: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.
16.longDescription: Healing Brew's healing for Heroes is increased by 33% if they are under 50% Health.

16.name: Blessings Of Yu'lon
16.description: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for an additional 1% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.
16.longDescription: Cloud Serpent heals its bearer for an additional 1% of their maximum Health each time it attacks.

20.name: Jug of 1,000,000 Cups
20.description: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.
20.longDescription: Jug of 1,000 Cups heals two allies at a time.

20.name: Double Dragon
20.description: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.
20.longDescription: After hitting a target with Water Dragon, another Water Dragon is summoned at the point of impact.

20.name: Mistweaver
20.description: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Activate to heal nearby allied Heroes for 149 (+4% per level). Basic Attacks and Cloud Serpent attacks reduce the cooldown of Mistweaver by 1 second.

20.name: Shake It Off
20.description: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.
20.longDescription: Gain 8 Armor per second while Fast Feet is active, up to 30 Armor.

1.name: Contact Healing
1.description: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.
1.longDescription: Biotic Grenade heals for 30% more per allied and enemy Hero hit.

1.name: Slumber Shells
1.description: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by 4 seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Sleep Dart by 4 seconds. Upon waking, enemy Heroes are Slowed by 25% for 3 seconds.

1.name: Vampiric Rounds
1.description: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.  Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.  Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Stack 5 Doses on an enemy Hero or Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses.  Reward: Stack 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.  Reward: Basic Attack a Hero with 5 Doses to increase Shrike's healing by 0.25%.

4.name: Biotic Enhancements
4.description: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase the bonus healing duration of Biotic Grenade by 50% and reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds.

4.name: Overdose
4.description: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Sleep Dart applies 4 Doses.  While Aim Down Sights is active, Sleep Dart pierces all enemy Heroes.

4.name: Debilitating Dart
4.description: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to fire a dart which Slows the Movement Speed and reduces the damage dealt by the first enemy Hero it hits by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Anti-Healer
7.description: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 25%.
7.longDescription: Increase the area of Biotic Grenade by 25% and the duration of the healing reduction by 25%.

7.name: Night Terrors
7.description: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds for every Hero hit by Sleep Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 10% of their Maximum Health in damage.
7.longDescription: Gain 25% Movement Speed for 2 seconds for every Hero hit by Sleep Dart. Upon waking, enemy Heroes take 10% of their Maximum Health in damage.

7.name: Mind-Numbing Agent
7.description: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.
7.longDescription: Every Dose a Hero has reduces their Spell Power by 10%.

10.name: Nano Boost
10.description: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.
10.longDescription: Instantly boost an allied Hero, restoring 200 Mana. For the next 8 seconds, they gain 30% Spell Power and their Basic Ability cooldowns recharge 150% faster.  Cannot be used on Ana.

10.name: Eye of Horus
10.description: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.
10.longDescription: Assume a sniping position, gaining the ability to fire up to 6 specialized rounds with unlimited range. Rounds pierce allied and enemy Heroes but collide with enemy Structures in their path. Allies are healed for 225 (+4% per level) and enemies are damaged for 135 (+4% per level). Deals 50% less damage to Structures.  Ana is unable to move while Eye of Horus is active.

13.name: Speed Serum
13.description: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart grants 25% Movement Speed to affected Heroes for 2 seconds.

13.name: Purifying Darts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Roots and Slows from the target, and heals for 20% more when doing so.

13.name: Smelling Salts
13.description: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.
13.longDescription: Healing Dart removes Stuns from the target, and grants them 50 Armor for 2 seconds when doing so.

16.name: Sharpshooter
16.description: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.
16.longDescription: Healing Dart's healing is increased by 5% if it heals a Hero, up to 50%. This bonus is reset if Healing Dart fails to hit a Hero.

16.name: Concentrated Doses
16.description: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.
16.longDescription: Increase Healing Dart's healing by 10% for each Dose active on enemy Heroes.

16.name: Active Reload
16.description: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.
16.longDescription: Activate to instantly gain 3 charges of Healing Dart.

20.name: Nano Infusion
20.description: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.
20.longDescription: Allies affected by Nano Boost heal for 50% of Spell Damage dealt.

20.name: Deadeye
20.description: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.
20.longDescription: Increase Eye Of Horus' healing and damage by 4% for every Hero hit. This bonus resets after all shots have been fired.

20.name: Armored Stance
20.description: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.
20.longDescription: Increase Shrike's damage by 50%. While Aim Down Sights is active, gain 25 Armor.

20.name: Dynamic Optics
20.description: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks increase Attack Speed by 10% for 3 seconds, up to 100%. While Aim Down Sights is active, increase your Basic Attack Range by 4.

1.name: Lion's Maw
1.description: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every time Lion's Fang hits a Hero, increase its damage by 5, up to 125.  Reward: After hitting 25 Heroes, the Slow is increased to 50% and its duration is increased to 2 seconds.

1.name: Overpower
1.description: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.
1.longDescription: When Parry blocks a Hero's Basic Attack, Heroic Strike's cooldown is refreshed and the next one does 40% more damage.

1.name: High King's Quest
1.description: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit 50 Heroes with Basic Attacks. Quest: Participate in 5 Hero Takedowns. Quest: Gather 20 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Completing a Quest grants 10 Base Attack Damage. Completing all 3 Quests grants an additional 30 Base Attack Damage.

4.name: Taunt
4.description: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.
4.longDescription: Silence a target Hero and force them to attack Varian for 1.25 seconds.  Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration increased by 40%.

4.name: Colossus Smash
4.description: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.
4.longDescription: Smash a target enemy, dealing 160 (+4% per level) damage and lowering their Armor by 20 for 3 seconds, causing them to take 20% increased damage.  Passive: Base Attack Damage increased by 100%. Passive: Maximum Health and Health Regeneration reduced by 10%.

4.name: Twin Blades of Fury
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Heroic Strike's cooldown by 9 seconds, and increase Varian's Movement Speed by 30% for 2 seconds.  Passive: Attack Speed increased by 100%. Passive: Base Attack Damage reduced by 25%.

7.name: Lionheart
7.description: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.
7.longDescription: Increase Lion's Fang's healing from Heroes by 75%.

7.name: Second Wind
7.description: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks heal Varian for 1% of his maximum Health. While below 50% Health, they also heal him for 50% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Victory Rush
7.description: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, Varian's next Basic Attack will heal him for 350 (+4% per level) Health. When a nearby enemy Minion or Monster dies, the cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

10.name: Shield Wall
10.description: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.
10.longDescription: Parry grants Protected, preventing all incoming damage while active. Additionally, Parry's cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds, but it loses 1 charge.

10.name: Warbringer
10.description: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.
10.longDescription: Reduce Charge's cooldown by 8 seconds and Mana cost from 45 to 22. Additionally, Charge can be cast on allied Heroes.

13.name: Juggernaut
13.description: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.
13.longDescription: Charge deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 4% of their maximum Health.

13.name: Mortal Strike
13.description: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Heroes hit by Heroic Strike receive 40% reduced healing for 4 seconds.

13.name: Shattering Throw
13.description: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.
13.longDescription: Activate to throw a sword at a target Hero that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage, and up to 1400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to their Shields.  Passive: Basic Attacks against Heroes deal up to 200% bonus Physical Damage to Shields.

16.name: Banner of Stormwind
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 25% increased Movement Speed to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Ironforge
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20 Armor to nearby allied Heroes, reducing damage taken by 20%. Lasts 12 seconds.

16.name: Banner of Dalaran
16.description: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to place a Banner that grants 20% increased Spell Power to nearby allied Heroes. Lasts 12 seconds.

20.name: Vigilance
20.description: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.
20.longDescription: Being hit by a Hero Basic Attack reduces the cooldown of Taunt by 1 second.

20.name: Master at Arms
20.description: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Colossus Smash affects all enemies near the target, and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

20.name: Frenzy
20.description: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional 25%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.
20.longDescription: Twin Blades of Fury increases Heroic Strike damage by an additional 25%, and Basic Attacks increase his Movement Speed by an additional 10%.

20.name: Glory to the Alliance
20.description: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.
20.longDescription: Banner now also increases health regeneration and all healing received for nearby allied Heroes by 50%, and the cooldown is reduced by 50%.

20.name: Demoralizing Shout
20.description: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to demoralize nearby enemy Heroes, reducing damage they deal by 40% for 5 seconds.

1.name: Eye of the Tiger
1.description: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.
1.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 150%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.
1.longDescription: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 150%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
1.description: Chen heals for 3.5% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.
1.longDescription: Chen heals for 3.5% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.
4.longDescription: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Accumulating Flame
4.description: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.
4.longDescription: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Withering Flames
4.description: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 60% for 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 60% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Gift of the Ox
7.description: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1.5 seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1.5 seconds, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.
7.longDescription: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Elusive Brawler
7.description: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 40% for 1 second, or by 80% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.
13.longDescription: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 40% for 1 second, or by 80% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 20% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Ring of Fire
13.description: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.
13.longDescription: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

13.name: Enough to Share
13.description: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).
13.longDescription: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

16.name: Flying Leap
16.description: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.
16.longDescription: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

16.name: Celerity
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 2 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 2 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

16.name: Combo Strikes
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.
16.longDescription: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.
20.longDescription: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.
20.longDescription: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

20.name: Purifying Brew
20.description: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Energizing Brew
20.description: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.

1.name: Guitar Hero
1.description: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: While Guitar Solo is active, E.T.C. heals for 50% of his damage dealt by Basic Attacks.  Basic Attacks increase the duration of Guitar Solo by 0.5 seconds.

1.name: Prog Rock
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100  Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.
1.longDescription: Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe permanently increases the healing per second of Guitar Solo by 5, to a maximum of 100 Reward: After gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Guitar Solo also heals nearby allied Heroes for 50 (+4% per level) Health every second while it is active.

1.name: Block Party
1.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.
1.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes a stack of Block, granting 75 Physical Armor against the next Hero Basic Attack for 8 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%. Maximum 2 stacks of Block.

4.name: Crowd Surfer
4.description: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If no enemies are hit, reduce the cooldown by 5 seconds and refund the Mana cost.
4.longDescription: Allows Powerslide to travel over walls and terrain. If Powerslide hits no enemies, then reduce its cooldown by 5 seconds and refund its Mana cost.

4.name: Loud Speakers
4.description: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.
4.longDescription: Increases Face Melt range and knockback by 50%.

4.name: Speed Metal
4.description: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.
4.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic ability also gives nearby allied Heroes 20% Movement Speed for 2 seconds.

7.name: Pinball Wizard
7.description: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.
7.longDescription: Face Melt does 300% more damage to enemies recently affected by Powerslide.

7.name: Hammer-on
7.description: While Guitar Solo is active your Basic Attacks deal 30% more damage.
7.longDescription: While Guitar Solo is active, Basic Attacks deal 30% bonus damage.

7.name: Echo Pedal
7.description: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.
7.longDescription: Using a Basic or Heroic Ability releases two pulses of 15 (+4% per level) damage.  This deals 250% bonus damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters. The first occurs instantly, the second occurs 2 seconds later.

10.name: Mosh Pit
10.description: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: After 0.75 seconds, channel to stun nearby enemies for 4 seconds.

10.name: Stage Dive
10.description: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.
10.longDescription: Leap to target location, landing after 2.75 seconds, dealing 330 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the area, and slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

13.name: Mic Check
13.description: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting at least 2 targets with Face Melt reduces its cooldown by 6 seconds.

13.name: Encore
13.description: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later.  Passive: Each enemy Hero hit by Face Melt or the Amp reduces your Heroic Ability cooldown by 6%.
13.longDescription: Face Melt leaves an Amp behind, which will knock enemies away again 2 seconds later. Enemy Heroes knocked back by Face Melt or the Amp reduce E.T.C.’s Heroic cooldown by 5%.

13.name: Face Smelt
13.description: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Face Melt slows enemies by 50% fading over 2 seconds.

16.name: Show Stopper
16.description: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.
16.longDescription: After using Powerslide, gain 35 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing all damage taken by 35%.

16.name: Aggressive Shredding
16.description: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: E.T.C.'s Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Guitar Solo by 0.75 second.

16.name: Imposing Presence
16.description: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.name: Tour Bus
20.description: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Mosh Pit refreshes the cooldown of Powerslide. E.T.C. can Powerslide during Mosh Pit, which also increases its duration by 2 seconds.

20.name: Crowd Pleaser
20.description: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger, and its Slow is increased by 30%.
20.longDescription: Stage Dive's impact area is 50% bigger. Increase the Slow amount of Stage Dive by 30%.

20.name: Death Metal
20.description: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.
20.longDescription: Upon dying, a ghost uses Mosh Pit at E.T.C's location.

20.name: Storm Shield
20.description: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Activate to give all nearby allied Heroes a Shield for 20% of their max Health for 3 seconds.

20.name: Bolt of the Storm
20.description: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.
20.longDescription: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

1.name: Volatile Acid
1.description: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage is increased by 20%.
1.longDescription: Banelings can travel 50% further before exploding and their damage is increased by 20%.

1.name: Corpse Feeders
1.description: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings have 30% more Health.
1.longDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Infested Drop by 3 seconds and Roachlings have 30% more Health.

1.name: Infest
1.description: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 125% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.
1.longDescription: Nearby Ranged Minions deal an additional 125% damage, plus an additional 1% per 1000 Siege damage Zagara has dealt. Can be toggled on or off.

4.name: Envenomed Spines
4.description: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Activate to have Zagara's next Basic Attack apply 230 (+4% per level) damage over 5 seconds.

4.name: Medusa Blades
4.description: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 33% damage to three nearby targets.

4.name: Serrated Spines
4.description: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.2%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Each Basic Attack against a Hero increases Zagara's Attack Damage by 0.2%.

7.name: Baneling Massacre
7.description: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and reduce the cooldown of Baneling Barrage by 0.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Gain 2 additional charges of Banelings, and reduce the cooldown of Baneling Barrage by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Viscous Acid
7.description: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Banelings Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Bile Drop
7.description: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.
7.longDescription: Quest: Passively increases the radius of Infested Drop by 20%.  Reward: After hitting 12 Heroes with Infested Drop, it spawns an additional Roachling.

10.name: Devouring Maw
10.description: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.
10.longDescription: Summon a Devouring Maw that devours enemies for 4 seconds. Devoured enemies cannot fight and take 94 (+4% per level) damage per second.  Usable on Unstoppable enemies.

10.name: Nydus Network
10.description: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Summon a Nydus Worm on Creep anywhere that Zagara has vision. Zagara can enter a Nydus Worm and travel to any other Nydus Worm by right-clicking near it. While inside a Nydus Worm, Zagara regenerates 10% Health and Mana per second.  Stores up to 2 charges. Maximum of 4 Nydus Worms at a time.  Passive: Creep spreads 15% farther.  Passive: While on Creep, each Basic Attack reduces all of Zagara's cooldowns by 0.4 seconds.

13.name: Hydralisk Transfusion
13.description: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.
13.longDescription: Zagara is healed for 60% of the damage dealt by Hunter Killers' Basic Attacks to Heroes.

13.name: Protective Coating
13.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.
13.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 20 Armor, taking 20% less damage.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 3 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Corrosive Saliva
16.description: When attacking Heroes, Hunter Killers and Roachlings deal additional damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health.
16.longDescription: When attacking Heroes, Hunter Killers and Roachlings deal additional damage equal to 1.75% of their maximum Health.

16.name: Mutalisk
16.description: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 4 seconds.  Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.
16.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Hunter Killer by 4 seconds.  Hunter Killer now spawns a Mutalisk. Mutalisks have a bounce attack and last for 30 seconds.

16.name: Jagged Barbs
16.description: While on Creep, Zagara gains 40% more Basic Attack damage and her attack range is increased by an additional 20%.
16.longDescription: While on Creep, Zagara gains 40% more Basic Attack damage and her attack range is increased by an additional 20%.

20.name: Tyrant Maw
20.description: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devouring Maw deals 50% more damage. Takedowns reduce its cooldown by 25 seconds.

20.name: Endless Creep
20.description: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.
20.longDescription: The cast range for Creep Tumor is increased by 2000%. Creep Tumors now last 600 seconds. While on Creep, Zagara gains an additional 10% Movement Speed.

20.name: Fury of the Storm
20.description: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
20.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, your next Basic Attack will deal an additional 91 (+4% per level) damage to the target, and 228 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

1.name: Pressurized Glands
1.description: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.
1.longDescription: Increases the range of Symbiote's Spike Burst by 25% and decreases the cooldown by 1 second.

1.name: Envenomed Nest
1.description: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds and reduce the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.
1.longDescription: Toxic Nests deal 75% more damage over 3 seconds and reduce the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 10 for 4 seconds.

1.name: Reinforced Carapace
1.description: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 40%.
1.longDescription: Increase the Shield amount of Carapace by 40%.

1.name: Survival Instincts
1.description: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.
1.longDescription: Increases Locust's Health by 100% and damage by 60%.

4.name: Adrenal Overload
4.description: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.
4.longDescription: Heroic Symbiote hosts gain 25% increased Attack Speed.

4.name: Needlespine
4.description: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.
4.longDescription: Increases the damage and range of Symbiote's Stab by 20%.

4.name: Prolific Dispersal
4.description: Increase the duration of Toxic Nests by 45 seconds, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.
4.longDescription: Increase the duration of Toxic Nests by 45 seconds, reduce its cooldown by 2 seconds, and add 2 additional charges.

7.name: Vile Nest
7.description: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
7.longDescription: Toxic Nests Slow enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Networked Carapace
7.description: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.
7.longDescription: Using Symbiote's Carapace also applies an untalented Carapace Shield to all nearby allied Heroes, Minions, and Mercenaries.

7.name: Calldown: MULE
7.description: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.
7.longDescription: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for 40 seconds, healing for 90 Health every 1 second.

10.name: Ultimate Evolution
10.description: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.
10.longDescription: Clone target allied Hero and control it for 20 seconds. Abathur has perfected the clone, granting it 20% Spell Power, 20% bonus Attack Damage, and 10% bonus Movement Speed. Cannot use their Heroic Ability.

10.name: Evolve Monstrosity
10.description: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.
10.longDescription: Turn an allied Minion or Locust into a Monstrosity. When enemy Minions near the Monstrosity die, it gains 2% Health and 2% Basic Attack damage, stacking up to 40 times.  The Monstrosity can be healed by Carapace and has the ability to Burrow to a visible location every 80 seconds.  Using Symbiote on the Monstrosity allows Abathur to control it, in addition to Symbiote's normal benefits.  This Ability can be reactivated to automatically cast Symbiote on his Monstrosity.

13.name: Spatial Efficiency
13.description: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Stab gains 1 additional charge and its cooldown is reduced by .5 seconds.

13.name: Soma Transference
13.description: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.
13.longDescription: Symbiote's Spike Burst heals the host for 64 (+4% per level) Health per enemy Hero hit.

13.name: Bombard Strain
13.description: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.
13.longDescription: Locust's Basic Attacks become a long-range siege attack and their duration is increased by 75%.

16.longDescription: Abathur's Symbiote's Spike Burst also Slows enemy Movement Speed by 40% for 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: Symbiote's Carapace increases the Movement Speed of the target by 40% for 3.5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Ultimate Evolution clones and Monstrosities deal 137 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 3 seconds and when they die. Enemy Heroes hit heal the clone or Monstrosity for 100% of the damage dealt.

16.longDescription: Activate to spawn 3 Locusts at a nearby location.

20.name: Evolutionary Link

20.longDescription: Increase the duration of Ultimate Evolution by 50%.  As long as the Ultimate Evolution is alive, the original target of the clone gains a Shield equal to 35% of their maximum Health.  Refreshes every 5 seconds.

20.longDescription: Increase Monstrosity's Basic Attack damage by 100%.

20.longDescription: Symbiote creates an additional Symbiote on a nearby allied Hero.  This Symbiote mimics the commands of the first, but does half damage and Shielding.

20.longDescription: Activate to create a nest that periodically spawns Locusts. Only one Locust Nest can be active at a time.

1.name: Demolitions Expert

1.longDescription: Quest: For every 5 enemy Heroes hit by Particle Grenade, its recharge rate lowers by 0.4375 seconds, up to 3.5 seconds.  Reward: Once Particle Grenade has hit 40 enemy Heroes, its radius is increased by 15%.

1.longDescription: Every 5.35 (+4% per level) damage done by allies while under Shield Ally contributes 1 Energy, up to 40 Energy per Shield.

1.longDescription: Zarya's Basic Attack deals 50% additional damage to enemies in melee range.
