1.longDescription: Regen Globes now instantly grant 20 Energy.  Quest: Spend 150 seconds at or above 50 Energy.  Reward: Gain an additional 20 maximum Energy.

4.longDescription: Personal Barrier absorbs an additional 140 (+4% per level) damage.

4.longDescription: Quest: Regeneration Globes increase Shield Ally absorb amount by 15, up to 300 permanently.  Reward: After collecting 20 Regen Globes, permanently reduce the cooldown of Shield Ally by 2 seconds.

4.longDescription: Shield Ally increases the allied Hero's Movement Speed by 50% for the duration.

4.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier and Shield Ally grant 75 Physical Armor against the next 2 Hero Basic Attacks for 6 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 75%.

7.longDescription: Particle Grenade deals 30 (+4% per level) more damage and Slows Movement Speed by 25% for 2 seconds to enemies hit by the center of the blast.

7.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier explodes, dealing 110 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

7.longDescription: While above 40 Energy, Zarya's Basic Attack size is increased by 35%.

7.longDescription: Damage absorbed by Zarya's Shields contributes 20% more Energy.

10.longDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that detonates after 1 second and draws enemy Heroes toward the center for 2.5 seconds.

10.description: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.
10.longDescription: Launch a gravity bomb that deals 124 (+4% per level) damage and creates an expulsion zone for 3.5 seconds. Enemies who enter the affected area are knocked back and have their Movement Speed reduced by 50% for 1 second.

13.longDescription: Personal Barrier makes Zarya Unstoppable for up to 2 seconds.

13.longDescription: Upon expiration or breaking, Personal Barrier grants Zarya 75 Spell Armor for 3 Seconds, reducing the damage taken from Abilities by 75%.

13.longDescription: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya gains 20 Armor, reducing all damage taken by 20%.

13.longDescription: Activate to consume all Energy and gain a Shield that absorbs 0.5% of Zarya's maximum Health per Energy consumed and lasts for 3 seconds. Zarya may only have one personal Shield active on herself at a time.

16.longDescription: Causes Shield Ally to remove all disabling effects and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Shield Ally now grants an untalented Shield to a nearby ally upon impact.

16.longDescription: While at or above 75 Energy, Zarya's cooldowns regenerate 25% faster.

20.longDescription: Increases Graviton Surge's duration by 1 second and it Silences Heroes caught in its area.

20.longDescription: Reduce Expulsion Zone's cooldown by 25 seconds and increase its duration by 1.5 seconds.

20.longDescription: All Particle Grenade charges are returned at once.

20.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldown of Personal Barrier and Shield Ally.

1.longDescription: Using a Basic Ability grants 60 Physical Armor for 2.5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Increases Iron Skin's Shield by 60% and its cooldown is reduced by 5 seconds.

1.longDescription: Activate to heal 30% of Johanna's max Health over 4 seconds.  Passive: Regenerate 1.5 (+4% per level) Health per second.

4.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Condemn by 0.75 seconds and refund 3 Mana for every enemy hit. Maximum of 8 targets.

4.longDescription: Movement Speed is increased by 25% while Condemn is charging up.

4.longDescription: Shield Glare marks enemies for 4 seconds. The next time any ally damages them, they take 90 (+4% per level) extra damage and the mark is removed.

7.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish increases the Slow to 80% and the Slow amount does not decay.  Quest: Hit 4 or more Heroes at the same time with Punish.  Reward: Punish always Slows by 80% and the Slow amount no longer decays.

7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Johanna's Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

10.longDescription: Johanna leaps towards an area.  While in the air, she can steer the landing location by moving.  After 2 seconds Johanna lands, dealing 210 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, Stunning them for 0.2 seconds, and Slowing them by 50% for 3 seconds.

10.longDescription: Deal 114 (+4% per level) damage and Stun the first enemy hit for 1.5 seconds. Blessed Shield then bounces to 2 nearby enemies, dealing 57 (+4% per level) damage and Stunning them for 0.75 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase Punish's damage by 25%. This bonus is increased to 150% whenever Punish hits 2 or more Heroes.

13.longDescription: Deal 12 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Each Hero hit by Condemn increases this damage by 40% for 5 seconds.

13.longDescription: Activate to create 2 hammers that spiral outward from Johanna, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage to enemies hit.  Hitting Heroes with Shield Glare reduces the cooldown of this Ability by 8 seconds.

16.longDescription: Every enemy Hero affected by Shield Glare restores 114 (+4% per level) health.

16.longDescription: Increase the duration of Iron Skin by 2 seconds. While Iron Skin is active, Johanna gains 8% Movement Speed each time she takes damage, up to 40%.

16.longDescription: Activate to reduce the Attack Speed by 50% and Movement Speed by 20% of nearby Heroes and Summons for 2.5 seconds.  Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed Slowed by 20% for 2.5 seconds.

20.longDescription: While in the air, holy bolts rain down on enemies dealing 75 (+4% per level) damage and reducing the cooldown of Falling Sword by 3 seconds for each enemy hit.

20.longDescription: Increase the number of enemies hit by Blessed Shield by 2. Its Stun duration is increased to 1.75 seconds and all targets hit are Stunned for the maximum duration.

20.longDescription: Upon taking fatal damage, Johanna gains a Shield equal to her maximum Health for 4 seconds. This effect has a 120 second cooldown.

1.longDescription: Activate to heal Leoric for 30% of his maximum Health over 5 seconds. Regeneration Globes lower the cooldown of this Ability by 20 seconds.

4.longDescription: Increase the Slow of Skeletal Swing by 20%.

7.longDescription: Increase the healing from Drain Hope to 25% of Leoric's maximum Health. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, Leoric instantly heals for an additional 5% of his maximum Health.

7.longDescription: Drain Hope no longer reduces Leoric's Movement Speed. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, gain 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds.

10.longDescription: Create an unpassable tomb for 4 seconds.

10.longDescription: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and walks forward, swinging his mace 3 times. Enemies hit take 250 (+4% per level) damage, and Heroes hit heal Leoric for 12% of his maximum Health.

13.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 2.5% of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for twice that amount.

16.longDescription: Wraith Walk increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within 5 seconds by 50%. Each enemy Hero hit by this Skeletal Swing reduces the cooldown of Wraith Walk by 7 seconds.

16.longDescription: Increase Leoric's Attack Speed by 20%.  Repeatable Quest: Nearby enemy Minion deaths grant 0.3% permanent Attack Speed, and Takedowns grant 3% permanent Attack Speed, up to 30%.

20.longDescription: The duration of Entomb is lowered by 1 second, but enemies trapped inside are Silenced and take 50 (+4% per level) damage every 1 second.

20.longDescription: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies Drain Hope to nearby enemy Heroes.

20.longDescription: Gain 50 Armor while Drain Hope is active. If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, retain the Armor bonus for 2 seconds.

20.longDescription: Deal 40 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. The damage and area is increased by 100% while Drain Hope is active.

20.longDescription: Activate to become Protected for 3 seconds, preventing all damage.

1.longDescription: Increase Vindication's radius by 15%. Hitting an enemy Hero increases Vindication's healing by 45%. If more than one Hero is hit, the bonus is increased to 90%.

4.longDescription: Upon landing, Avenging Wrath grants other nearby allied Heroes 25 Armor for 4 seconds.

7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Avenging Wrath at maximum charge deals 25% more damage and reduces its cooldown to 1 second.

7.longDescription: Mounting is instant and grants 60% Movement Speed that decays over 3 seconds.

10.longDescription: Surround Yrel in a barrier for 3 seconds, absorbing all damage taken and healing her for 50% of the damage received.

10.longDescription: Yrel sanctifies the ground around her, gaining 50 Armor until she leaves the area.

13.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Vindication at maximum charge deal 40% less damage for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase Avenging Wrath's Slow by 25% and duration by 0.75 seconds.

13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with a Basic Ability at maximum charge grants 10% Spell Power for 10 seconds, up to 30%.

16.longDescription: Righteous Hammer reduces the Armor of enemy Heroes hit by 20 for 4 seconds and deals bonus damage equal to 7% of their maximum Health.

16.longDescription: Casting a Basic Ability reduces the cooldown of Divine Purpose by 2 seconds.

16.longDescription: After casting a Basic Ability, Yrel's next Basic Attack splashes for 30% increased damage around the target.

20.longDescription: Increase the amount that Yrel heals from damage received from 50% to 75%. Ardent Defender heals nearby allied Heroes for 100% of the healing received by Yrel.

4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook deals bonus damage equal to 5% of their maximum Health, and reduces Hook's cooldown by 3 seconds.

4.name: Playtime!
4.description: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Slam reduce the cooldowns of Stitches's other Basic Abilities by 0.5 seconds, increased to 2 seconds for Heroes that are hit by its inner impact area.

4.name: Chop Chop
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Slam grants 25% increased Attack Speed for 3 seconds.  Double the Attack Speed bonus and duration if they are hit by Slam's inner impact area.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Slam grants 25% increased Attack Speed for 3 seconds.  Double the Attack Speed bonus and duration if they are hit by Slam's inner impact area.

7.name: Blight
7.description: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Activate to apply Vile Gas to all nearby enemies. Enemy Heroes hit receive 20% less healing for 5 seconds.  Passive: Vile Gas heals Stitches for 33% of the damage dealt.

7.name: Cannibalize
7.description: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Basic Attacks or the inner impact area of Slam heals Stitches for 2% of his maximum Health.

7.name: Tenderizer
7.description: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks Slow enemies by 25% for 2.5 seconds and refresh the duration of Slam's inner impact area Slow.

10.name: Putrid Bile
10.description: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.
10.longDescription: Emit bile that deals 37 (+4% per level) damage per second to enemies within, Slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds. Gain 20% Movement Speed while emitting bile. Lasts 8 seconds.

10.name: Gorge
10.description: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.
10.longDescription: Consume an enemy Hero, trapping them for 4 seconds. When Gorge ends, the enemy Hero takes 274 (+4% per level) damage. The trapped Hero cannot move or act and doesn't take damage from other sources.

13.name: Fishing Hook
13.description: Hook has an additional 40% range.
13.longDescription: Hook has an additional 40% range.

13.name: Meat Hook
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds.  While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the healing duration.
13.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook heals Stitches for 20% of his maximum Health over 4 seconds.  While active, Basic Attacks against the Hero hit refresh the healing duration.

13.name: Pulverize
13.description: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 80% for 0.75 seconds.
13.longDescription: All enemies hit by Slam are Slowed by 80% for 0.75 seconds.

16.name: Lacerate
16.description: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.
16.longDescription: Slam afflicts enemies with Vile Gas, and Heroes hit by Slam have their Armor reduced by 10 for 4 seconds.

16.name: Digestive Juices
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Devour reduces its cooldown by 5 seconds and causes the Hero hit to deal 50% reduced damage for 5 seconds.

16.name: Gas Flare
16.description: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.
16.longDescription: Deals 15 (+4% per level) damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting an enemy Hero with Hook increases this damage by 150% for 8 seconds.

20.name: Potent Bile
20.description: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.
20.longDescription: Putrid Bile lasts 6 seconds longer and its Slow is increased from 35% to 45%.

20.name: Hungry Hungry Stitches
20.description: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.
20.longDescription: For 4 seconds after using Gorge, Stitches can teleport a short distance to additional targets and Gorge them.

20.name: Second Helping
20.description: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Devour gains 1 additional charge. Enemy Heroes hit by Devour reduce the cooldown of Stitches's Heroic Ability by 5 seconds.

20.name: Shambling Horror
20.description: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.
20.longDescription: Activate to gain 50 Armor for 4 seconds.  Passive: Stitches cannot have his Movement Speed reduced below 100%.

1.name: Caduceus Feedback
1.description: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.
1.longDescription: Increases Attack Range by 1.1 and Basic Attacks against Heroes generate 4 Energy.

1.name: Life Support
1.description: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.
1.longDescription: Generate 2 Energy each time Safeguard reduces damage, up to a maximum of 20 Energy per use.

1.name: Clear!
1.description: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit Heroes with Displacement Grenade.  Reward: After hitting 15 Heroes, reduce the cooldown of Displacement Grenade from 12 seconds to 9 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 30 Heroes, increase the detonation area of Displacement Grenade by 25%.

4.name: Cellular Reactor
4.description: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.
4.longDescription: Consume 30 Energy to heal Lt. Morales for 40% of her maximum Health over 4 seconds. Caduceus Reactor is disabled while this is active.

4.name: Trauma Trigger
4.description: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown.
4.longDescription: Taking damage while below 40% Health grants 40 Armor for 3 seconds.  This effect has a 20 second cooldown.

4.name: Blast Shield
4.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.
4.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade generate 2 Energy and grant Lt. Morales a Shield equal to 6% of her maximum Health, stacking up to 5 times.

7.name: Physical Therapy
7.description: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Safeguard removes all Slows from its target and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

7.name: Vanadium Plating
7.description: Passive: Increase the duration of Safeguard by 1 second.  While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 20 Armor.
7.longDescription: Passive: Increase the duration of Safeguard by 1 second.  While an ally affected by Safeguard is Stunned or Rooted, Safeguard grants an additional 20 Armor.

7.name: Medi-Drone
7.description: Allies with Safeguard receive 75% of the healing done by Healing Beam on another ally.
7.longDescription: Allies with Safeguard receive 75% of the healing done by Healing Beam on another ally.

10.name: Stim Drone
10.description: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: Grant an allied Hero 75% Attack Speed and 25% Movement Speed for 10 seconds.

10.name: Medivac Dropship
10.description: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.
10.longDescription: Target a location for a Medivac transport. For up to 10 seconds before takeoff, allies can right-click to enter the Medivac.

13.name: EMP Grenade
13.description: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.
13.longDescription: Displacement Grenade deals an additional 96 (+4% per level) damage over 2 seconds, and up to 400 (+4% per level) bonus damage to Shields.

13.name: System Shock
13.description: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.
13.longDescription: Heroes hit by Displacement Grenade deal 30% less damage for 4 seconds.

13.name: Second Opinion
13.description: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Hitting 2 or more Heroes with Displacement Grenade reduces its cooldown to 2 seconds.

16.name: Extended Care
16.description: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.
16.longDescription: Increase the range of Healing Beam by 30%.

16.name: First Responder
16.description: While above 60 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.
16.longDescription: While above 60 Energy, Healing Beam's healing is increased by 25%.

16.name: Shield Sequencer
16.description: Safeguard gains a second charge.
16.longDescription: Safeguard gains a second charge.

20.name: Hyperactivity
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Stim Drone from 90 seconds to 45 seconds, and increase the Movement Speed bonus from 25% to 50%.

20.name: Safe Zone
20.description: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: After exiting the Medivac, allies are Protected from all damage for 2 seconds.

20.name: Reinforcements
20.description: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.  Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.
20.longDescription: Activate to call down a Medivac Dropship at your Hall of Storms for your allies. After 10 seconds, or when the Ability is activated again, the Medivac will travel to the original cast location to unload its passengers. Cooldown is shared with Medivac Dropship.  Passive: Reduce the cooldown of Medivac Dropship from 60 to 30 seconds.  Does not require the Medivac Dropship Talent.

20.name: Caduceus Reactor 2.0
20.description: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.
20.longDescription: Increase the healing provided by Caduceus Reactor from 2% to 6% of Lt. Morales's maximum Health per second.

1.name: Live and Let Live
1.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.
1.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life's cooldown recharges 100% faster.

1.name: Circle of Life
1.description: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.
1.longDescription: Quest: Collect Regeneration Globes.  Reward: After collecting 15 Regeneration Globes, Abundance heals for an additional 5% maximum Health.  Reward: After collecting 25 Regeneration Globes, Abundance's healing burst creates a Regeneration Globe.

1.name: Flames of Fury
1.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.  Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.
1.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Flame Buffet from 50 to 40.  Quest: Hit 20 Burning Heroes with Flame Buffet.  Reward: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet reduces Dragonqueen's cooldown by 5 seconds.

4.name: Surge of Vitality
4.description: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Abundance's healing burst grants allied Heroes 30% Movement Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Heat Exhaustion
4.description: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from 40% to 50% and cause it to no longer decay.
4.longDescription: Increase Flame Buffet's Slow from 40% to 50% and cause it to no longer decay.

4.name: Exuberance
4.description: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.
4.longDescription: While above 75% Health, gain 15% Movement Speed.

7.name: Lifeblossom
7.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.
7.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life creates a Lifeblossom at the target's location. Alexstrasza can collect the Lifeblossom to make her next Gift of Life cost no Health.

7.name: Verdant Flourish
7.description: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.
7.longDescription: Alexstrasza receives 30% more healing from Abundance and 100% more healing from Regeneration Globes.

7.name: Fire Within
7.description: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Burning Hero with Flame Buffet heals Alexstrasza for 10% of her maximum Health.

10.name: Life-Binder
10.description: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.
10.longDescription: Bind Alexstrasza's life force with an allied Hero. Both her and her target are healed for 480 (+4% per level) Health over 2 seconds. Afterwards, the Hero with a lower percentage of Health is healed to the same Health percentage as the other Hero.

10.name: Cleansing Flame
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, take to the sky and drop 5 fireballs over 6 seconds at the position of the mouse cursor. Fireballs deal 135 (+4% per level) damage to enemies and heal allied Heroes for 300 (+4% per level) Health.  2 seconds after dropping all fireballs, Alexstrasza lands at the position of the mouse cursor.

13.name: Dragon Scales
13.description: Gain 50 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.
13.longDescription: Gain 50 Armor while Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced, and for 2 seconds after. Can only trigger once every 10 seconds.

13.name: Pacify
13.description: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.
13.longDescription: Activate to Slow and reduce an enemy Hero's damage by 50% for 3 seconds.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Pacify's cooldown by 30 seconds.

13.name: Life Unbound
13.description: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.
13.longDescription: Activate to heal an allied Hero for 15% of their maximum Health and deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.  Healing a Stunned, Rooted, or Silenced ally reduces Life Unbound's cooldown by 30 seconds.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza.

16.name: Tough Love
16.description: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 25 Armor for 2.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: While Alexstrasza is above 75% Health, Gift of Life grants its target 25 Armor for 2.5 seconds.

16.name: Overprotective
16.description: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.
16.longDescription: Heroes healed by Abundance gain a Shield for 3 seconds equal to 60% of the amount healed.

16.name: Draconic Discipline
16.description: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.
16.longDescription: Increase Dragonqueen's duration by 7 seconds.

20.name: Ritual of Life
20.description: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Life-Binder activates 3 times over 6 seconds.

20.name: On Ruby Wings
20.description: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.
20.longDescription: Healing or damaging Heroes 8 or more times with Cleansing Flame activates Dragonqueen for 15 seconds upon landing.

20.name: Ancient Flame
20.description: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.
20.longDescription: While Dragonqueen is active, Alexstrasza's Basic Attacks apply Flame Buffet.

20.name: Blessing of the Red
20.description: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.
20.longDescription: Activate to grant an allied Hero 500 bonus maximum Health until they die.  Cannot be used on Alexstrasza, or on a Hero who already has Blessing of the Red.

1.name: Scroll of Identify
1.description: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 14 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hitting an enemy Hero with Scroll of Sealing reveals them for 8 seconds.  Reward: After hitting 14 Heroes, Scroll of Sealing also reduces Armor of Heroes hit by 15 for 4 seconds and the reveal duration is doubled.

1.name: Field Study
1.description: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.
1.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by Scroll of Sealing grants 20% Spell Power for 16 seconds, up to 40%.

1.name: Sapphire
1.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and its slow by 30%.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

4.name: Potion of Shielding
4.description: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.
4.longDescription: Whenever an ally is healed by a Healing Potion, they gain a 122 (+4% per level) Shield for 6 seconds.

4.name: Rejuvenation Potion
4.description: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.
4.longDescription: Healing Potions restore 10 Mana and heal for an additional 108 (+4% per level) over 4 seconds.

4.name: Ruby
4.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100%  and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
4.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100%  and it spawns 3 Lesser Healing Potions from each enemy Hero hit, healing allied Heroes for 250 (+4% per level) when picked up. Lesser Healing Potions last for 10 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

7.name: Cube Mastery
7.description: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce the Mana cost of Scroll of Sealing from 40 to 25.  Each enemy Hero hit by Horadric Cube reduces the cooldown of Scroll of Sealing by 4 seconds.

7.name: Kanai's Cube
7.description: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Horadric Cube reduces Hero damage dealt by 30% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Emerald
7.description: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.
7.longDescription: Activate to increase the damage of the next Horadric Cube by 100% and have it reduce the healing received of enemy Heroes by 75% for 4 seconds.  Only 1 Gem may be active at a time.

10.name: Stay Awhile and Listen
10.description: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, Channel for 3 seconds, putting enemy Heroes in front of Deckard to Sleep while Channeling, and for 2 seconds after.  Enemies can only be put to Sleep once per cast, and Sleep's effects end instantly if they take damage.

10.name: Lorenado
10.description: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting After 1 second, create a twirling tome tornado that travels towards the targeted direction, continually knocking away enemies that come into contact with it.

13.name: Super Healing Potion
13.description: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.
13.longDescription: If a Healing Potion isn't picked up for at least 2 seconds, it heals for 120% more.

13.name: Potion of Revival
13.description: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.
13.longDescription: When a Healing Potion is picked up, it also heals all nearby allied Heroes for 50% of the healing amount.

13.name: Ancient Blessings
13.description: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.
13.longDescription: Activate Fortitude of the Faithful to empower nearby allied Hero Basic Attacks for 8 seconds, causing them to deal an additional 62 (+4% per level) damage in an area and heal for 90 (+4% per level) for each Hero hit. This effect can only occur once per second.

16.name: Scroll of Stone Curse
16.description: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.
16.longDescription: Scroll of Sealing deals 200% more damage when hitting at least 2 Heroes.

16.name: Safety in Numbers
16.description: If at least 2 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.
16.longDescription: If at least 2 allied Heroes are nearby, Fortitude of the Faithful grants an additional 10 Armor, 50% Mana Regeneration per second, and causes Deckard's Basic Abilities to recharge an additional 50% faster.

16.name: Horadric Staff
16.description: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.
16.longDescription: Every 5 seconds, Deckard's next Basic Attack Stuns Heroes for 0.75 seconds.

20.name: Respect the Elderly
20.description: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.
20.longDescription: Stay Awhile and Listen Silences and Blinds enemies for 3 seconds upon waking up from Sleep.

20.name: Morenados!
20.description: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lorenado's cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds every time an enemy Hero is knocked back. This effect can only occur once per 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Bottomless Flask
20.description: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: After use, Healing Potions recharge after 8 seconds.

20.name: Perfect Gems
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to 5 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of all Gems to 5 seconds and the cooldown of Horadric Cube by 6 seconds.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.
1.longDescription: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 4 seconds, Pinning Shot's Slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.
1.longDescription: After being Stealthed for 2 seconds, gain an additional 10% Movement Speed. While Stealthed, regenerate 2 Mana per second.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.
4.longDescription: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 50%.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.
4.longDescription: Increase the cast range of Holo Decoy by 100% and its duration by 120%.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.
4.longDescription: Enemy Minions killed near Nova grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them.  Does not work on Elite Mercenaries.  Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

7.name: Perfect Shot
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.
7.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces its cooldown by 4 seconds and refunds its Mana cost.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, Nova's next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 60% additional damage.

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.
7.longDescription: Nova's Basic Attacks deal 250% damage and decrease the Physical Armor of Heroic targets by 15 for 3 seconds, but her Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.
10.longDescription: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 372 (+4% per level) damage each.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.
10.longDescription: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 435 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.
13.longDescription: Snipe's range is increased by 15% and hitting a Hero grants an additional stack of Precision Sniper.

13.name: Double Tap
13.description: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.
13.longDescription: Pinning Shot now has 2 charges, but its cooldown is increased by 2 seconds.

13.name: Ionic Force Field
13.description: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.
13.longDescription: Gain 25 Armor for 3 seconds after losing Stealth.

16.name: Explosive Round
16.description: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.
16.longDescription: Snipe also deals 90% damage to enemies near the impact.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.
16.longDescription: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 20 for the duration of the Slow, causing them to take 20% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.
16.longDescription: Increases the damage Holo Decoy deals to 30% of Nova's damage.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.
20.longDescription: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Precision Strike gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apollo Suit
20.description: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Permanent Cloak by 2 seconds.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.

1.name: Target Practice
1.description: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit every enemy Hero with Storm Bow.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero once with Storm Bow, its range is increased by 30%.  Reward: After hitting every enemy Hero 3 times with Storm Bow, its damage is increased by 100.

1.name: Simple Geometry
1.description: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.
1.longDescription: Quest: Hit a Hero with multiple arrows from the same Scatter Arrow cast 20 times. Each arrow hit after the second grants additional progress.  Reward: Upon hitting terrain for the first time, Scatter Arrow creates 2 additional arrows.

1.name: Redemption
1.description: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.
1.longDescription: Quest: Every 2 Basic Attacks against the same Hero within 10 seconds grants 1 Redemption, stacking up to 12. Dying decreases Redemption by 3, and Redemption can be lost even at maximum stacks.  Reward: At 12 Redemption, gain 50% Attack Speed.

4.name: Explosive Arrows
4.description: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.
4.longDescription: Upon hitting a Minion or Monster, Storm Bow deals 60% of its damage to enemies around its target.

4.name: Serrated Arrows
4.description: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.
4.longDescription: Scatter Arrow deals 100% more damage to Minions, Mercenaries, and Monsters.

4.name: Ignore All Distractions
4.description: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacks instantly kill Minions and increase Hanzo's Basic Attack range by 2 for 3 seconds.

7.name: The Dragon Hungers
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 5% Spell Power for 10 seconds, stacking up to 20%.

7.name: Never Outmatched
7.description: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Reduce Scatter Arrow's Mana cost from 50 to 30. Basic Attacks against Heroes lower the cooldown of Scatter Arrow by 3 seconds.

7.name: Sharpened Arrowheads
7.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.
7.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow or Basic Attacks reduces their Armor by 2 for 3 seconds, up to a maximum reduction of 20 Armor.

10.name: Dragonstrike
10.description: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.
10.longDescription: After 1.5 seconds, summon a pair of Spirit Dragons which travel forward, dealing 84 (+4% per level) damage every 0.25 seconds to enemy Heroes in its area.  Enemies in the center take 50% increased damage.

10.name: Dragon's Arrow
10.description: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile that travels across the battleground. Explodes upon hitting an enemy Hero, dealing 130 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies and Stunning them for 0.5 seconds.  After traveling a medium distance, the damage is increased to 260 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 1.25 seconds.  After traveling a long distance, the damage is increased to 390 (+4% per level) and the Stun duration to 2 seconds.

13.name: Fleet of Foot
13.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.
13.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow grants 10% Movement Speed for 6 seconds, up to 30%.

13.name: Ninja Assassin
13.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.
13.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow lowers Natural Agility's cooldown by 10 seconds. Additionally, Hero Takedowns reset Natural Agility's cooldown.

13.name: Mounted Archery
13.description: Reduce the cooldown of Summon Mount by 2 seconds.  Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.
13.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Summon Mount by 2 seconds.  Upon mounting, gain 25% additional Movement Speed for 5 seconds. Using Natural Agility instantly mounts.

16.name: Flawless Technique
16.description: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 40%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 40%.
16.longDescription: Hitting Heroes with Storm Bow increases the damage of Hanzo's next Basic Attack within 5 seconds by 40%. Basic Attacks against Heroes increase the damage of Hanzo's next Storm Bow within 5 seconds by 40%.

16.name: Piercing Arrows
16.description: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.
16.longDescription: Storm Bow and Scatter Arrow pierce, hitting an additional enemy. Additionally, Scatter Arrow can pierce through 1 enemy each time it ricochets.

16.name: Giant Slayer
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Scatter Arrow and Basic Attacks take a bonus 2% of their maximum Health as damage.

20.name: The Dragon Awakens
20.description: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Hero with Storm Bow, Scatter Arrow, or Basic Attacks reduces the cooldown of Dragonstrike by 4 seconds.

20.name: Play of the Game
20.description: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.
20.longDescription: While in flight or for up to 2 seconds after impacting a target, Dragon's Arrow can be reactivated to teleport to its location and jump backwards. If used after impact, Hanzo shoots arrows that deal 132 (+4% per level) damage to each target hit by the impact.  Hanzo is Unstoppable during Play of the Game.

20.name: Bullseye
20.description: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Increase Sonic Arrow's speed and center radius by 100%. Additionally, Heroes hit by Sonic Arrow's center are Stunned for 1 second.

20.name: Perfect Agility
20.description: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.
20.longDescription: Natural Agility gains a 2nd charge and its cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds.

1.name: Tricky Shuffles
1.description: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.
1.longDescription: While Frag Launcher has no charges left, Junkrat gains 10% Movement Speed and his Basic Attacks deal 15% bonus damage.

1.name: Extra-Wound Timers
1.description: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 80% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.
1.longDescription: The final grenade launched from Frag Launcher deals 80% bonus damage, and Frag Launcher grenades last an additional 2 seconds before automatically detonating.

1.name: Blow 'Em Up!
1.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.
1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine or Steel Trap causes Junkrat to deal 25% more damage with Basic Attacks and Basic Abilities for 6 seconds.

4.name: Taste For Explosions
4.description: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hitting a Hero with Frag Launcher increases its damage by 0.2%, up to 40%.

4.name: BOOM POW
4.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.
4.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Concussion Mine reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

4.name: Chattering Teeth
4.description: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.
4.longDescription: Steel Traps will slowly chase nearby enemy Heroes.

7.name: Bogged Down
7.description: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.
7.longDescription: Enemies launched by Concussion Mine are Slowed by 40% for 2.5 seconds upon landing.

7.name: Big As
7.description: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.
7.longDescription: Increase Steel Trap's radius and damage by 50% and enemy Heroes who are hit have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

7.name: Sticky Wicket
7.description: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Enemy Heroes who are hit by Steel Trap are Silenced for 2 seconds.

7.name: Dirty Trickster
7.description: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.
7.longDescription: Increase the explosion radius of Total Mayhem by 20%.  When Junkrat is Stunned, Rooted, or damaged by an enemy Hero while below 50% Health, he uses Total Mayhem, dropping 5 grenades at his feet that explode.   This effect has a 12 second cooldown.

10.name: RIP-Tire
10.description: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.
10.longDescription: Create a motorized bomb with 530 (+4% per level) Health that lasts 15 seconds. While active, Junkrat is immobile but gains control of RIP-Tire's movement.  RIP-Tire can be reactivated to detonate immediately, knocking nearby enemies back and dealing 720 (+4% per level) damage to enemies near the center gradually reduced to 445 (+4% per level) to enemies on the edge.

10.name: Rocket Ride
10.description: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.
10.longDescription: After 1.25 seconds, Junkrat launches into the air. While in the air, he can steer the landing location by moving.  After 3.75 seconds, Junkrat lands, dealing 890 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies and activating Total Mayhem. 5 seconds after landing, Junkrat reappears at the Hall of Storms and gains 150% additional Movement Speed until dismounted.

13.name: Bombs Away
13.description: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 30% bonus damage.
13.longDescription: Increase Junkrat's Basic Attack range by 1.  Frag Launcher grenades fired within 0.5 seconds of using a Basic Attack deal 30% bonus damage.

13.name: Ripper Air
13.description: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.
13.longDescription: Junkrat is knocked back 50% farther by Concussion Mine. Additionally, Concussion Mine's cooldown is reduced by 12 seconds if only Junkrat is hit.

13.name: Gotta Trap 'Em All!
13.description: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.
13.longDescription: Reduce Steel Trap's cooldown by 5 seconds and increase the maximum number of active traps to 2.

16.name: Burst Fire
16.description: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.
16.longDescription: Frag Launcher fires all of its charges in a continuous burst, its cooldown is reduced by 6 seconds, but it loses 1 maximum charge.

16.name: Endless Nades
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Frag Launcher reduces its cooldown by 1.5 seconds.

16.name: Spread Volley
16.description: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.
16.longDescription: Activate to make Frag Launcher fire 2 additional grenades in a spread. Works for up to 4 total charges, or until Frag Launcher runs out of charges.

20.name: Extra Oomph
20.description: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.
20.longDescription: Increase RIP-Tire's knockback distance by 50%, and its cooldown is reduced by 25 seconds for each enemy Hero hit.

20.name: Puckish Scamp
20.description: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.
20.longDescription: Junkrat also gains the Ability RIP-Tire. Each time he uses his Heroic, it swaps to the alternate ability. Each Heroic has its own separate cooldown.

20.name: Cannonball!
20.description: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.
20.longDescription: Increase the radius and explosion radius of grenades from Basic Attacks and Frag Launcher by 50%.

20.name: I Hate Waiting!
20.description: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 8 seconds.
20.longDescription: Junkrat always rides his Rocket Ride Mount, which grants 150% increased Movement Speed, but his Mount cooldown is increased to 8 seconds.

1.name: Enduring Swarm
1.description: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.
1.longDescription: Dark Swarm's duration is increased by 0.5 seconds and grants 50 Spell Armor while active.

1.name: Tissue Regeneration
1.description: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.
1.longDescription: Regeneration Globes grant 10 Essence.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases Health Regeneration by 4, up to 40, and maximum Essence by 1, up to 10.

1.name: Enhanced Agility
1.description: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.
1.longDescription: Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus now lasts for 5 seconds after leaving a bush.  Repeatable Quest: Every 50 Essence collected permanently increases the Movement Speed bonus of Brushstalker by 2%, up to 20%.

4.name: Lurker Strain
4.description: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 4 seconds.  Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Burrow by 4 seconds.  Emerging from Burrow grants Dehaka Stealth for 3 seconds and also knocks nearby enemies back, Slowing them by 30% for 3 seconds.

4.name: One-Who-Collects
4.description: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.
4.longDescription: Increases Essence collected from Minions by 50%.

4.name: Hero Stalker
4.description: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.
4.longDescription: Increases Essence gained from Takedowns by 100%, and gain 1 Essence each time an enemy Hero is hit by Dark Swarm.

7.name: Feeding Frenzy
7.description: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.
7.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Drag's cooldown by 2 seconds.

7.name: Paralyzing Enzymes
7.description: Increase the duration of Drag by 0.5 seconds. Drag Slows enemies by 30% for 2 seconds after it ends.
7.longDescription: Increase the duration of Drag by 0.5 seconds. Drag Slows enemies by 30% for 2 seconds after it ends.

7.name: Symbiosis
7.description: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.
7.longDescription: Every time Dark Swarm damages an enemy Hero, reduce its cooldown by 0.4 seconds.

10.name: Isolation
10.description: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.
10.longDescription: Launch biomass that hits the first enemy Hero dealing 200 (+4% per level) damage, revealing, Silencing, and Slowing them 30% for 3 seconds. Additionally, their vision radius is greatly reduced for 6 seconds.

10.name: Adaptation
10.description: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.
10.longDescription: After 4 seconds, heal for 100% of the damage Dehaka took over this period.

13.name: Primal Rage
13.description: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.
13.longDescription: Gain 1% increased Attack Damage per Essence stored.

13.name: Ferocious Stalker
13.description: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.
13.longDescription: Dark Swarm Slows enemy Heroes by 15% for 0.75 seconds and deals 50% more damage while Brushstalker's Movement Speed bonus is active.

13.name: Primal Swarm
13.description: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.
13.longDescription: Dark Swarm causes enemies hit to lose 10 Armor for 0.75 seconds, causing them to take 10% extra damage.

16.name: Elongated Tongue
16.description: Increase Drag range by 20%.
16.longDescription: Increase Drag range by 20%.

16.name: Tunneling Claws
16.description: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.
16.longDescription: Dehaka can move while Burrowed.

16.name: Pack Leader
16.description: Dehaka gains 20 Armor while in a bush and for 5 seconds after leaving.
16.longDescription: Dehaka gains 20 Armor while in a bush and for 5 seconds after leaving.

20.name: Contagion
20.description: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.
20.longDescription: Isolation hits all Heroes near the first target.

20.name: Change Is Survival
20.description: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.
20.longDescription: Increases Adaptation healing to 200% of the damage received and reduces the cooldown by 30 seconds.

20.name: Apex Predator
20.description: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 35 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Reduces Brushstalker's cooldown by 35 seconds and the cast time by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Essence Claws
20.description: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.
20.longDescription: Dehaka's Basic Attacks slow the target by 20% for 1 second. If the target is a Hero, Dehaka gains 5 Essence.

1.name: Echo of the Elements
1.description: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.
1.longDescription: Quest: Kill Minions or Heroes within 1.5 seconds of hitting them with Chain Lightning.  Reward: After killing 10 enemies, reduce the Mana cost of Chain Lightning from 40 to 25.  Reward: After killing 20 enemies, gain a second charge of Chain Lightning.

1.name: Crash Lightning
1.description: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.
1.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Hitting at least 2 Heroes with a single use of Chain Lightning increases the damage of its bounces by 12, up to 360.  Reward: After hitting multiple Heroes 30 times, Chain Lightning prioritizes bouncing to Heroes.

1.name: Rolling Thunder
1.description: For 8 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them grants a stack of Frostwolf Resilience. If the target is an enemy Hero, then he also deals damage to them equal to 3% of their maximum Health and healing for the same amount.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.
1.longDescription: For 8 seconds after hitting an enemy with Chain Lightning, Thrall's next Basic Attack against them grants a stack of Frostwolf Resilience. If the target is an enemy Hero, then he also deals damage to them equal to 3% of their maximum Health and healing for the same amount.  Passive: Increase the number of Chain Lightning bounces by 1.

4.name: Feral Resilience
4.description: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.
4.longDescription: Heroes damaged by Feral Spirit grant 3 stacks of Frostwolf Resilience and 2 stacks of Feral Resilience, granting 50 Physical Armor against the next incoming Hero Basic Attack.  Stacks are consumed on the next cast of Feral Spirit.

4.name: Frostwolf Pack
4.description: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.
4.longDescription: Quest: Hit 6 Heroes with Feral Spirit. Progress is lost on death and when Thrall fails to hit a Hero.  Reward: Reduce the cooldown and Mana cost of Feral Spirit by 50%.

4.name: Mana Tide
4.description: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
4.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience restores 15 Mana and reduces Basic Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.

7.name: Maelstrom Weapon
7.description: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.
7.longDescription: Repeatable Quest: Basic Attacks against Heroes while Windfury's Movement Speed bonus is active increase Attack Damage by 1.  Reward: After gaining 20 Attack Damage, increase the Movement Speed bonus of Windfury to 40%.  Reward: After gaining 40 Attack Damage, Thrall permanently gains 15% increased Movement Speed.

7.name: Ancestral Wrath
7.description: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.
7.longDescription: Activate to consume 8 stacks of Ancestral Wrath, damaging a target enemy Hero for 15% of their maximum Health over 3 seconds, and healing Thrall for 150% of the damage dealt.  Gain 1 stack of Ancestral Wrath every time Frostwolf Resilience activates.

7.name: Follow Through
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.
7.longDescription: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

10.name: Sundering
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, sunder the earth in a long line, dealing 290 (+4% per level) damage and shoving enemies to the side, Stunning them for 1 second.

10.name: Earthquake
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.
10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, summon a massive Earthquake that pulses every 4 seconds. Each pulse lasts 2 seconds, Slowing all enemies in the area by 50%, and deals 50 (+4% per level) damage to enemy Heroes. Does 3 pulses.

13.name: Grace Of Air
13.description: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.
13.longDescription: Windfury attacks grant twice as many stacks of Frostwolf Resilience.

13.name: Frostwolf's Grace
13.description: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.
13.longDescription: Frostwolf Resilience can be activated to instantly heal for 150% of its normal amount.

13.name: Spirit Shield
13.description: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.
13.longDescription: Every 45 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds. Frostwolf Resilience reduces this cooldown by 10 seconds.  Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Tempest Fury
16.description: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.
16.longDescription: The final strike of Windfury hits 3 times for 75% normal damage.

16.name: Thunderstorm
16.description: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.
16.longDescription: Chain Lightning Slows targets by 8% for 2 seconds.  Quest: Targeting a Hero directly with Chain Lightning increases this Slow by 8%, up to an additional 40%.  Reward: While at a 40% bonus, Chain Lightning's damage is increased by 25%.  Bonuses are reset if Chain Lightning is used on the same Hero it was last used on, or if Thrall dies.

16.name: Alpha Wolf
16.description: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.
16.longDescription: For 3 seconds after a Hero is hit by Feral Spirit, Thrall's Basic Attacks against them deal an additional 3% of the target's maximum Health as damage.  Passive: Increase the duration of Feral Spirit's Root to 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Worldbreaker
20.description: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Lower the cooldown of Sundering by 20 seconds. After Sundering impacts, it leaves behind an impassable rift, blocking unit movement for 3 seconds.

20.name: Earthen Shields
20.description: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.
20.longDescription: Allies within the Earthquake area gain a Shield equal to 15% of their maximum Health each pulse. This shield lasts 4 seconds.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.
20.longDescription: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and Slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Wind Rush
20.description: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.
20.longDescription: Activate to immediately teleport to a target location and gain Windfury.

1.name: Maximum Effort
1.description: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.
1.longDescription: If Carnage damages the same enemy Hero 3 times it deals an additional 108 (+4% per level) damage and Slows by 25% for 2.5 seconds.

1.name: Fatal Wounds
1.description: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.
1.longDescription: While at maximum stacks, Blood Rage's bleed deals 30% additional damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health.  Quest: Damage enemy Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage.  Reward: After damaging Heroes with Blood Rage's bleed damage 200 times, Blood Rage's duration is increased by 2 seconds.

1.name: Finishing Touch
1.description: Gain 20% Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 20% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
1.longDescription: Gain 20% Basic Attack damage. When Qhira Basic Attacks an enemy Hero below 50% Health it deals 20% additional damage, and she gains 35% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

4.name: Upstage
4.description: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.
4.longDescription: Damaging at least 2 Heroes with Blood Rage causes Qhira to Evade the next 4 Heroic Basic Attacks within 12 seconds.

4.name: Ensnaring Swing
4.description: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 40% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.
4.longDescription: The primary target of Revolving Sweep is Slowed by 40% while Qhira is attached to them. Secondary targets hit by Revolving Sweep's swing are Slowed by 40% for 3 seconds.

4.name: Your Pain, My Gain
4.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.
4.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero causes Qhira to gain 10 Armor for 3 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

7.name: The Thirst
7.description: Carnage heals for 50% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes. Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 15% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.
7.longDescription: Carnage heals for 50% of the damage dealt to enemy Heroes. Anytime Carnage damages an enemy Hero, Qhira's next Basic Attack within 4 seconds against an enemy Hero deals 15% additional damage, stacking up to 10 times.

7.name: Healmonger
7.description: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.
7.longDescription: If Blood Rage damages an enemy Hero below 50% Health, it heals for an additional 190 (+4% per level) Health.

7.name: Siphoning Link
7.description: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt.
7.longDescription: Damaging an enemy Hero with Revolving Sweep's initial impact or swing causes Qhira to regenerate 96 (+4% per level) Health over 4 seconds. Stacks up to 4 times.  Passive: Basic Attacks heal for 20% of the damage dealt.

10.name: Unrelenting Strikes
10.description: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deal 44 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds for 2.5 seconds as your sword grows outward. Upon expiring, deal 160 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemy Heroes and Stun them for 1.5 seconds.

10.name: Final Strike
10.description: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.
10.longDescription: After 1 second, deal 395 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in a line. This damage is increased by 25% against enemy Heroes who are below 50% Health.

13.name: Chainsaw
13.description: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.
13.longDescription: Carnage's cooldown recharges 100% faster while an enemy Hero has maximum Blood Rage stacks.

13.name: Pulsing Pain
13.description: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.
13.longDescription: Each additional enemy Hero hit by Revolving Sweep causes the primary target to take an additional 115 (+4% per level) damage.

13.name: The Hunted
13.description: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.
13.longDescription: Basic Attacking an enemy Hero increases your Basic Attack damage against that Hero by 25%. Stacks up to 4 times and lasts 4 seconds. Bonus is reset if a different Hero is attacked.

16.name: Booming Kick
16.description: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.
16.longDescription: Increase the Stun duration of Revolving Sweep's re-activation by 0.25 seconds. Enemy Heroes around the primary target are also affected by Revolving Sweep's re-activation.

16.name: Lingering Ailment
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep or by Grappling Hook have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Revolving Sweep or by Grappling Hook have their Armor reduced by 15 for 3 seconds.

16.name: Swing Life Away
16.description: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 250% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds after the re-activation impact.
16.longDescription: Revolving Sweep's cooldown recharges 250% faster while Qhira is swinging around her target. She also gains 50 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds after the re-activation impact.

20.name: Silent Killer
20.description: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for 0.5 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.
20.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Unrelenting Strikes Silences them for 0.5 seconds and reduces its cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Unleashed Potential
20.description: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.
20.longDescription: Increase the damage to enemy Heroes under 50% Health from 25% to 50%.  If an enemy Hero dies within 1.5 seconds of being hit by Final Strike, then reset the cooldowns of Final Strike and all of Qhira's Basic Abilities.

20.name: Utility Belt
20.description: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 5 seconds.
20.longDescription: Grappling Hook's cooldown is reset when hitting an enemy Hero with the initial impact of Revolving Sweep and recharges 900% faster if Qhira hasn't taken damage within the last 5 seconds.

20.name: No Sanctuary
20.description: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.
20.longDescription: Nearby enemy Heroes below 50% Health are revealed and you gain 20% Movement Speed while an enemy Hero is revealed by you in this way.  Additionally, you deal 20% increased damage to these revealed enemies.

1.name: Ambush
1.description: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.
1.longDescription: Gain Stealth when entering Siege Mode or after not taking or dealing damage for 3 seconds while in Siege Mode. Basic Attacks while Stealthed deal 100% more damage.  Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.

1.longDescription: Increase Siege Mode's splash damage to 50% of Basic Attack damage, and increase its splash radius by 25%.
