1.description: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.
1.longDescription: Activate to increase Basic Attack damage dealt by 35% for 5 seconds. Hitting Structures with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode reduces the cooldown of Maelstrom Rounds by 5 seconds.  Stores up to 3 charges.

4.longDescription: Reduce Concussive Blast's cooldown by 3 seconds, its Mana cost by 40, and when cast create an impassable wall in front of Sgt. Hammer for 4 seconds.

4.longDescription: Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode heal for 10% of the damage dealt.

7.longDescription: Spider Mines detonate 3 times over 3 seconds.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant 5 Mana and reduce the cooldown of Spider Mines by 1 second.  Increase this bonus to 1.5 seconds while in Siege Mode.

7.longDescription: Sgt. Hammer can move at 40% Movement Speed while in Siege Mode.

7.name: Graduating Range
7.description: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.
7.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Basic Attack range is increased by 1 every 3 seconds, up to 3.

10.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.
10.longDescription: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 (+3% per level) damage to non-Structure enemies in its path.

10.description: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.
10.longDescription: Deals 164 (+4% per level) damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Moving while Thrusters is active leaves a trail of up to 5 Spider Mines. Additionally, increase the Slow of Spider Mines by 15%.

13.name: Entrenched

13.longDescription: While in Siege Mode, Concussive Blasts's damage and knockback distance are increased by 75%.

16.name: Mechanical Know-how

16.longDescription: Neosteel Plating grants 5% maximum Health as a Shield for 2 seconds. If this Shield is destroyed, Basic Attack damage is increased by 50% for 5 seconds.

16.longDescription: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by 30% for 3 seconds.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to 1.5% of the Hero's maximum Health.

20.longDescription: Blunt Force Gun's missile orbits the planet every 5 seconds. Only the last missile fired orbits.

20.longDescription: Napalm Strike's range is increased by 75% and its impact does 50% more damage.

20.longDescription: Hitting enemy Heroes with Basic Attacks while in Siege Mode grants 5% Attack Speed for 5 seconds, up to 40%.

1.longDescription: Increases Raven Form's Movement Speed bonus by 50%.

1.longDescription: Raven Form increases Medivh's Mana and Health Regeneration by 75%.

1.longDescription: Medivh can manually place both Portal locations and it no longer breaks Raven Form.  Activate Medivh's Trait to cancel an unlinked Portal.

4.longDescription: The first time an ally uses a Portal, they gain 30 Armor for 4 seconds, reducing their damage taken by 30%.

4.longDescription: A Raven Familiar joins allies each time they use a Portal. The Raven will dive at the ally's next Basic Attack against a Hero within 5 seconds, dealing 114 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing them by 30% for 2.5 seconds.

4.longDescription: Activate to greatly increase sight range for 5 seconds and reveal enemy Heroes in the area for 8 seconds. Does not cancel Raven Form.  Passive: Increase Medivh's sight range while in Raven Form by 25%.

7.longDescription: When Force of Will expires, it deals 80 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies, plus 50% of the damage it prevented, up to 315 (+4% per level) additional damage.

7.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with a single cast of Force of Will grants 30% Spell Power for 15 seconds. Stacks up to 2 times.

10.longDescription: Polymorph an enemy Hero for 2 seconds, Silencing them and making them unable to attack. On expiration, Poly Bomb spreads to other nearby enemy Heroes.

10.longDescription: After 0.5 seconds, unleash a wave of energy that places enemy Heroes in Time Stop for 3 seconds.

13.longDescription: Preventing at least 268 (+4% per level) damage with Force of Will reduces its cooldown to 4 seconds.

13.longDescription: Increase the amount of healing from Force of Will to 70% of the damage it absorbed.

16.name: Arcane Charge

16.longDescription: When Arcane Rift damages an enemy Hero, the next Arcane Rift deals 15% more damage.

16.longDescription: Basic Attacks reduce Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 3%. Each enemy Hero hit by Arcane Rift reduces Medivh's Heroic Ability cooldown by 9%.

16.longDescription: Decrease Portal cooldown by 25% and increase Portal duration by 50%.

20.longDescription: Poly Bomb explodes 1 second sooner and the spread radius is increased by 25%.

20.longDescription: Increase the duration of the Time Stop by 33% and gain the ability to redirect the wave once while it's active.

20.longDescription: Minions and Catapults hit by Arcane Rift are instantly killed.

20.longDescription: Activate to instantly restore 200 mana to all nearby allied Heroes and grant them 15% Spell Power for 10 seconds.

20.longDescription: Stealth an allied Hero for 40 seconds, they are Unrevealable for the first 0.5 seconds. Remaining stationary for at least 1.5 seconds while Stealthed grants Invisible.  Stores up to 2 charges.

1.longDescription: Hitting an enemy Hero with Swift Strike increases Genji's Movement Speed by 30% for 3 seconds.

4.longDescription: After Genji blocks 330 (+4% per level) damage with Deflect, activate to release a Dragon Claw, dealing 190 (+4% per level) damage to all nearby enemies.

10.longDescription: Unleash the Dragonblade for 8 seconds. While active, Dragonblade can be reactivated to lunge forward and slash in a huge arc, dealing 240 (+4% per level) damage.

13.longDescription: Increase Genji's Basic Attack range by 1.  Each time Genji hits an enemy Hero with a Basic Attack, increase his Basic Attack damage by 1% for 3 seconds, stacking up to 15%.

20.longDescription: Each enemy Hero hit by X-Strike reduces its cooldown by 10 seconds.

1.name: Echo Pulse

7.longDescription: Reduce Photon Cannon's cooldown by 4 seconds when Disruption Pulse or Warp Rift damages an enemy Hero.

10.name: Pylon Overcharge
10.description: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.
10.longDescription: Increase the size of Pylon power fields and allow them to attack enemies within it for 96 (+4% per level) damage per second. Lasts 10 seconds.

10.name: Null Gate
10.description: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.
10.longDescription: Vector Targeting Project a barrier of negative energy in the target direction that lasts 4 seconds. Enemies who touch the barrier take 68 (+4% per level) damage per second and are Slowed by 80% for as long as they remain in contact with it.

13.name: Aggressive Matrix
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 35% increased Attack Damage.

13.name: Power Overflowing
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 10% increased Spell Power and 2 Mana per second.

13.name: Shield Battery
13.description: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 112 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.
13.longDescription: Pylon's Power Field grants allied Heroes 28 (+4% per level) Shields per second, up to 112 (+4% per level). Shields persist for 2 seconds after exiting a Pylon Power Field.

16.name: Quantum Entanglement
16.description: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.
16.longDescription: Enemies continue to be slowed for 3 seconds after their last contact with a Warp Rift.

16.name: Gravity Well
16.description: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.
16.longDescription: Enemies are slowed more the closer they are to the center of the Warp Rift, up to a maximum slow of 60%.

16.name: Interference
16.description: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift explosions have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.  Additionally, enemies hit by Warp Rift explosions are knocked away from the center.
16.longDescription: Enemy Heroes hit by Warp Rift explosions have their Spell Power reduced by 35% for 5 seconds.  Additionally, enemies hit by Warp Rift explosions are knocked away from the center.

20.name: Construct Additional Pylons
20.description: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.
20.longDescription: Probius can now have up to 3 active Pylons, and increase the damage of Pylon Overcharge by 25%.

20.name: Gate Keeper
20.description: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.
20.longDescription: Null Gate lasts indefinitely if either end is within a Power Field.

20.name: Shoot 'Em Up
20.description: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.   Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.
20.longDescription: Hitting a Warp Rift with Disruption Pulse causes 4 additional pulses that deal 50% damage to be fired from the impact location in different directions.   Additional Pulses do not benefit from Echo Pulse or Particle Accelerator.

20.name: Probius Loop
20.description: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.
20.longDescription: Whenever a Rift explosion hits 1 or more enemy Heroes, create a new Warp Rift in the same location.
